4427  ID3D11SamplerState* d3d11_smp;
4428 } _sg_image;
4429 
4430 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_image_slot(_sg_image* img) {
4431  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
4432  memset(img, 0, sizeof(_sg_image));
4433 }
4434 
4435 typedef struct {
4436  int size;
4437 } _sg_uniform_block;
4438 
4439 typedef struct {
4440  sg_image_type type;
4441 } _sg_shader_image;
4442 
4443 typedef struct {
4444  int num_uniform_blocks;
4445  int num_images;
4446  _sg_uniform_block uniform_blocks[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS];
4447  _sg_shader_image images[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
4448  ID3D11Buffer* d3d11_cbs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS];
4449 } _sg_shader_stage;
4450 
4451 typedef struct {
4452  _sg_slot slot;
4453  _sg_shader_stage stage[SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES];
4454  ID3D11VertexShader* d3d11_vs;
4455  ID3D11PixelShader* d3d11_fs;
4456  void* d3d11_vs_blob;
4457  int d3d11_vs_blob_length;
4458 } _sg_shader;
4459 
4460 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_shader_slot(_sg_shader* shd) {
4461  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd);
4462  memset(shd, 0, sizeof(_sg_shader));
4463 }
4464 
4465 typedef struct {
4466  _sg_slot slot;
4467  _sg_shader* shader;
4468  sg_shader shader_id;
4469  sg_index_type index_type;
4470  bool vertex_layout_valid[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
4471  int color_attachment_count;
4472  sg_pixel_format color_format;
4473  sg_pixel_format depth_format;
4474  int sample_count;
4475  float blend_color[4];
4476  UINT d3d11_stencil_ref;
4477  UINT d3d11_vb_strides[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
4478  D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY d3d11_topology;
4479  DXGI_FORMAT d3d11_index_format;
4480  ID3D11InputLayout* d3d11_il;
4481  ID3D11RasterizerState* d3d11_rs;
4482  ID3D11DepthStencilState* d3d11_dss;
4483  ID3D11BlendState* d3d11_bs;
4484 } _sg_pipeline;
4485 
4486 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_pipeline_slot(_sg_pipeline* pip) {
4487  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
4488  memset(pip, 0, sizeof(_sg_pipeline));
4489 }
4490 
4491 typedef struct {
4492  _sg_image* image;
4493  sg_image image_id;
4494  int mip_level;
4495  int slice;
4496 } _sg_attachment;
4497 
4498 typedef struct {
4499  _sg_slot slot;
4500  int num_color_atts;
4501  _sg_attachment color_atts[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS];
4502  _sg_attachment ds_att;
4503  ID3D11RenderTargetView* d3d11_rtvs[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS];
4504  ID3D11DepthStencilView* d3d11_dsv;
4505 } _sg_pass;
4506 
4507 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_pass_slot(_sg_pass* pass) {
4508  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass);
4509  memset(pass, 0, sizeof(_sg_pass));
4510 }
4511 
4512 typedef struct {
4513  _sg_slot slot;
4514 } _sg_context;
4515 
4516 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_context_slot(_sg_context* context) {
4517  SOKOL_ASSERT(context);
4518  memset(context, 0, sizeof(_sg_context));
4519 }
4520 
4521 /*-- main D3D11 backend state and functions ----------------------------------*/
4522 typedef struct {
4523  bool valid;
4524  ID3D11Device* dev;
4525  ID3D11DeviceContext* ctx;
4526  const void* (*rtv_cb)(void);
4527  const void* (*dsv_cb)(void);
4528  bool in_pass;
4529  bool use_indexed_draw;
4530  int cur_width;
4531  int cur_height;
4532  int num_rtvs;
4533  _sg_pass* cur_pass;
4534  sg_pass cur_pass_id;
4535  _sg_pipeline* cur_pipeline;
4536  sg_pipeline cur_pipeline_id;
4537  ID3D11RenderTargetView* cur_rtvs[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS];
4538  ID3D11DepthStencilView* cur_dsv;
4539  /* the following arrays are used for unbinding resources, they will always contain zeroes */
4540  ID3D11RenderTargetView* zero_rtvs[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS];
4541  ID3D11Buffer* zero_vbs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
4542  UINT zero_vb_offsets[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
4543  UINT zero_vb_strides[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
4544  ID3D11Buffer* zero_cbs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS];
4545  ID3D11ShaderResourceView* zero_srvs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
4546  ID3D11SamplerState* zero_smps[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
4547  /* global subresourcedata array for texture updates */
4548  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA subres_data[SG_MAX_MIPMAPS * SG_MAX_TEXTUREARRAY_LAYERS];
4549 } _sg_backend;
4550 static _sg_backend _sg_d3d11;
4551 
4552 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_setup_backend(const sg_desc* desc) {
4553  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
4554  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->d3d11_device);
4555  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->d3d11_device_context);
4556  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->d3d11_render_target_view_cb);
4557  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->d3d11_depth_stencil_view_cb);
4558  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->d3d11_render_target_view_cb != desc->d3d11_depth_stencil_view_cb);
4559  memset(&_sg_d3d11, 0, sizeof(_sg_d3d11));
4560  _sg_d3d11.valid = true;
4561  _sg_d3d11.dev = (ID3D11Device*) desc->d3d11_device;
4562  _sg_d3d11.ctx = (ID3D11DeviceContext*) desc->d3d11_device_context;
4563  _sg_d3d11.rtv_cb = desc->d3d11_render_target_view_cb;
4564  _sg_d3d11.dsv_cb = desc->d3d11_depth_stencil_view_cb;
4565 }
4566 
4567 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_discard_backend() {
4568  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.valid);
4569  memset(&_sg_d3d11, 0, sizeof(_sg_d3d11));
4570 }
4571 
4572 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_query_feature(sg_feature f) {
4573  switch (f) {
4574  case SG_FEATURE_INSTANCING:
4575  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_COMPRESSION_DXT:
4576  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_FLOAT:
4577  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_HALF_FLOAT:
4578  case SG_FEATURE_ORIGIN_TOP_LEFT:
4579  case SG_FEATURE_MSAA_RENDER_TARGETS:
4580  case SG_FEATURE_MULTIPLE_RENDER_TARGET:
4581  case SG_FEATURE_IMAGETYPE_3D:
4582  case SG_FEATURE_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
4583  return true;
4584  default:
4585  return false;
4586  }
4587 }
4588 
4589 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_d3d11_clear_state() {
4590  /* clear all the device context state, so that resource refs don't keep stuck in the d3d device context */
4591  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetRenderTargets(_sg_d3d11.ctx, SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS, _sg_d3d11.zero_rtvs, NULL);
4592  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL);
4593  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetDepthStencilState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL, 0);
4594  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetBlendState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL, NULL, 0xFFFFFFFF);
4595  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetVertexBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS, _sg_d3d11.zero_vbs, _sg_d3d11.zero_vb_strides, _sg_d3d11.zero_vb_offsets);
4596  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetIndexBuffer(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL, DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN, 0);
4597  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetInputLayout(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL);
4598  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetShader(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL, NULL, 0);
4599  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetShader(_sg_d3d11.ctx, NULL, NULL, 0);
4600  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetConstantBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS, _sg_d3d11.zero_cbs);
4601  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetConstantBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS, _sg_d3d11.zero_cbs);
4602  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetShaderResources(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, _sg_d3d11.zero_srvs);
4603  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetShaderResources(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, _sg_d3d11.zero_srvs);
4604  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetSamplers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, _sg_d3d11.zero_smps);
4605  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetSamplers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, _sg_d3d11.zero_smps);
4606 }
4607 
4608 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_reset_state_cache() {
4609  /* just clear the d3d11 device context state */
4610  _sg_d3d11_clear_state();
4611 }
4612 
4613 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_activate_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
4614  _SOKOL_UNUSED(ctx);
4615  _sg_reset_state_cache();
4616 }
4617 
4618 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
4619  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
4620  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
4621  ctx->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
4622 }
4623 
4624 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
4625  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
4626  _sg_init_context_slot(ctx);
4627 }
4628 
4629 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf, const sg_buffer_desc* desc) {
4630  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && desc);
4631  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
4632  SOKOL_ASSERT(!buf->d3d11_buf);
4633  buf->size = desc->size;
4634  buf->type = _sg_def(desc->type, SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER);
4635  buf->usage = _sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE);
4636  buf->upd_frame_index = 0;
4637  const bool injected = (0 != desc->d3d11_buffer);
4638  if (injected) {
4639  buf->d3d11_buf = (ID3D11Buffer*) desc->d3d11_buffer;
4640  ID3D11Buffer_AddRef(buf->d3d11_buf);
4641  }
4642  else {
4643  D3D11_BUFFER_DESC d3d11_desc;
4644  memset(&d3d11_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_desc));
4645  d3d11_desc.ByteWidth = buf->size;
4646  d3d11_desc.Usage = _sg_d3d11_usage(buf->usage);
4647  d3d11_desc.BindFlags = buf->type == SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER ? D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER : D3D11_BIND_INDEX_BUFFER;
4648  d3d11_desc.CPUAccessFlags = _sg_d3d11_cpu_access_flags(buf->usage);
4649  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA* init_data_ptr = 0;
4650  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA init_data;
4651  memset(&init_data, 0, sizeof(init_data));
4652  if (buf->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) {
4653  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->content);
4654  init_data.pSysMem = desc->content;
4655  init_data_ptr = &init_data;
4656  }
4657  HRESULT hr = ID3D11Device_CreateBuffer(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_desc, init_data_ptr, &buf->d3d11_buf);
4658  _SOKOL_UNUSED(hr);
4659  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && buf->d3d11_buf);
4660  }
4661  buf->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
4662 }
4663 
4664 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf) {
4665  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf);
4666  if (buf->d3d11_buf) {
4667  ID3D11Buffer_Release(buf->d3d11_buf);
4668  }
4669  _sg_init_buffer_slot(buf);
4670 }
4671 
4672 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_d3d11_fill_subres_data(const _sg_image* img, const sg_image_content* content) {
4673  const int num_faces = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? 6:1;
4674  const int num_slices = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY) ? img->depth:1;
4675  int subres_index = 0;
4676  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < num_faces; face_index++) {
4677  for (int slice_index = 0; slice_index < num_slices; slice_index++) {
4678  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < img->num_mipmaps; mip_index++, subres_index++) {
4679  SOKOL_ASSERT(subres_index < (SG_MAX_MIPMAPS * SG_MAX_TEXTUREARRAY_LAYERS));
4680  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA* subres_data = &_sg_d3d11.subres_data[subres_index];
4681  const int mip_width = ((img->width>>mip_index)>0) ? img->width>>mip_index : 1;
4682  const int mip_height = ((img->height>>mip_index)>0) ? img->height>>mip_index : 1;
4683  const sg_subimage_content* subimg_content = &(content->subimage[face_index][mip_index]);
4684  const int slice_size = subimg_content->size / num_slices;
4685  const int slice_offset = slice_size * slice_index;
4686  const uint8_t* ptr = (const uint8_t*) subimg_content->ptr;
4687  subres_data->pSysMem = ptr + slice_offset;
4688  subres_data->SysMemPitch = _sg_row_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width);
4689  if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_3D) {
4690  /* FIXME? const int mip_depth = ((img->depth>>mip_index)>0) ? img->depth>>mip_index : 1; */
4691  subres_data->SysMemSlicePitch = _sg_surface_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width, mip_height);
4692  }
4693  else {
4694  subres_data->SysMemSlicePitch = 0;
4695  }
4696  }
4697  }
4698  }
4699 }
4700 
4701 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_image(_sg_image* img, const sg_image_desc* desc) {
4702  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && desc);
4703  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
4704  SOKOL_ASSERT(!img->d3d11_tex2d && !img->d3d11_tex3d && !img->d3d11_texds && !img->d3d11_texmsaa);
4705  SOKOL_ASSERT(!img->d3d11_srv && !img->d3d11_smp);
4706  HRESULT hr;
4707 
4708  img->type = _sg_def(desc->type, SG_IMAGETYPE_2D);
4709  img->render_target = desc->render_target;
4710  img->width = desc->width;
4711  img->height = desc->height;
4712  img->depth = _sg_def(desc->depth, 1);
4713  img->num_mipmaps = _sg_def(desc->num_mipmaps, 1);
4714  img->usage = _sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE);
4715  img->pixel_format = _sg_def(desc->pixel_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8);
4716  img->sample_count = _sg_def(desc->sample_count, 1);
4717  img->min_filter = _sg_def(desc->min_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
4718  img->mag_filter = _sg_def(desc->mag_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
4719  img->wrap_u = _sg_def(desc->wrap_u, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
4720  img->wrap_v = _sg_def(desc->wrap_v, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
4721  img->wrap_w = _sg_def(desc->wrap_w, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
4722  img->max_anisotropy = _sg_def(desc->max_anisotropy, 1);
4723  img->upd_frame_index = 0;
4724  const bool injected = (0 != desc->d3d11_texture);
4725 
4726  /* special case depth-stencil buffer? */
4727  if (_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(img->pixel_format)) {
4728  /* create only a depth-texture */
4729  SOKOL_ASSERT(!injected);
4730  img->d3d11_format = _sg_d3d11_rendertarget_depth_format(img->pixel_format);
4731  if (img->d3d11_format == DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
4732  /* trying to create a texture format that's not supported by D3D */
4733  SOKOL_LOG("trying to create a D3D11 depth-texture with unsupported pixel format\n");
4734  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
4735  return;
4736  }
4737  D3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC d3d11_desc;
4738  memset(&d3d11_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_desc));
4739  d3d11_desc.Width = img->width;
4740  d3d11_desc.Height = img->height;
4741  d3d11_desc.MipLevels = 1;
4742  d3d11_desc.ArraySize = 1;
4743  d3d11_desc.Format = img->d3d11_format;
4744  d3d11_desc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DEFAULT;
4745  d3d11_desc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_DEPTH_STENCIL;
4746  d3d11_desc.SampleDesc.Count = img->sample_count;
4747  d3d11_desc.SampleDesc.Quality = (img->sample_count > 1) ? D3D11_STANDARD_MULTISAMPLE_PATTERN : 0;
4748  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateTexture2D(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_desc, NULL, &img->d3d11_texds);
4749  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_texds);
4750  }
4751  else {
4752  /* create (or inject) color texture */
4753 
4754  /* prepare initial content pointers */
4755  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA* init_data = 0;
4756  if (!injected && (img->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) && !img->render_target) {
4757  _sg_d3d11_fill_subres_data(img, &desc->content);
4758  init_data = _sg_d3d11.subres_data;
4759  }
4760  if (img->type != SG_IMAGETYPE_3D) {
4761  /* 2D-, cube- or array-texture */
4762  /* if this is an MSAA render target, the following texture will be the 'resolve-texture' */
4763  D3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC d3d11_tex_desc;
4764  memset(&d3d11_tex_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_tex_desc));
4765  d3d11_tex_desc.Width = img->width;
4766  d3d11_tex_desc.Height = img->height;
4767  d3d11_tex_desc.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4768  switch (img->type) {
4769  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY: d3d11_tex_desc.ArraySize = img->depth; break;
4770  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE: d3d11_tex_desc.ArraySize = 6; break;
4771  default: d3d11_tex_desc.ArraySize = 1; break;
4772  }
4773  d3d11_tex_desc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE;
4774  if (img->render_target) {
4775  img->d3d11_format = _sg_d3d11_rendertarget_color_format(img->pixel_format);
4776  d3d11_tex_desc.Format = img->d3d11_format;
4777  d3d11_tex_desc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DEFAULT;
4778  if (img->sample_count == 1) {
4779  d3d11_tex_desc.BindFlags |= D3D11_BIND_RENDER_TARGET;
4780  }
4781  d3d11_tex_desc.CPUAccessFlags = 0;
4782  }
4783  else {
4784  img->d3d11_format = _sg_d3d11_texture_format(img->pixel_format);
4785  d3d11_tex_desc.Format = img->d3d11_format;
4786  d3d11_tex_desc.Usage = _sg_d3d11_usage(img->usage);
4787  d3d11_tex_desc.CPUAccessFlags = _sg_d3d11_cpu_access_flags(img->usage);
4788  }
4789  if (img->d3d11_format == DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
4790  /* trying to create a texture format that's not supported by D3D */
4791  SOKOL_LOG("trying to create a D3D11 texture with unsupported pixel format\n");
4792  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
4793  return;
4794  }
4795  d3d11_tex_desc.SampleDesc.Count = 1;
4796  d3d11_tex_desc.SampleDesc.Quality = 0;
4797  d3d11_tex_desc.MiscFlags = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? D3D11_RESOURCE_MISC_TEXTURECUBE : 0;
4798  if (injected) {
4799  img->d3d11_tex2d = (ID3D11Texture2D*) desc->d3d11_texture;
4800  ID3D11Texture2D_AddRef(img->d3d11_tex2d);
4801  }
4802  else {
4803  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateTexture2D(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_tex_desc, init_data, &img->d3d11_tex2d);
4804  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_tex2d);
4805  }
4806 
4807  /* also need to create a separate MSAA render target texture? */
4808  if (img->sample_count > 1) {
4809  d3d11_tex_desc.BindFlags |= D3D11_BIND_RENDER_TARGET;
4810  d3d11_tex_desc.SampleDesc.Count = img->sample_count;
4811  d3d11_tex_desc.SampleDesc.Quality = (UINT)D3D11_STANDARD_MULTISAMPLE_PATTERN;
4812  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateTexture2D(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_tex_desc, NULL, &img->d3d11_texmsaa);
4813  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_texmsaa);
4814  }
4815 
4816  /* shader-resource-view */
4817  D3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC d3d11_srv_desc;
4818  memset(&d3d11_srv_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_srv_desc));
4819  d3d11_srv_desc.Format = d3d11_tex_desc.Format;
4820  switch (img->type) {
4821  case SG_IMAGETYPE_2D:
4822  d3d11_srv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D;
4823  d3d11_srv_desc.Texture2D.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4824  break;
4825  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE:
4826  d3d11_srv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURECUBE;
4827  d3d11_srv_desc.TextureCube.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4828  break;
4829  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
4830  d3d11_srv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY;
4831  d3d11_srv_desc.Texture2DArray.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4832  d3d11_srv_desc.Texture2DArray.ArraySize = img->depth;
4833  break;
4834  default:
4835  SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; break;
4836  }
4837  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateShaderResourceView(_sg_d3d11.dev, (ID3D11Resource*)img->d3d11_tex2d, &d3d11_srv_desc, &img->d3d11_srv);
4838  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_srv);
4839  }
4840  else {
4841  /* 3D texture */
4842  D3D11_TEXTURE3D_DESC d3d11_tex_desc;
4843  memset(&d3d11_tex_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_tex_desc));
4844  d3d11_tex_desc.Width = img->width;
4845  d3d11_tex_desc.Height = img->height;
4846  d3d11_tex_desc.Depth = img->depth;
4847  d3d11_tex_desc.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4848  if (img->render_target) {
4849  img->d3d11_format = _sg_d3d11_rendertarget_color_format(img->pixel_format);
4850  d3d11_tex_desc.Format = img->d3d11_format;
4851  d3d11_tex_desc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DEFAULT;
4852  d3d11_tex_desc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE|D3D11_BIND_RENDER_TARGET;
4853  d3d11_tex_desc.CPUAccessFlags = 0;
4854  }
4855  else {
4856  img->d3d11_format = _sg_d3d11_texture_format(img->pixel_format);
4857  d3d11_tex_desc.Format = img->d3d11_format;
4858  d3d11_tex_desc.Usage = _sg_d3d11_usage(img->usage);
4859  d3d11_tex_desc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE;
4860  d3d11_tex_desc.CPUAccessFlags = _sg_d3d11_cpu_access_flags(img->usage);
4861  }
4862  if (img->d3d11_format == DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
4863  /* trying to create a texture format that's not supported by D3D */
4864  SOKOL_LOG("trying to create a D3D11 texture with unsupported pixel format\n");
4865  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
4866  return;
4867  }
4868  if (injected) {
4869  img->d3d11_tex3d = (ID3D11Texture3D*) desc->d3d11_texture;
4870  ID3D11Texture3D_AddRef(img->d3d11_tex3d);
4871  }
4872  else {
4873  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateTexture3D(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_tex_desc, init_data, &img->d3d11_tex3d);
4874  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_tex3d);
4875  }
4876 
4877  /* shader resource view for 3d texture */
4878  D3D11_SHADER_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC d3d11_srv_desc;
4879  memset(&d3d11_srv_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_srv_desc));
4880  d3d11_srv_desc.Format = d3d11_tex_desc.Format;
4881  d3d11_srv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE3D;
4882  d3d11_srv_desc.Texture3D.MipLevels = img->num_mipmaps;
4883  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateShaderResourceView(_sg_d3d11.dev, (ID3D11Resource*)img->d3d11_tex3d, &d3d11_srv_desc, &img->d3d11_srv);
4884  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_srv);
4885  }
4886 
4887  /* sampler state object, note D3D11 implements an internal shared-pool for sampler objects */
4888  D3D11_SAMPLER_DESC d3d11_smp_desc;
4889  memset(&d3d11_smp_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_smp_desc));
4890  d3d11_smp_desc.Filter = _sg_d3d11_filter(img->min_filter, img->mag_filter, img->max_anisotropy);
4891  d3d11_smp_desc.AddressU = _sg_d3d11_address_mode(img->wrap_u);
4892  d3d11_smp_desc.AddressV = _sg_d3d11_address_mode(img->wrap_v);
4893  d3d11_smp_desc.AddressW = _sg_d3d11_address_mode(img->wrap_w);
4894  d3d11_smp_desc.MaxAnisotropy = img->max_anisotropy;
4895  d3d11_smp_desc.ComparisonFunc = D3D11_COMPARISON_NEVER;
4896  d3d11_smp_desc.MinLOD = desc->min_lod;
4897  d3d11_smp_desc.MaxLOD = _sg_def_flt(desc->max_lod, D3D11_FLOAT32_MAX);
4898  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateSamplerState(_sg_d3d11.dev, &d3d11_smp_desc, &img->d3d11_smp);
4899  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && img->d3d11_smp);
4900  }
4901  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
4902 }
4903 
4904 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_image(_sg_image* img) {
4905  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
4906  if (img->d3d11_tex2d) {
4907  ID3D11Texture2D_Release(img->d3d11_tex2d);
4908  }
4909  if (img->d3d11_tex3d) {
4910  ID3D11Texture3D_Release(img->d3d11_tex3d);
4911  }
4912  if (img->d3d11_texds) {
4913  ID3D11Texture2D_Release(img->d3d11_texds);
4914  }
4915  if (img->d3d11_texmsaa) {
4916  ID3D11Texture2D_Release(img->d3d11_texmsaa);
4917  }
4918  if (img->d3d11_srv) {
4919  ID3D11ShaderResourceView_Release(img->d3d11_srv);
4920  }
4921  if (img->d3d11_smp) {
4922  ID3D11SamplerState_Release(img->d3d11_smp);
4923  }
4924  _sg_init_image_slot(img);
4925 }
4926 
4927 #if defined(SOKOL_D3D11_SHADER_COMPILER)
4928 _SOKOL_PRIVATE ID3DBlob* _sg_d3d11_compile_shader(const sg_shader_stage_desc* stage_desc, const char* target) {
4929  ID3DBlob* output = NULL;
4930  ID3DBlob* errors = NULL;
4931  D3DCompile(
4932  stage_desc->source, /* pSrcData */
4933  strlen(stage_desc->source), /* SrcDataSize */
4934  NULL, /* pSourceName */
4935  NULL, /* pDefines */
4936  NULL, /* pInclude */
4937  stage_desc->entry ? stage_desc->entry : "main", /* pEntryPoint */
4938  target, /* pTarget (vs_5_0 or ps_5_0) */
4939  D3DCOMPILE_PACK_MATRIX_COLUMN_MAJOR | D3DCOMPILE_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL3, /* Flags1 */
4940  0, /* Flags2 */
4941  &output, /* ppCode */
4942  &errors); /* ppErrorMsgs */
4943  if (errors) {
4944  SOKOL_LOG((LPCSTR)ID3D10Blob_GetBufferPointer(errors));
4945  ID3D10Blob_Release(errors); errors = NULL;
4946  }
4947  return output;
4948 }
4949 #endif
4950 
4951 #define _sg_d3d11_roundup(val, round_to) (((val)+((round_to)-1))&~((round_to)-1))
4952 
4953 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_shader(_sg_shader* shd, const sg_shader_desc* desc) {
4954  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && desc);
4955  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
4956  SOKOL_ASSERT(!shd->d3d11_vs && !shd->d3d11_fs && !shd->d3d11_vs_blob);
4957  HRESULT hr;
4958 
4959  /* shader stage uniform blocks and image slots */
4960  for (int stage_index = 0; stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES; stage_index++) {
4961  const sg_shader_stage_desc* stage_desc = (stage_index == SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS) ? &desc->vs : &desc->fs;
4962  _sg_shader_stage* stage = &shd->stage[stage_index];
4963  SOKOL_ASSERT(stage->num_uniform_blocks == 0);
4964  for (int ub_index = 0; ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS; ub_index++) {
4965  const sg_shader_uniform_block_desc* ub_desc = &stage_desc->uniform_blocks[ub_index];
4966  if (0 == ub_desc->size) {
4967  break;
4968  }
4969  _sg_uniform_block* ub = &stage->uniform_blocks[ub_index];
4970  ub->size = ub_desc->size;
4971 
4972  /* create a D3D constant buffer */
4973  SOKOL_ASSERT(!stage->d3d11_cbs[ub_index]);
4974  D3D11_BUFFER_DESC cb_desc;
4975  memset(&cb_desc, 0, sizeof(cb_desc));
4976  cb_desc.ByteWidth = _sg_d3d11_roundup(ub->size, 16);
4977  cb_desc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DEFAULT;
4978  cb_desc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_CONSTANT_BUFFER;
4979  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateBuffer(_sg_d3d11.dev, &cb_desc, NULL, &stage->d3d11_cbs[ub_index]);
4980  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && stage->d3d11_cbs[ub_index]);
4981 
4982  stage->num_uniform_blocks++;
4983  }
4984  SOKOL_ASSERT(stage->num_images == 0);
4985  for (int img_index = 0; img_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; img_index++) {
4986  const sg_shader_image_desc* img_desc = &stage_desc->images[img_index];
4987  if (img_desc->type == _SG_IMAGETYPE_DEFAULT) {
4988  break;
4989  }
4990  stage->images[img_index].type = img_desc->type;
4991  stage->num_images++;
4992  }
4993  }
4994 
4995  const void* vs_ptr = 0, *fs_ptr = 0;
4996  SIZE_T vs_length = 0, fs_length = 0;
4997  #if defined(SOKOL_D3D11_SHADER_COMPILER)
4998  ID3DBlob* vs_blob = 0, *fs_blob = 0;
4999  #endif
5000  if (desc->vs.byte_code && desc->fs.byte_code) {
5001  /* create from byte code */
5002  vs_ptr = desc->vs.byte_code;
5003  fs_ptr = desc->fs.byte_code;
5004  vs_length = desc->vs.byte_code_size;
5005  fs_length = desc->fs.byte_code_size;
5006  }
5007  else {
5008  /* compile shader code */
5009  #if defined(SOKOL_D3D11_SHADER_COMPILER)
5010  vs_blob = _sg_d3d11_compile_shader(&desc->vs, "vs_5_0");
5011  fs_blob = _sg_d3d11_compile_shader(&desc->fs, "ps_5_0");
5012  if (vs_blob && fs_blob) {
5013  vs_ptr = ID3D10Blob_GetBufferPointer(vs_blob);
5014  vs_length = ID3D10Blob_GetBufferSize(vs_blob);
5015  fs_ptr = ID3D10Blob_GetBufferPointer(fs_blob);
5016  fs_length = ID3D10Blob_GetBufferSize(fs_blob);
5017  }
5018  #endif
5019  }
5020  if (vs_ptr && fs_ptr && (vs_length > 0) && (fs_length > 0)) {
5021  /* create the D3D vertex- and pixel-shader objects */
5022  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateVertexShader(_sg_d3d11.dev, vs_ptr, vs_length, NULL, &shd->d3d11_vs);
5023  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && shd->d3d11_vs);
5024  hr = ID3D11Device_CreatePixelShader(_sg_d3d11.dev, fs_ptr, fs_length, NULL, &shd->d3d11_fs);
5025  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && shd->d3d11_fs);
5026 
5027  /* need to store the vertex shader byte code, this is needed later in sg_create_pipeline */
5028  shd->d3d11_vs_blob_length = (int)vs_length;
5029  shd->d3d11_vs_blob = SOKOL_MALLOC((int)vs_length);
5030  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->d3d11_vs_blob);
5031  memcpy(shd->d3d11_vs_blob, vs_ptr, vs_length);
5032 
5033  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
5034  }
5035  else {
5036  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
5037  }
5038  #if defined(SOKOL_D3D11_SHADER_COMPILER)
5039  if (vs_blob) {
5040  ID3D10Blob_Release(vs_blob); vs_blob = 0;
5041  }
5042  if (fs_blob) {
5043  ID3D10Blob_Release(fs_blob); fs_blob = 0;
5044  }
5045  #endif
5046 }
5047 
5048 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_shader(_sg_shader* shd) {
5049  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd);
5050  if (shd->d3d11_vs) {
5051  ID3D11VertexShader_Release(shd->d3d11_vs);
5052  }
5053  if (shd->d3d11_fs) {
5054  ID3D11PixelShader_Release(shd->d3d11_fs);
5055  }
5056  if (shd->d3d11_vs_blob) {
5057  SOKOL_FREE(shd->d3d11_vs_blob);
5058  }
5059  for (int stage_index = 0; stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES; stage_index++) {
5060  _sg_shader_stage* stage = &shd->stage[stage_index];
5061  for (int ub_index = 0; ub_index < stage->num_uniform_blocks; ub_index++) {
5062  if (stage->d3d11_cbs[ub_index]) {
5063  ID3D11Buffer_Release(stage->d3d11_cbs[ub_index]);
5064  }
5065  }
5066  }
5067  _sg_init_shader_slot(shd);
5068 }
5069 
5070 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_pipeline(_sg_pipeline* pip, _sg_shader* shd, const sg_pipeline_desc* desc) {
5071  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && shd && desc);
5072  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
5073  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->shader.id == shd->slot.id);
5074  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
5075  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->d3d11_vs_blob && shd->d3d11_vs_blob_length > 0);
5076  SOKOL_ASSERT(!pip->d3d11_il && !pip->d3d11_rs && !pip->d3d11_dss && !pip->d3d11_bs);
5077  HRESULT hr;
5078 
5079  pip->shader = shd;
5080  pip->shader_id = desc->shader;
5081  pip->index_type = _sg_def(desc->index_type, SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE);
5082  pip->color_attachment_count = _sg_def(desc->blend.color_attachment_count, 1);
5083  pip->color_format = _sg_def(desc->blend.color_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8);
5084  pip->depth_format = _sg_def(desc->blend.depth_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL);
5085  pip->sample_count = _sg_def(desc->rasterizer.sample_count, 1);
5086  pip->d3d11_index_format = _sg_d3d11_index_format(pip->index_type);
5087  pip->d3d11_topology = _sg_d3d11_primitive_topology(_sg_def(desc->primitive_type, SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_TRIANGLES));
5088  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
5089  pip->blend_color[i] = desc->blend.blend_color[i];
5090  }
5091  pip->d3d11_stencil_ref = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_ref;
5092 
5093  /* create input layout object */
5094  int auto_offset[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
5095  for (int layout_index = 0; layout_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; layout_index++) {
5096  auto_offset[layout_index] = 0;
5097  }
5098  bool use_auto_offset = true;
5099  for (int attr_index = 0; attr_index < SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES; attr_index++) {
5100  /* to use computed offsets, all attr offsets must be 0 */
5101  if (desc->layout.attrs[attr_index].offset != 0) {
5102  use_auto_offset = false;
5103  }
5104  }
5105  D3D11_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC d3d11_comps[SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES];
5106  memset(d3d11_comps, 0, sizeof(d3d11_comps));
5107  int attr_index = 0;
5108  for (; attr_index < SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES; attr_index++) {
5109  const sg_vertex_attr_desc* a_desc = &desc->layout.attrs[attr_index];
5110  if (a_desc->format == SG_VERTEXFORMAT_INVALID) {
5111  break;
5112  }
5113  SOKOL_ASSERT((a_desc->buffer_index >= 0) && (a_desc->buffer_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS));
5114  const sg_buffer_layout_desc* l_desc = &desc->layout.buffers[a_desc->buffer_index];
5115  const sg_vertex_step step_func = _sg_def(l_desc->step_func, SG_VERTEXSTEP_PER_VERTEX);
5116  const int step_rate = _sg_def(l_desc->step_rate, 1);
5117  D3D11_INPUT_ELEMENT_DESC* d3d11_comp = &d3d11_comps[attr_index];
5118  d3d11_comp->SemanticName = a_desc->sem_name;
5119  d3d11_comp->SemanticIndex = a_desc->sem_index;
5120  d3d11_comp->Format = _sg_d3d11_vertex_format(a_desc->format);
5121  d3d11_comp->InputSlot = a_desc->buffer_index;
5122  d3d11_comp->AlignedByteOffset = use_auto_offset ? auto_offset[a_desc->buffer_index] : a_desc->offset;
5123  d3d11_comp->InputSlotClass = _sg_d3d11_input_classification(step_func);
5124  if (SG_VERTEXSTEP_PER_INSTANCE == step_func) {
5125  d3d11_comp->InstanceDataStepRate = step_rate;
5126  }
5127  auto_offset[a_desc->buffer_index] += _sg_vertexformat_bytesize(a_desc->format);
5128  pip->vertex_layout_valid[a_desc->buffer_index] = true;
5129  }
5130  for (int layout_index = 0; layout_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; layout_index++) {
5131  if (pip->vertex_layout_valid[layout_index]) {
5132  const sg_buffer_layout_desc* l_desc = &desc->layout.buffers[layout_index];
5133  const int stride = l_desc->stride ? l_desc->stride : auto_offset[layout_index];
5134  SOKOL_ASSERT(stride > 0);
5135  pip->d3d11_vb_strides[layout_index] = stride;
5136  }
5137  else {
5138  pip->d3d11_vb_strides[layout_index] = 0;
5139  }
5140  }
5141  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateInputLayout(_sg_d3d11.dev,
5142  d3d11_comps, /* pInputElementDesc */
5143  attr_index, /* NumElements */
5144  shd->d3d11_vs_blob, /* pShaderByteCodeWithInputSignature */
5145  shd->d3d11_vs_blob_length, /* BytecodeLength */
5146  &pip->d3d11_il);
5147  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pip->d3d11_il);
5148 
5149  /* create rasterizer state */
5150  D3D11_RASTERIZER_DESC rs_desc;
5151  memset(&rs_desc, 0, sizeof(rs_desc));
5152  rs_desc.FillMode = D3D11_FILL_SOLID;
5153  rs_desc.CullMode = _sg_d3d11_cull_mode(_sg_def(desc->rasterizer.cull_mode, SG_CULLMODE_NONE));
5154  rs_desc.FrontCounterClockwise = _sg_def(desc->rasterizer.face_winding, SG_FACEWINDING_CW) == SG_FACEWINDING_CCW;
5155  rs_desc.DepthBias = (INT) desc->rasterizer.depth_bias;
5156  rs_desc.DepthBiasClamp = desc->rasterizer.depth_bias_clamp;
5157  rs_desc.SlopeScaledDepthBias = desc->rasterizer.depth_bias_slope_scale;
5158  rs_desc.DepthClipEnable = TRUE;
5159  rs_desc.ScissorEnable = TRUE;
5160  rs_desc.MultisampleEnable = _sg_def(desc->rasterizer.sample_count, 1) > 1;
5161  rs_desc.AntialiasedLineEnable = FALSE;
5162  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateRasterizerState(_sg_d3d11.dev, &rs_desc, &pip->d3d11_rs);
5163  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pip->d3d11_rs);
5164 
5165  /* create depth-stencil state */
5166  D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC dss_desc;
5167  memset(&dss_desc, 0, sizeof(dss_desc));
5168  dss_desc.DepthEnable = TRUE;
5169  dss_desc.DepthWriteMask = desc->depth_stencil.depth_write_enabled ? D3D11_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK_ALL : D3D11_DEPTH_WRITE_MASK_ZERO;
5170  dss_desc.DepthFunc = _sg_d3d11_compare_func(_sg_def(desc->depth_stencil.depth_compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
5171  dss_desc.StencilEnable = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_enabled;
5172  dss_desc.StencilReadMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_read_mask;
5173  dss_desc.StencilWriteMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_write_mask;
5174  const sg_stencil_state* sf = &desc->depth_stencil.stencil_front;
5175  dss_desc.FrontFace.StencilFailOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5176  dss_desc.FrontFace.StencilDepthFailOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->depth_fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5177  dss_desc.FrontFace.StencilPassOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->pass_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5178  dss_desc.FrontFace.StencilFunc = _sg_d3d11_compare_func(_sg_def(sf->compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
5179  const sg_stencil_state* sb = &desc->depth_stencil.stencil_back;
5180  dss_desc.BackFace.StencilFailOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5181  dss_desc.BackFace.StencilDepthFailOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->depth_fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5182  dss_desc.BackFace.StencilPassOp = _sg_d3d11_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->pass_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
5183  dss_desc.BackFace.StencilFunc = _sg_d3d11_compare_func(_sg_def(sb->compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
5184  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateDepthStencilState(_sg_d3d11.dev, &dss_desc, &pip->d3d11_dss);
5185  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pip->d3d11_dss);
5186 
5187  /* create blend state */
5188  D3D11_BLEND_DESC bs_desc;
5189  memset(&bs_desc, 0, sizeof(bs_desc));
5190  bs_desc.AlphaToCoverageEnable = desc->rasterizer.alpha_to_coverage_enabled;
5191  bs_desc.IndependentBlendEnable = FALSE;
5192  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].BlendEnable = desc->blend.enabled;
5193  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].SrcBlend = _sg_d3d11_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.src_factor_rgb, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE));
5194  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].DestBlend = _sg_d3d11_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.dst_factor_rgb, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ZERO));
5195  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].BlendOp = _sg_d3d11_blend_op(_sg_def(desc->blend.op_rgb, SG_BLENDOP_ADD));
5196  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].SrcBlendAlpha = _sg_d3d11_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.src_factor_alpha, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE));
5197  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].DestBlendAlpha = _sg_d3d11_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.dst_factor_alpha, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ZERO));
5198  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].BlendOpAlpha = _sg_d3d11_blend_op(_sg_def(desc->blend.op_alpha, SG_BLENDOP_ADD));
5199  bs_desc.RenderTarget[0].RenderTargetWriteMask = _sg_d3d11_color_write_mask(_sg_def((sg_color_mask)desc->blend.color_write_mask, SG_COLORMASK_RGBA));
5200  hr = ID3D11Device_CreateBlendState(_sg_d3d11.dev, &bs_desc, &pip->d3d11_bs);
5201  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pip->d3d11_bs);
5202 
5203  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
5204 }
5205 
5206 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_pipeline(_sg_pipeline* pip) {
5207  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
5208  if (pip->d3d11_il) {
5209  ID3D11InputLayout_Release(pip->d3d11_il);
5210  }
5211  if (pip->d3d11_rs) {
5212  ID3D11RasterizerState_Release(pip->d3d11_rs);
5213  }
5214  if (pip->d3d11_dss) {
5215  ID3D11DepthStencilState_Release(pip->d3d11_dss);
5216  }
5217  if (pip->d3d11_bs) {
5218  ID3D11BlendState_Release(pip->d3d11_bs);
5219  }
5220  _sg_init_pipeline_slot(pip);
5221 }
5222 
5223 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_pass(_sg_pass* pass, _sg_image** att_images, const sg_pass_desc* desc) {
5224  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass && desc);
5225  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
5226  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images && att_images[0]);
5227  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.dev);
5228 
5229  const sg_attachment_desc* att_desc;
5230  _sg_attachment* att;
5231  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
5232  SOKOL_ASSERT(0 == pass->color_atts[i].image);
5233  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass->d3d11_rtvs[i] == 0);
5234  att_desc = &desc->color_attachments[i];
5235  if (att_desc->image.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
5236  pass->num_color_atts++;
5237  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images[i] && (att_images[i]->slot.id == att_desc->image.id));
5238  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_color_format(att_images[i]->pixel_format));
5239  att = &pass->color_atts[i];
5240  SOKOL_ASSERT((att->image == 0) && (att->image_id.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
5241  att->image = att_images[i];
5242  att->image_id = att_desc->image;
5243  att->mip_level = att_desc->mip_level;
5244  att->slice = att_desc->slice;
5245 
5246  /* create D3D11 render-target-view */
5247  ID3D11Resource* d3d11_res = 0;
5248  const bool is_msaa = att->image->sample_count > 1;
5249  D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC d3d11_rtv_desc;
5250  memset(&d3d11_rtv_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_rtv_desc));
5251  d3d11_rtv_desc.Format = att->image->d3d11_format;
5252  switch (att->image->type) {
5253  case SG_IMAGETYPE_2D:
5254  if (is_msaa) {
5255  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_texmsaa;
5256  d3d11_rtv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS;
5257  }
5258  else {
5259  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_tex2d;
5260  d3d11_rtv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D;
5261  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2D.MipSlice = att->mip_level;
5262  }
5263  break;
5264  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE:
5265  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
5266  if (is_msaa) {
5267  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_texmsaa;
5268  d3d11_rtv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY;
5269  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2DMSArray.FirstArraySlice = att->slice;
5270  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2DMSArray.ArraySize = 1;
5271  }
5272  else {
5273  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_tex2d;
5274  d3d11_rtv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY;
5275  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2DArray.MipSlice = att->mip_level;
5276  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2DArray.FirstArraySlice = att->slice;
5277  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture2DArray.ArraySize = 1;
5278  }
5279  break;
5280  case SG_IMAGETYPE_3D:
5281  SOKOL_ASSERT(!is_msaa);
5282  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_tex3d;
5283  d3d11_rtv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE3D;
5284  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture3D.MipSlice = att->mip_level;
5285  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture3D.FirstWSlice = att->slice;
5286  d3d11_rtv_desc.Texture3D.WSize = 1;
5287  break;
5288  default:
5289  SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; break;
5290  }
5291  SOKOL_ASSERT(d3d11_res);
5292  HRESULT hr = ID3D11Device_CreateRenderTargetView(_sg_d3d11.dev, d3d11_res, &d3d11_rtv_desc, &pass->d3d11_rtvs[i]);
5293  _SOKOL_UNUSED(hr);
5294  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pass->d3d11_rtvs[i]);
5295  }
5296  }
5297 
5298  /* optional depth-stencil image */
5299  SOKOL_ASSERT(0 == pass->ds_att.image);
5300  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass->d3d11_dsv == 0);
5301  att_desc = &desc->depth_stencil_attachment;
5302  const int ds_img_index = SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS;
5303  if (att_desc->image.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
5304  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images[ds_img_index] && (att_images[ds_img_index]->slot.id == att_desc->image.id));
5305  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(att_images[ds_img_index]->pixel_format));
5306  att = &pass->ds_att;
5307  SOKOL_ASSERT((att->image == 0) && (att->image_id.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
5308  att->image = att_images[ds_img_index];
5309  att->image_id = att_desc->image;
5310  att->mip_level = att_desc->mip_level;
5311  att->slice = att_desc->slice;
5312 
5313  /* create D3D11 depth-stencil-view */
5314  D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC d3d11_dsv_desc;
5315  memset(&d3d11_dsv_desc, 0, sizeof(d3d11_dsv_desc));
5316  d3d11_dsv_desc.Format = att->image->d3d11_format;
5317  const bool is_msaa = att->image->sample_count > 1;
5318  if (is_msaa) {
5319  d3d11_dsv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS;
5320  }
5321  else {
5322  d3d11_dsv_desc.ViewDimension = D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D;
5323  }
5324  ID3D11Resource* d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) att->image->d3d11_texds;
5325  SOKOL_ASSERT(d3d11_res);
5326  HRESULT hr = ID3D11Device_CreateDepthStencilView(_sg_d3d11.dev, d3d11_res, &d3d11_dsv_desc, &pass->d3d11_dsv);
5327  _SOKOL_UNUSED(hr);
5328  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr) && pass->d3d11_dsv);
5329  }
5330  pass->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
5331 }
5332 
5333 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_pass(_sg_pass* pass) {
5334  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass);
5335  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
5336  if (pass->d3d11_rtvs[i]) {
5337  ID3D11RenderTargetView_Release(pass->d3d11_rtvs[i]);
5338  }
5339  }
5340  if (pass->d3d11_dsv) {
5341  ID3D11DepthStencilView_Release(pass->d3d11_dsv);
5342  }
5343  _sg_init_pass_slot(pass);
5344 }
5345 
5346 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_begin_pass(_sg_pass* pass, const sg_pass_action* action, int w, int h) {
5347  SOKOL_ASSERT(action);
5348  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5349  _sg_d3d11.in_pass = true;
5350  _sg_d3d11.cur_width = w;
5351  _sg_d3d11.cur_height = h;
5352  if (pass) {
5353  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass = pass;
5354  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass_id.id = pass->slot.id;
5355  _sg_d3d11.num_rtvs = 0;
5356  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
5357  _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[i] = pass->d3d11_rtvs[i];
5358  if (_sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[i]) {
5359  _sg_d3d11.num_rtvs++;
5360  }
5361  }
5362  _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv = pass->d3d11_dsv;
5363  }
5364  else {
5365  /* render to default frame buffer */
5366  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass = 0;
5367  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
5368  _sg_d3d11.num_rtvs = 1;
5369  _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[0] = (ID3D11RenderTargetView*) _sg_d3d11.rtv_cb();
5370  for (int i = 1; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
5371  _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[i] = 0;
5372  }
5373  _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv = (ID3D11DepthStencilView*) _sg_d3d11.dsv_cb();
5374  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[0] && _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv);
5375  }
5376  /* apply the render-target- and depth-stencil-views */
5377  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetRenderTargets(_sg_d3d11.ctx, SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS, _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs, _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv);
5378 
5379  /* set viewport and scissor rect to cover whole screen */
5380  D3D11_VIEWPORT vp;
5381  memset(&vp, 0, sizeof(vp));
5382  vp.Width = (FLOAT) w;
5383  vp.Height = (FLOAT) h;
5384  vp.MaxDepth = 1.0f;
5385  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetViewports(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 1, &vp);
5386  D3D11_RECT rect;
5387  rect.left = 0;
5388  rect.top = 0;
5389  rect.right = w;
5390  rect.bottom = h;
5391  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetScissorRects(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 1, &rect);
5392 
5393  /* perform clear action */
5394  for (int i = 0; i < _sg_d3d11.num_rtvs; i++) {
5395  if (action->colors[i].action == SG_ACTION_CLEAR) {
5396  ID3D11DeviceContext_ClearRenderTargetView(_sg_d3d11.ctx, _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[i], action->colors[i].val);
5397  }
5398  }
5399  UINT ds_flags = 0;
5400  if (action->depth.action == SG_ACTION_CLEAR) {
5401  ds_flags |= D3D11_CLEAR_DEPTH;
5402  }
5403  if (action->stencil.action == SG_ACTION_CLEAR) {
5404  ds_flags |= D3D11_CLEAR_STENCIL;
5405  }
5406  if ((0 != ds_flags) && _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv) {
5407  ID3D11DeviceContext_ClearDepthStencilView(_sg_d3d11.ctx, _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv, ds_flags, action->depth.val, action->stencil.val);
5408  }
5409 }
5410 
5411 /* D3D11CalcSubresource only exists for C++ */
5412 _SOKOL_PRIVATE UINT _sg_d3d11_calcsubresource(UINT mip_slice, UINT array_slice, UINT mip_levels) {
5413  return mip_slice + array_slice * mip_levels;
5414 }
5415 
5416 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_end_pass() {
5417  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.in_pass && _sg_d3d11.ctx);
5418  _sg_d3d11.in_pass = false;
5419 
5420  /* need to resolve MSAA render target into texture? */
5421  if (_sg_d3d11.cur_pass) {
5422  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.cur_pass->slot.id == _sg_d3d11.cur_pass_id.id);
5423  for (int i = 0; i < _sg_d3d11.num_rtvs; i++) {
5424  _sg_attachment* att = &_sg_d3d11.cur_pass->color_atts[i];
5425  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image && (att->image->slot.id == att->image_id.id));
5426  if (att->image->sample_count > 1) {
5427  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->d3d11_tex2d && att->image->d3d11_texmsaa && !att->image->d3d11_tex3d);
5428  SOKOL_ASSERT(DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN != att->image->d3d11_format);
5429  const _sg_image* img = att->image;
5430  UINT subres = _sg_d3d11_calcsubresource(att->mip_level, att->slice, img->num_mipmaps);
5431  ID3D11DeviceContext_ResolveSubresource(_sg_d3d11.ctx,
5432  (ID3D11Resource*) img->d3d11_tex2d, /* pDstResource */
5433  subres, /* DstSubresource */
5434  (ID3D11Resource*) img->d3d11_texmsaa, /* pSrcResource */
5435  subres, /* SrcSubresource */
5436  img->d3d11_format);
5437  }
5438  }
5439  }
5440  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass = 0;
5441  _sg_d3d11.cur_pass_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
5442  _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline = 0;
5443  _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
5444  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
5445  _sg_d3d11.cur_rtvs[i] = 0;
5446  }
5447  _sg_d3d11.cur_dsv = 0;
5448  _sg_d3d11_clear_state();
5449 }
5450 
5451 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_viewport(int x, int y, int w, int h, bool origin_top_left) {
5452  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx);
5453  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5454  D3D11_VIEWPORT vp;
5455  vp.TopLeftX = (FLOAT) x;
5456  vp.TopLeftY = (FLOAT) (origin_top_left ? y : (_sg_d3d11.cur_height - (y + h)));
5457  vp.Width = (FLOAT) w;
5458  vp.Height = (FLOAT) h;
5459  vp.MinDepth = 0.0f;
5460  vp.MaxDepth = 1.0f;
5461  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetViewports(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 1, &vp);
5462 }
5463 
5464 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_scissor_rect(int x, int y, int w, int h, bool origin_top_left) {
5465  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx);
5466  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5467  D3D11_RECT rect;
5468  rect.left = x;
5469  rect.top = (origin_top_left ? y : (_sg_d3d11.cur_height - (y + h)));
5470  rect.right = x + w;
5471  rect.bottom = origin_top_left ? (y + h) : (_sg_d3d11.cur_height - y);
5472  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetScissorRects(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 1, &rect);
5473 }
5474 
5475 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_draw_state(
5476  _sg_pipeline* pip,
5477  _sg_buffer** vbs, const uint32_t* vb_offsets, int num_vbs,
5478  _sg_buffer* ib, uint32_t ib_offset,
5479  _sg_image** vs_imgs, int num_vs_imgs,
5480  _sg_image** fs_imgs, int num_fs_imgs)
5481 {
5482  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
5483  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->shader);
5484  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx);
5485  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5486  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->d3d11_rs && pip->d3d11_bs && pip->d3d11_dss && pip->d3d11_il);
5487 
5488  _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline = pip;
5489  _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline_id.id = pip->slot.id;
5490  _sg_d3d11.use_indexed_draw = (pip->d3d11_index_format != DXGI_FORMAT_UNKNOWN);
5491 
5492  /* gather all the D3D11 resources into arrays */
5493  ID3D11Buffer* d3d11_ib = ib ? ib->d3d11_buf : 0;
5494  ID3D11Buffer* d3d11_vbs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
5495  UINT d3d11_vb_offsets[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
5496  ID3D11ShaderResourceView* d3d11_vs_srvs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
5497  ID3D11SamplerState* d3d11_vs_smps[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
5498  ID3D11ShaderResourceView* d3d11_fs_srvs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
5499  ID3D11SamplerState* d3d11_fs_smps[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
5500  int i;
5501  for (i = 0; i < num_vbs; i++) {
5502  SOKOL_ASSERT(vbs[i]->d3d11_buf);
5503  d3d11_vbs[i] = vbs[i]->d3d11_buf;
5504  d3d11_vb_offsets[i] = vb_offsets[i];
5505  }
5506  for (; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; i++) {
5507  d3d11_vbs[i] = 0;
5508  d3d11_vb_offsets[i] = 0;
5509  }
5510  for (i = 0; i < num_vs_imgs; i++) {
5511  SOKOL_ASSERT(vs_imgs[i]->d3d11_srv);
5512  SOKOL_ASSERT(vs_imgs[i]->d3d11_smp);
5513  d3d11_vs_srvs[i] = vs_imgs[i]->d3d11_srv;
5514  d3d11_vs_smps[i] = vs_imgs[i]->d3d11_smp;
5515  }
5516  for (; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++) {
5517  d3d11_vs_srvs[i] = 0;
5518  d3d11_vs_smps[i] = 0;
5519  }
5520  for (i = 0; i < num_fs_imgs; i++) {
5521  SOKOL_ASSERT(fs_imgs[i]->d3d11_srv);
5522  SOKOL_ASSERT(fs_imgs[i]->d3d11_smp);
5523  d3d11_fs_srvs[i] = fs_imgs[i]->d3d11_srv;
5524  d3d11_fs_smps[i] = fs_imgs[i]->d3d11_smp;
5525  }
5526  for (; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++) {
5527  d3d11_fs_srvs[i] = 0;
5528  d3d11_fs_smps[i] = 0;
5529  }
5530 
5531  /* FIXME: is it worth it to implement a state cache here? measure! */
5532  ID3D11DeviceContext_RSSetState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->d3d11_rs);
5533  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetDepthStencilState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->d3d11_dss, pip->d3d11_stencil_ref);
5534  ID3D11DeviceContext_OMSetBlendState(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->d3d11_bs, pip->blend_color, 0xFFFFFFFF);
5535 
5536  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetVertexBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS, d3d11_vbs, pip->d3d11_vb_strides, d3d11_vb_offsets);
5537  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetPrimitiveTopology(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->d3d11_topology);
5538  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetIndexBuffer(_sg_d3d11.ctx, d3d11_ib, pip->d3d11_index_format, ib_offset);
5539  ID3D11DeviceContext_IASetInputLayout(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->d3d11_il);
5540 
5541  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetShader(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->shader->d3d11_vs, NULL, 0);
5542  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetConstantBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS, pip->shader->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].d3d11_cbs);
5543  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetShaderResources(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, d3d11_vs_srvs);
5544  ID3D11DeviceContext_VSSetSamplers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, d3d11_vs_smps);
5545 
5546  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetShader(_sg_d3d11.ctx, pip->shader->d3d11_fs, NULL, 0);
5547  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetConstantBuffers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS, pip->shader->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].d3d11_cbs);
5548  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetShaderResources(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, d3d11_fs_srvs);
5549  ID3D11DeviceContext_PSSetSamplers(_sg_d3d11.ctx, 0, SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES, d3d11_fs_smps);
5550 }
5551 
5552 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_uniform_block(sg_shader_stage stage_index, int ub_index, const void* data, int num_bytes) {
5553  _SOKOL_UNUSED(num_bytes);
5554  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx && _sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5555  SOKOL_ASSERT(data && (num_bytes > 0));
5556  SOKOL_ASSERT((stage_index >= 0) && (stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES));
5557  SOKOL_ASSERT((ub_index >= 0) && (ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS));
5558  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline && _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->slot.id == _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline_id.id);
5559  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader && _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader->slot.id == _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader_id.id);
5560  SOKOL_ASSERT(ub_index < _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader->stage[stage_index].num_uniform_blocks);
5561  SOKOL_ASSERT(num_bytes == _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader->stage[stage_index].uniform_blocks[ub_index].size);
5562  ID3D11Buffer* cb = _sg_d3d11.cur_pipeline->shader->stage[stage_index].d3d11_cbs[ub_index];
5563  SOKOL_ASSERT(cb);
5564  ID3D11DeviceContext_UpdateSubresource(_sg_d3d11.ctx, (ID3D11Resource*)cb, 0, NULL, data, 0, 0);
5565 }
5566 
5567 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_draw(int base_element, int num_elements, int num_instances) {
5568  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5569  if (_sg_d3d11.use_indexed_draw) {
5570  if (1 == num_instances) {
5571  ID3D11DeviceContext_DrawIndexed(_sg_d3d11.ctx, num_elements, base_element, 0);
5572  }
5573  else {
5574  ID3D11DeviceContext_DrawIndexedInstanced(_sg_d3d11.ctx, num_elements, num_instances, base_element, 0, 0);
5575  }
5576  }
5577  else {
5578  if (1 == num_instances) {
5579  ID3D11DeviceContext_Draw(_sg_d3d11.ctx, num_elements, base_element);
5580  }
5581  else {
5582  ID3D11DeviceContext_DrawInstanced(_sg_d3d11.ctx, num_elements, num_instances, base_element, 0);
5583  }
5584  }
5585 }
5586 
5587 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_commit() {
5588  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_d3d11.in_pass);
5589 }
5590 
5591 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_update_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf, const void* data_ptr, int data_size) {
5592  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && data_ptr && data_size);
5593  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx);
5594  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf->d3d11_buf);
5595  D3D11_MAPPED_SUBRESOURCE d3d11_msr;
5596  HRESULT hr = ID3D11DeviceContext_Map(_sg_d3d11.ctx, (ID3D11Resource*)buf->d3d11_buf, 0, D3D11_MAP_WRITE_DISCARD, 0, &d3d11_msr);
5597  _SOKOL_UNUSED(hr);
5598  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr));
5599  memcpy(d3d11_msr.pData, data_ptr, data_size);
5600  ID3D11DeviceContext_Unmap(_sg_d3d11.ctx, (ID3D11Resource*)buf->d3d11_buf, 0);
5601 }
5602 
5603 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_update_image(_sg_image* img, const sg_image_content* data) {
5604  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && data);
5605  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_d3d11.ctx);
5606  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->d3d11_tex2d || img->d3d11_tex3d);
5607  ID3D11Resource* d3d11_res = 0;
5608  if (img->d3d11_tex3d) {
5609  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) img->d3d11_tex3d;
5610  }
5611  else {
5612  d3d11_res = (ID3D11Resource*) img->d3d11_tex2d;
5613  }
5614  SOKOL_ASSERT(d3d11_res);
5615  const int num_faces = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? 6:1;
5616  const int num_slices = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY) ? img->depth:1;
5617  int subres_index = 0;
5618  HRESULT hr;
5619  D3D11_MAPPED_SUBRESOURCE d3d11_msr;
5620  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < num_faces; face_index++) {
5621  for (int slice_index = 0; slice_index < num_slices; slice_index++) {
5622  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < img->num_mipmaps; mip_index++, subres_index++) {
5623  SOKOL_ASSERT(subres_index < (SG_MAX_MIPMAPS * SG_MAX_TEXTUREARRAY_LAYERS));
5624  const int mip_width = ((img->width>>mip_index)>0) ? img->width>>mip_index : 1;
5625  const int mip_height = ((img->height>>mip_index)>0) ? img->height>>mip_index : 1;
5626  const int src_pitch = _sg_row_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width);
5627  const sg_subimage_content* subimg_content = &(data->subimage[face_index][mip_index]);
5628  const int slice_size = subimg_content->size / num_slices;
5629  const int slice_offset = slice_size * slice_index;
5630  const uint8_t* slice_ptr = ((const uint8_t*)subimg_content->ptr) + slice_offset;
5631  hr = ID3D11DeviceContext_Map(_sg_d3d11.ctx, d3d11_res, subres_index, D3D11_MAP_WRITE_DISCARD, 0, &d3d11_msr);
5632  SOKOL_ASSERT(SUCCEEDED(hr));
5633  /* FIXME: need to handle difference in depth-pitch for 3D textures as well! */
5634  if (src_pitch == (int)d3d11_msr.RowPitch) {
5635  memcpy(d3d11_msr.pData, slice_ptr, slice_size);
5636  }
5637  else {
5638  SOKOL_ASSERT(src_pitch < (int)d3d11_msr.RowPitch);
5639  const uint8_t* src_ptr = slice_ptr;
5640  uint8_t* dst_ptr = (uint8_t*) d3d11_msr.pData;
5641  for (int row_index = 0; row_index < mip_height; row_index++) {
5642  memcpy(dst_ptr, src_ptr, src_pitch);
5643  src_ptr += src_pitch;
5644  dst_ptr += d3d11_msr.RowPitch;
5645  }
5646  }
5647  ID3D11DeviceContext_Unmap(_sg_d3d11.ctx, d3d11_res, subres_index);
5648  }
5649  }
5650  }
5651 }
5652 
5653 /*== METAL BACKEND ===========================================================*/
5654 #elif defined(SOKOL_METAL)
5655 
5656 #if !__has_feature(objc_arc)
5657 #error "Please enable ARC when using the Metal backend"
5658 #endif
5659 
5660 /* memset() */
5661 #include <string.h>
5662 #include <TargetConditionals.h>
5663 #import <Metal/Metal.h>
5664 
5665 enum {
5666  _SG_MTL_DEFAULT_UB_SIZE = 4 * 1024 * 1024,
5667  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
5668  _SG_MTL_UB_ALIGN = 256,
5669  #else
5670  _SG_MTL_UB_ALIGN = 16,
5671  #endif
5672  _SG_MTL_DEFAULT_SAMPLER_CACHE_CAPACITY = 64,
5673  _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX = 0xFFFFFFFF
5674 };
5675 
5676 /*-- enum translation functions ----------------------------------------------*/
5677 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLLoadAction _sg_mtl_load_action(sg_action a) {
5678  switch (a) {
5679  case SG_ACTION_CLEAR: return MTLLoadActionClear;
5680  case SG_ACTION_LOAD: return MTLLoadActionLoad;
5681  case SG_ACTION_DONTCARE: return MTLLoadActionDontCare;
5682  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLLoadAction)0;
5683  }
5684 }
5685 
5686 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLResourceOptions _sg_mtl_buffer_resource_options(sg_usage usg) {
5687  switch (usg) {
5688  case SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE:
5689  return MTLResourceStorageModeShared;
5690  case SG_USAGE_DYNAMIC:
5691  case SG_USAGE_STREAM:
5692  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
5693  return MTLCPUCacheModeWriteCombined|MTLResourceStorageModeManaged;
5694  #else
5695  return MTLCPUCacheModeWriteCombined;
5696  #endif
5697  default:
5698  SOKOL_UNREACHABLE;
5699  return 0;
5700  }
5701 }
5702 
5703 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLVertexStepFunction _sg_mtl_step_function(sg_vertex_step step) {
5704  switch (step) {
5705  case SG_VERTEXSTEP_PER_VERTEX: return MTLVertexStepFunctionPerVertex;
5706  case SG_VERTEXSTEP_PER_INSTANCE: return MTLVertexStepFunctionPerInstance;
5707  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLVertexStepFunction)0;
5708  }
5709 }
5710 
5711 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLVertexFormat _sg_mtl_vertex_format(sg_vertex_format fmt) {
5712  switch (fmt) {
5713  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_FLOAT: return MTLVertexFormatFloat;
5714  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_FLOAT2: return MTLVertexFormatFloat2;
5715  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_FLOAT3: return MTLVertexFormatFloat3;
5716  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_FLOAT4: return MTLVertexFormatFloat4;
5717  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_BYTE4: return MTLVertexFormatChar4;
5718  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_BYTE4N: return MTLVertexFormatChar4Normalized;
5719  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_UBYTE4: return MTLVertexFormatUChar4;
5720  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_UBYTE4N: return MTLVertexFormatUChar4Normalized;
5721  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_SHORT2: return MTLVertexFormatShort2;
5722  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_SHORT2N: return MTLVertexFormatShort2Normalized;
5723  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_SHORT4: return MTLVertexFormatShort4;
5724  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_SHORT4N: return MTLVertexFormatShort4Normalized;
5725  case SG_VERTEXFORMAT_UINT10_N2: return MTLVertexFormatUInt1010102Normalized;
5726  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLVertexFormat)0;
5727  }
5728 }
5729 
5730 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLPrimitiveType _sg_mtl_primitive_type(sg_primitive_type t) {
5731  switch (t) {
5732  case SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_POINTS: return MTLPrimitiveTypePoint;
5733  case SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_LINES: return MTLPrimitiveTypeLine;
5734  case SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_LINE_STRIP: return MTLPrimitiveTypeLineStrip;
5735  case SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_TRIANGLES: return MTLPrimitiveTypeTriangle;
5736  case SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_TRIANGLE_STRIP: return MTLPrimitiveTypeTriangleStrip;
5737  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLPrimitiveType)0;
5738  }
5739 }
5740 
5741 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLPixelFormat _sg_mtl_texture_format(sg_pixel_format fmt) {
5742  switch (fmt) {
5743  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8: return MTLPixelFormatRGBA8Unorm;
5744  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_R10G10B10A2: return MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Unorm;
5745  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA32F: return MTLPixelFormatRGBA32Float;
5746  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA16F: return MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Float;
5747  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_R32F: return MTLPixelFormatR32Float;
5748  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_R16F: return MTLPixelFormatR16Float;
5749  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_L8: return MTLPixelFormatR8Unorm;
5750  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
5751  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DXT1: return MTLPixelFormatBC1_RGBA;
5752  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DXT3: return MTLPixelFormatBC2_RGBA;
5753  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DXT5: return MTLPixelFormatBC3_RGBA;
5754  #else
5755  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC2_RGB: return MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_2BPP;
5756  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC4_RGB: return MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGB_4BPP;
5757  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC2_RGBA: return MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_2BPP;
5758  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC4_RGBA: return MTLPixelFormatPVRTC_RGBA_4BPP;
5759  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_ETC2_RGB8: return MTLPixelFormatETC2_RGB8;
5760  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_ETC2_SRGB8: return MTLPixelFormatETC2_RGB8_sRGB;
5761  #endif
5762  default: return MTLPixelFormatInvalid;
5763  }
5764 }
5765 
5766 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLPixelFormat _sg_mtl_rendertarget_color_format(sg_pixel_format fmt) {
5767  switch (fmt) {
5768  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8: return MTLPixelFormatBGRA8Unorm; /* not a bug */
5769  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA32F: return MTLPixelFormatRGBA32Float;
5770  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA16F: return MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Float;
5771  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_R10G10B10A2: return MTLPixelFormatRGB10A2Unorm;
5772  default: return MTLPixelFormatInvalid;
5773  }
5774 }
5775 
5776 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLPixelFormat _sg_mtl_rendertarget_depth_format(sg_pixel_format fmt) {
5777  switch (fmt) {
5778  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTH:
5779  return MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float;
5780  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL:
5781  /* NOTE: Depth24_Stencil8 isn't universally supported! */
5782  return MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8;
5783  default:
5784  return MTLPixelFormatInvalid;
5785  }
5786 }
5787 
5788 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLPixelFormat _sg_mtl_rendertarget_stencil_format(sg_pixel_format fmt) {
5789  switch (fmt) {
5790  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL:
5791  return MTLPixelFormatDepth32Float_Stencil8;
5792  default:
5793  return MTLPixelFormatInvalid;
5794  }
5795 }
5796 
5797 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLColorWriteMask _sg_mtl_color_write_mask(sg_color_mask m) {
5798  MTLColorWriteMask mtl_mask = MTLColorWriteMaskNone;
5799  if (m & SG_COLORMASK_R) {
5800  mtl_mask |= MTLColorWriteMaskRed;
5801  }
5802  if (m & SG_COLORMASK_G) {
5803  mtl_mask |= MTLColorWriteMaskGreen;
5804  }
5805  if (m & SG_COLORMASK_B) {
5806  mtl_mask |= MTLColorWriteMaskBlue;
5807  }
5808  if (m & SG_COLORMASK_A) {
5809  mtl_mask |= MTLColorWriteMaskAlpha;
5810  }
5811  return mtl_mask;
5812 }
5813 
5814 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLBlendOperation _sg_mtl_blend_op(sg_blend_op op) {
5815  switch (op) {
5816  case SG_BLENDOP_ADD: return MTLBlendOperationAdd;
5817  case SG_BLENDOP_SUBTRACT: return MTLBlendOperationSubtract;
5818  case SG_BLENDOP_REVERSE_SUBTRACT: return MTLBlendOperationReverseSubtract;
5819  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLBlendOperation)0;
5820  }
5821 }
5822 
5823 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLBlendFactor _sg_mtl_blend_factor(sg_blend_factor f) {
5824  switch (f) {
5825  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ZERO: return MTLBlendFactorZero;
5826  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE: return MTLBlendFactorOne;
5827  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_SRC_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorSourceColor;
5828  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusSourceColor;
5829  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_SRC_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorSourceAlpha;
5830  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusSourceAlpha;
5831  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_DST_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorDestinationColor;
5832  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusDestinationColor;
5833  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_DST_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorDestinationAlpha;
5834  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusDestinationAlpha;
5835  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATED: return MTLBlendFactorSourceAlphaSaturated;
5836  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_BLEND_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorBlendColor;
5837  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_BLEND_COLOR: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusBlendColor;
5838  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_BLEND_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorBlendAlpha;
5839  case SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE_MINUS_BLEND_ALPHA: return MTLBlendFactorOneMinusBlendAlpha;
5840  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLBlendFactor)0;
5841  }
5842 }
5843 
5844 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLCompareFunction _sg_mtl_compare_func(sg_compare_func f) {
5845  switch (f) {
5846  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_NEVER: return MTLCompareFunctionNever;
5847  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_LESS: return MTLCompareFunctionLess;
5848  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_EQUAL: return MTLCompareFunctionEqual;
5849  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_LESS_EQUAL: return MTLCompareFunctionLessEqual;
5850  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_GREATER: return MTLCompareFunctionGreater;
5851  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_NOT_EQUAL: return MTLCompareFunctionNotEqual;
5852  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_GREATER_EQUAL: return MTLCompareFunctionGreaterEqual;
5853  case SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS: return MTLCompareFunctionAlways;
5854  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLCompareFunction)0;
5855  }
5856 }
5857 
5858 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLStencilOperation _sg_mtl_stencil_op(sg_stencil_op op) {
5859  switch (op) {
5860  case SG_STENCILOP_KEEP: return MTLStencilOperationKeep;
5861  case SG_STENCILOP_ZERO: return MTLStencilOperationZero;
5862  case SG_STENCILOP_REPLACE: return MTLStencilOperationReplace;
5863  case SG_STENCILOP_INCR_CLAMP: return MTLStencilOperationIncrementClamp;
5864  case SG_STENCILOP_DECR_CLAMP: return MTLStencilOperationDecrementClamp;
5865  case SG_STENCILOP_INVERT: return MTLStencilOperationInvert;
5866  case SG_STENCILOP_INCR_WRAP: return MTLStencilOperationIncrementWrap;
5867  case SG_STENCILOP_DECR_WRAP: return MTLStencilOperationDecrementWrap;
5868  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLStencilOperation)0;
5869  }
5870 }
5871 
5872 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLCullMode _sg_mtl_cull_mode(sg_cull_mode m) {
5873  switch (m) {
5874  case SG_CULLMODE_NONE: return MTLCullModeNone;
5875  case SG_CULLMODE_FRONT: return MTLCullModeFront;
5876  case SG_CULLMODE_BACK: return MTLCullModeBack;
5877  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLCullMode)0;
5878  }
5879 }
5880 
5881 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLWinding _sg_mtl_winding(sg_face_winding w) {
5882  switch (w) {
5883  case SG_FACEWINDING_CW: return MTLWindingClockwise;
5884  case SG_FACEWINDING_CCW: return MTLWindingCounterClockwise;
5885  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLWinding)0;
5886  }
5887 }
5888 
5889 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLIndexType _sg_mtl_index_type(sg_index_type t) {
5890  switch (t) {
5891  case SG_INDEXTYPE_UINT16: return MTLIndexTypeUInt16;
5892  case SG_INDEXTYPE_UINT32: return MTLIndexTypeUInt32;
5893  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLIndexType)0;
5894  }
5895 }
5896 
5897 _SOKOL_PRIVATE NSUInteger _sg_mtl_index_size(sg_index_type t) {
5898  switch (t) {
5899  case SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE: return 0;
5900  case SG_INDEXTYPE_UINT16: return 2;
5901  case SG_INDEXTYPE_UINT32: return 4;
5902  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return 0;
5903  }
5904 }
5905 
5906 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLTextureType _sg_mtl_texture_type(sg_image_type t) {
5907  switch (t) {
5908  case SG_IMAGETYPE_2D: return MTLTextureType2D;
5909  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE: return MTLTextureTypeCube;
5910  case SG_IMAGETYPE_3D: return MTLTextureType3D;
5911  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY: return MTLTextureType2DArray;
5912  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLTextureType)0;
5913  }
5914 }
5915 
5916 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_mtl_is_pvrtc(sg_pixel_format fmt) {
5917  switch (fmt) {
5918  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC2_RGB:
5919  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC2_RGBA:
5920  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC4_RGB:
5921  case SG_PIXELFORMAT_PVRTC4_RGBA:
5922  return true;
5923  default:
5924  return false;
5925  }
5926 }
5927 
5928 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLSamplerAddressMode _sg_mtl_address_mode(sg_wrap w) {
5929  switch (w) {
5930  case SG_WRAP_REPEAT: return MTLSamplerAddressModeRepeat;
5931  case SG_WRAP_CLAMP_TO_EDGE: return MTLSamplerAddressModeClampToEdge;
5932  case SG_WRAP_MIRRORED_REPEAT: return MTLSamplerAddressModeMirrorRepeat;
5933  default: SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLSamplerAddressMode)0;
5934  }
5935 }
5936 
5937 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLSamplerMinMagFilter _sg_mtl_minmag_filter(sg_filter f) {
5938  switch (f) {
5939  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST:
5940  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST:
5941  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR:
5942  return MTLSamplerMinMagFilterNearest;
5943  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR:
5944  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST:
5945  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR:
5946  return MTLSamplerMinMagFilterLinear;
5947  default:
5948  SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLSamplerMinMagFilter)0;
5949  }
5950 }
5951 
5952 _SOKOL_PRIVATE MTLSamplerMipFilter _sg_mtl_mip_filter(sg_filter f) {
5953  switch (f) {
5954  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST:
5955  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR:
5956  return MTLSamplerMipFilterNotMipmapped;
5957  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST:
5958  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST:
5959  return MTLSamplerMipFilterNearest;
5960  case SG_FILTER_NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR:
5961  case SG_FILTER_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR:
5962  return MTLSamplerMipFilterLinear;
5963  default:
5964  SOKOL_UNREACHABLE; return (MTLSamplerMipFilter)0;
5965  }
5966 }
5967 
5968 /*-- a pool for all Metal resource objects, with deferred release queue -------*/
5969 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_pool_size;
5970 static NSMutableArray* _sg_mtl_pool;
5971 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_free_queue_top;
5972 static uint32_t* _sg_mtl_free_queue;
5973 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_release_queue_front;
5974 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_release_queue_back;
5975 typedef struct {
5976  uint32_t frame_index; /* frame index at which it is safe to release this resource */
5977  uint32_t pool_index;
5978 } _sg_mtl_release_item;
5979 static _sg_mtl_release_item* _sg_mtl_release_queue;
5980 
5981 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_init_pool(const sg_desc* desc) {
5982  _sg_mtl_pool_size = 2 *
5983  2 * _sg_def(desc->buffer_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_BUFFER_POOL_SIZE) +
5984  5 * _sg_def(desc->image_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_IMAGE_POOL_SIZE) +
5985  4 * _sg_def(desc->shader_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_SHADER_POOL_SIZE) +
5986  2 * _sg_def(desc->pipeline_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_PIPELINE_POOL_SIZE) +
5987  _sg_def(desc->pass_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_PASS_POOL_SIZE);
5988  _sg_mtl_pool = [NSMutableArray arrayWithCapacity:_sg_mtl_pool_size];
5989  NSNull* null = [NSNull null];
5990  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < _sg_mtl_pool_size; i++) {
5991  [_sg_mtl_pool addObject:null];
5992  }
5993  SOKOL_ASSERT([_sg_mtl_pool count] == _sg_mtl_pool_size);
5994  /* a queue of currently free slot indices */
5995  _sg_mtl_free_queue_top = 0;
5996  _sg_mtl_free_queue = (uint32_t*)SOKOL_MALLOC(_sg_mtl_pool_size * sizeof(uint32_t));
5997  for (int i = _sg_mtl_pool_size-1; i >= 0; i--) {
5998  _sg_mtl_free_queue[_sg_mtl_free_queue_top++] = (uint32_t)i;
5999  }
6000  /* a circular queue which holds release items (frame index
6001  when a resource is to be released, and the resource's
6002  pool index
6003  */
6004  _sg_mtl_release_queue_front = 0;
6005  _sg_mtl_release_queue_back = 0;
6006  _sg_mtl_release_queue = (_sg_mtl_release_item*)SOKOL_MALLOC(_sg_mtl_pool_size * sizeof(_sg_mtl_release_item));
6007  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < _sg_mtl_pool_size; i++) {
6008  _sg_mtl_release_queue[i].frame_index = 0;
6009  _sg_mtl_release_queue[i].pool_index = _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX;
6010  }
6011 }
6012 
6013 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_destroy_pool() {
6014  SOKOL_FREE(_sg_mtl_release_queue); _sg_mtl_release_queue = 0;
6015  SOKOL_FREE(_sg_mtl_free_queue); _sg_mtl_free_queue = 0;
6016  _sg_mtl_pool = nil;
6017 }
6018 
6019 /* get a new free resource pool slot */
6020 _SOKOL_PRIVATE uint32_t _sg_mtl_alloc_pool_slot() {
6021  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_free_queue_top > 0);
6022  const uint32_t pool_index = _sg_mtl_free_queue[--_sg_mtl_free_queue_top];
6023  return pool_index;
6024 }
6025 
6026 /* put a free resource pool slot back into the free-queue */
6027 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_free_pool_slot(uint32_t pool_index) {
6028  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_free_queue_top < _sg_mtl_pool_size);
6029  _sg_mtl_free_queue[_sg_mtl_free_queue_top++] = pool_index;
6030 }
6031 
6032 /* add an MTLResource to the pool, return pool index or 0xFFFFFFFF if input was 'nil' */
6033 _SOKOL_PRIVATE uint32_t _sg_mtl_add_resource(id res) {
6034  if (nil == res) {
6035  return _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX;
6036  }
6037  const uint32_t pool_index = _sg_mtl_alloc_pool_slot();
6038  SOKOL_ASSERT([NSNull null] == _sg_mtl_pool[pool_index]);
6039  _sg_mtl_pool[pool_index] = res;
6040  return pool_index;
6041 }
6042 
6043 /* mark an MTLResource for release, this will put the resource into the
6044  deferred-release queue, and the resource will then be released N frames later,
6045  the special pool index 0xFFFFFFFF will be ignored (this means that a nil
6046  value was provided to _sg_mtl_add_resource()
6047 */
6048 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_release_resource(uint32_t frame_index, uint32_t pool_index) {
6049  if (pool_index == _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX) {
6050  return;
6051  }
6052  SOKOL_ASSERT((pool_index >= 0) && (pool_index < _sg_mtl_pool_size));
6053  SOKOL_ASSERT([NSNull null] != _sg_mtl_pool[pool_index]);
6054  int slot_index = _sg_mtl_release_queue_front++;
6055  if (_sg_mtl_release_queue_front >= _sg_mtl_pool_size) {
6056  /* wrap-around */
6057  _sg_mtl_release_queue_front = 0;
6058  }
6059  /* release queue full? */
6060  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_release_queue_front != _sg_mtl_release_queue_back);
6061  SOKOL_ASSERT(0 == _sg_mtl_release_queue[slot_index].frame_index);
6062  const uint32_t safe_to_release_frame_index = frame_index + SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES + 1;
6063  _sg_mtl_release_queue[slot_index].frame_index = safe_to_release_frame_index;
6064  _sg_mtl_release_queue[slot_index].pool_index = pool_index;
6065 }
6066 
6067 /* run garbage-collection pass on all resources in the release-queue */
6068 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_garbage_collect(uint32_t frame_index) {
6069  while (_sg_mtl_release_queue_back != _sg_mtl_release_queue_front) {
6070  if (frame_index < _sg_mtl_release_queue[_sg_mtl_release_queue_back].frame_index) {
6071  /* don't need to check further, release-items past this are too young */
6072  break;
6073  }
6074  /* safe to release this resource */
6075  const uint32_t pool_index = _sg_mtl_release_queue[_sg_mtl_release_queue_back].pool_index;
6076  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool_index < _sg_mtl_pool_size);
6077  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_pool[pool_index] != [NSNull null]);
6078  _sg_mtl_pool[pool_index] = [NSNull null];
6079  /* put the now free pool index back on the free queue */
6080  _sg_mtl_free_pool_slot(pool_index);
6081  /* reset the release queue slot and advance the back index */
6082  _sg_mtl_release_queue[_sg_mtl_release_queue_back].frame_index = 0;
6083  _sg_mtl_release_queue[_sg_mtl_release_queue_back].pool_index = _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX;
6084  _sg_mtl_release_queue_back++;
6085  if (_sg_mtl_release_queue_back >= _sg_mtl_pool_size) {
6086  /* wrap-around */
6087  _sg_mtl_release_queue_back = 0;
6088  }
6089  }
6090 }
6091 
6092 /*-- a very simple sampler cache -----------------------------------------------
6093 
6094  since there's only a small number of different samplers, sampler objects
6095  will never be deleted (except on shutdown), and searching an identical
6096  sampler is a simple linear search
6097 */
6098 typedef struct {
6099  sg_filter min_filter;
6100  sg_filter mag_filter;
6101  sg_wrap wrap_u;
6102  sg_wrap wrap_v;
6103  sg_wrap wrap_w;
6104  uint32_t max_anisotropy;
6105  int min_lod; /* orig min/max_lod is float, this is int(min/max_lod*1000.0) */
6106  int max_lod;
6107  uint32_t mtl_sampler_state;
6108 } _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item;
6109 static int _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity;
6110 static int _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size;
6111 static _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item* _sg_mtl_sampler_cache;
6112 
6113 /* initialize the sampler cache */
6114 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_init_sampler_cache(const sg_desc* desc) {
6115  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity = _sg_def(desc->mtl_sampler_cache_size, _SG_MTL_DEFAULT_SAMPLER_CACHE_CAPACITY);
6116  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size = 0;
6117  const int size = _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity * sizeof(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item);
6118  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache = (_sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item*)SOKOL_MALLOC(size);
6119  memset(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache, 0, size);
6120 }
6121 
6122 /* destroy the sampler cache, and release all sampler objects */
6123 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_destroy_sampler_cache(uint32_t frame_index) {
6124  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache);
6125  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size <= _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity);
6126  for (int i = 0; i < _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size; i++) {
6127  _sg_mtl_release_resource(frame_index, _sg_mtl_sampler_cache[i].mtl_sampler_state);
6128  }
6129  SOKOL_FREE(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache); _sg_mtl_sampler_cache = 0;
6130  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size = 0;
6131  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity = 0;
6132 }
6133 
6134 /*
6135  create and add an MTLSamplerStateObject and return its resource pool index,
6136  reuse identical sampler state if one exists
6137 */
6138 _SOKOL_PRIVATE uint32_t _sg_mtl_create_sampler(id<MTLDevice> mtl_device, const sg_image_desc* img_desc) {
6139  SOKOL_ASSERT(img_desc);
6140  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache);
6141  /* sampler state cache is full */
6142  const sg_filter min_filter = _sg_def(img_desc->min_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
6143  const sg_filter mag_filter = _sg_def(img_desc->mag_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
6144  const sg_wrap wrap_u = _sg_def(img_desc->wrap_u, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6145  const sg_wrap wrap_v = _sg_def(img_desc->wrap_v, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6146  const sg_wrap wrap_w = _sg_def(img_desc->wrap_w, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6147  const uint32_t max_anisotropy = _sg_def(img_desc->max_anisotropy, 1);
6148  /* convert floats to valid int for proper comparison */
6149  const int min_lod = (int)(img_desc->min_lod * 1000.0f);
6150  const int max_lod = (int)(_sg_def_flt(img_desc->max_lod, 1000.0f) * 1000.0f);
6151  /* first try to find identical sampler, number of samplers will be small, so linear search is ok */
6152  for (int i = 0; i < _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size; i++) {
6153  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item* item = &_sg_mtl_sampler_cache[i];
6154  if ((min_filter == item->min_filter) &&
6155  (mag_filter == item->mag_filter) &&
6156  (wrap_u == item->wrap_u) &&
6157  (wrap_v == item->wrap_v) &&
6158  (wrap_w == item->wrap_w) &&
6159  (max_anisotropy == item->max_anisotropy) &&
6160  (min_lod == item->min_lod) &&
6161  (max_lod == item->max_lod))
6162  {
6163  return item->mtl_sampler_state;
6164  }
6165  }
6166  /* fallthrough: need to create a new MTLSamplerState object */
6167  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size < _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_capacity);
6168  _sg_mtl_sampler_cache_item* new_item = &_sg_mtl_sampler_cache[_sg_mtl_sampler_cache_size++];
6169  new_item->min_filter = min_filter;
6170  new_item->mag_filter = mag_filter;
6171  new_item->wrap_u = wrap_u;
6172  new_item->wrap_v = wrap_v;
6173  new_item->wrap_w = wrap_w;
6174  new_item->min_lod = min_lod;
6175  new_item->max_lod = max_lod;
6176  new_item->max_anisotropy = max_anisotropy;
6177  MTLSamplerDescriptor* mtl_desc = [[MTLSamplerDescriptor alloc] init];
6178  mtl_desc.sAddressMode = _sg_mtl_address_mode(wrap_u);
6179  mtl_desc.tAddressMode = _sg_mtl_address_mode(wrap_v);
6180  if (SG_IMAGETYPE_3D == img_desc->type) {
6181  mtl_desc.rAddressMode = _sg_mtl_address_mode(wrap_w);
6182  }
6183  mtl_desc.minFilter = _sg_mtl_minmag_filter(min_filter);
6184  mtl_desc.magFilter = _sg_mtl_minmag_filter(mag_filter);
6185  mtl_desc.mipFilter = _sg_mtl_mip_filter(min_filter);
6186  mtl_desc.lodMinClamp = img_desc->min_lod;
6187  mtl_desc.lodMaxClamp = _sg_def_flt(img_desc->max_lod, FLT_MAX);
6188  mtl_desc.maxAnisotropy = max_anisotropy;
6189  mtl_desc.normalizedCoordinates = YES;
6190  id<MTLSamplerState> mtl_sampler = [mtl_device newSamplerStateWithDescriptor:mtl_desc];
6191  new_item->mtl_sampler_state = _sg_mtl_add_resource(mtl_sampler);
6192  return new_item->mtl_sampler_state;
6193 }
6194 
6195 /*-- Metal backend resource structs ------------------------------------------*/
6196 typedef struct {
6197  _sg_slot slot;
6198  int size;
6199  sg_buffer_type type;
6200  sg_usage usage;
6201  uint32_t upd_frame_index;
6202  int num_slots;
6203  int active_slot;
6204  uint32_t mtl_buf[SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES]; /* index intp _sg_mtl_pool */
6205 } _sg_buffer;
6206 
6207 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_buffer_slot(_sg_buffer* buf) {
6208  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf);
6209  memset(buf, 0, sizeof(_sg_buffer));
6210 }
6211 
6212 typedef struct {
6213  _sg_slot slot;
6214  sg_image_type type;
6215  bool render_target;
6216  int width;
6217  int height;
6218  int depth;
6219  int num_mipmaps;
6220  sg_usage usage;
6221  sg_pixel_format pixel_format;
6222  int sample_count;
6223  sg_filter min_filter;
6224  sg_filter mag_filter;
6225  sg_wrap wrap_u;
6226  sg_wrap wrap_v;
6227  sg_wrap wrap_w;
6228  uint32_t max_anisotropy;
6229  uint32_t upd_frame_index;
6230  int num_slots;
6231  int active_slot;
6232  uint32_t mtl_tex[SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES];
6233  uint32_t mtl_depth_tex;
6234  uint32_t mtl_msaa_tex;
6235  uint32_t mtl_sampler_state;
6236 } _sg_image;
6237
