6238 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_image_slot(_sg_image* img) {
6239  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
6240  memset(img, 0, sizeof(_sg_image));
6241 }
6242 
6243 typedef struct {
6244  int size;
6245 } _sg_uniform_block;
6246 
6247 typedef struct {
6248  sg_image_type type;
6249 } _sg_shader_image;
6250 
6251 typedef struct {
6252  int num_uniform_blocks;
6253  int num_images;
6254  _sg_uniform_block uniform_blocks[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS];
6255  _sg_shader_image images[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
6256  uint32_t mtl_lib;
6257  uint32_t mtl_func;
6258 } _sg_shader_stage;
6259 
6260 typedef struct {
6261  _sg_slot slot;
6262  _sg_shader_stage stage[SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES];
6263 } _sg_shader;
6264 
6265 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_shader_slot(_sg_shader* shd) {
6266  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd);
6267  memset(shd, 0, sizeof(_sg_shader));
6268 }
6269 
6270 typedef struct {
6271  _sg_slot slot;
6272  _sg_shader* shader;
6273  sg_shader shader_id;
6274  bool vertex_layout_valid[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
6275  int color_attachment_count;
6276  sg_pixel_format color_format;
6277  sg_pixel_format depth_format;
6278  int sample_count;
6279  float depth_bias;
6280  float depth_bias_slope_scale;
6281  float depth_bias_clamp;
6282  MTLPrimitiveType mtl_prim_type;
6283  sg_index_type index_type;
6284  NSUInteger mtl_index_size;
6285  MTLIndexType mtl_index_type;
6286  MTLCullMode mtl_cull_mode;
6287  MTLWinding mtl_winding;
6288  float blend_color[4];
6289  uint32_t mtl_stencil_ref;
6290  uint32_t mtl_rps;
6291  uint32_t mtl_dss;
6292 } _sg_pipeline;
6293 
6294 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_pipeline_slot(_sg_pipeline* pip) {
6295  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
6296  memset(pip, 0, sizeof(_sg_pipeline));
6297 }
6298 
6299 typedef struct {
6300  _sg_image* image;
6301  sg_image image_id;
6302  int mip_level;
6303  int slice;
6304 } _sg_attachment;
6305 
6306 typedef struct {
6307  _sg_slot slot;
6308  int num_color_atts;
6309  _sg_attachment color_atts[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS];
6310  _sg_attachment ds_att;
6311 } _sg_pass;
6312 
6313 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_pass_slot(_sg_pass* pass) {
6314  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass);
6315  memset(pass, 0, sizeof(_sg_pass));
6316 }
6317 
6318 typedef struct {
6319  _sg_slot slot;
6320 } _sg_context;
6321 
6322 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_context_slot(_sg_context* ctx) {
6323  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
6324  memset(ctx, 0, sizeof(_sg_context));
6325 }
6326 
6327 /*-- a simple state cache for the resource bindings --------------------------*/
6328 static const _sg_pipeline* _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline;
6329 static sg_pipeline _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id;
6330 static const _sg_buffer* _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer;
6331 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_offset;
6332 static sg_buffer _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_id;
6333 static const _sg_buffer* _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffers[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
6334 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_offsets[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
6335 static sg_buffer _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_ids[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
6336 static const _sg_image* _sg_mtl_cur_vs_images[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
6337 static sg_image _sg_mtl_cur_vs_image_ids[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
6338 static const _sg_image* _sg_mtl_cur_fs_images[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
6339 static sg_image _sg_mtl_cur_fs_image_ids[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES];
6340 
6341 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_clear_state_cache() {
6342  _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline = 0;
6343  _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
6344  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer = 0;
6345  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_offset = 0;
6346  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
6347  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; i++) {
6348  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffers[i] = 0;
6349  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_offsets[i] = 0;
6350  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_ids[i].id = SG_INVALID_ID;
6351  }
6352  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++) {
6353  _sg_mtl_cur_vs_images[i] = 0;
6354  _sg_mtl_cur_vs_image_ids[i].id = SG_INVALID_ID;
6355  _sg_mtl_cur_fs_images[i] = 0;
6356  _sg_mtl_cur_fs_image_ids[i].id = SG_INVALID_ID;
6357  }
6358 }
6359 
6360 /*-- main Metal backend state and functions ----------------------------------*/
6361 static bool _sg_mtl_valid;
6362 static const void*(*_sg_mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb)(void);
6363 static const void*(*_sg_mtl_drawable_cb)(void);
6364 static id<MTLDevice> _sg_mtl_device;
6365 static id<MTLCommandQueue> _sg_mtl_cmd_queue;
6366 static id<MTLCommandBuffer> _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer;
6367 static id<MTLRenderCommandEncoder> _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder;
6368 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_frame_index;
6369 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index;
6370 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_ub_size;
6371 static uint32_t _sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset;
6372 static uint8_t* _sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr;
6373 static id<MTLBuffer> _sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES];
6374 static dispatch_semaphore_t _sg_mtl_sem;
6375 static bool _sg_mtl_in_pass;
6376 static bool _sg_mtl_pass_valid;
6377 static int _sg_mtl_cur_width;
6378 static int _sg_mtl_cur_height;
6379 
6380 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_setup_backend(const sg_desc* desc) {
6381  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
6382  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->mtl_device);
6383  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb);
6384  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->mtl_drawable_cb);
6385  _sg_mtl_init_pool(desc);
6386  _sg_mtl_init_sampler_cache(desc);
6387  _sg_mtl_clear_state_cache();
6388  _sg_mtl_valid = true;
6389  _sg_mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb = desc->mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb;
6390  _sg_mtl_drawable_cb = desc->mtl_drawable_cb;
6391  _sg_mtl_in_pass = false;
6392  _sg_mtl_pass_valid = false;
6393  _sg_mtl_cur_width = 0;
6394  _sg_mtl_cur_height = 0;
6395  _sg_mtl_frame_index = 1;
6396  _sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index = 0;
6397  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset = 0;
6398  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr = 0;
6399  _sg_mtl_device = (__bridge id<MTLDevice>) desc->mtl_device;
6400  _sg_mtl_sem = dispatch_semaphore_create(SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES);
6401  _sg_mtl_cmd_queue = [_sg_mtl_device newCommandQueue];
6402  _sg_mtl_ub_size = _sg_def(desc->mtl_global_uniform_buffer_size, _SG_MTL_DEFAULT_UB_SIZE);
6403  MTLResourceOptions res_opts = MTLResourceCPUCacheModeWriteCombined;
6404  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
6405  res_opts |= MTLResourceStorageModeManaged;
6406  #endif
6407  for (int i = 0; i < SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES; i++) {
6408  _sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[i] = [_sg_mtl_device
6409  newBufferWithLength:_sg_mtl_ub_size
6410  options:res_opts
6411  ];
6412  }
6413 }
6414 
6415 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_discard_backend() {
6416  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_valid);
6417  /* wait for the last frame to finish */
6418  for (int i = 0; i < SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES; i++) {
6419  dispatch_semaphore_wait(_sg_mtl_sem, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
6420  }
6421  _sg_mtl_destroy_sampler_cache(_sg_mtl_frame_index);
6422  _sg_mtl_garbage_collect(_sg_mtl_frame_index + SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES + 2);
6423  _sg_mtl_destroy_pool();
6424  _sg_mtl_valid = false;
6425  _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder = nil;
6426  _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer = nil;
6427  _sg_mtl_cmd_queue = nil;
6428  for (int i = 0; i < SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES; i++) {
6429  _sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[i] = nil;
6430  }
6431  _sg_mtl_device = nil;
6432 }
6433 
6434 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_query_feature(sg_feature f) {
6435  switch (f) {
6436  case SG_FEATURE_INSTANCING:
6437  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
6438  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_COMPRESSION_DXT:
6439  #else
6440  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_COMPRESSION_PVRTC:
6441  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_COMPRESSION_ETC2:
6442  #endif
6443  case SG_FEATURE_TEXTURE_FLOAT:
6444  case SG_FEATURE_ORIGIN_TOP_LEFT:
6445  case SG_FEATURE_MSAA_RENDER_TARGETS:
6446  case SG_FEATURE_PACKED_VERTEX_FORMAT_10_2:
6447  case SG_FEATURE_MULTIPLE_RENDER_TARGET:
6448  case SG_FEATURE_IMAGETYPE_3D:
6449  case SG_FEATURE_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
6450  return true;
6451  default:
6452  return false;
6453  }
6454 }
6455 
6456 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_reset_state_cache() {
6457  _sg_mtl_clear_state_cache();
6458 }
6459 
6460 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
6461  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
6462  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6463  ctx->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6464 }
6465 
6466 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
6467  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
6468  _sg_init_context_slot(ctx);
6469 }
6470 
6471 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_activate_context(_sg_context* ctx) {
6472  _sg_reset_state_cache();
6473 }
6474 
6475 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf, const sg_buffer_desc* desc) {
6476  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && desc);
6477  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6478  buf->size = desc->size;
6479  buf->type = _sg_def(desc->type, SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER);
6480  buf->usage = _sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE);
6481  buf->upd_frame_index = 0;
6482  buf->num_slots = (buf->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) ? 1 : SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES;
6483  buf->active_slot = 0;
6484  const bool injected = (0 != desc->mtl_buffers[0]);
6485  MTLResourceOptions mtl_options = _sg_mtl_buffer_resource_options(buf->usage);
6486  for (int slot = 0; slot < buf->num_slots; slot++) {
6487  id<MTLBuffer> mtl_buf;
6488  if (injected) {
6489  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->mtl_buffers[slot]);
6490  mtl_buf = (__bridge id<MTLBuffer>) desc->mtl_buffers[slot];
6491  }
6492  else {
6493  if (buf->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) {
6494  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->content);
6495  mtl_buf = [_sg_mtl_device newBufferWithBytes:desc->content length:buf->size options:mtl_options];
6496  }
6497  else {
6498  mtl_buf = [_sg_mtl_device newBufferWithLength:buf->size options:mtl_options];
6499  }
6500  }
6501  buf->mtl_buf[slot] = _sg_mtl_add_resource(mtl_buf);
6502  }
6503  buf->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6504 }
6505 
6506 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf) {
6507  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf);
6508  if (buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
6509  for (int slot = 0; slot < buf->num_slots; slot++) {
6510  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, buf->mtl_buf[slot]);
6511  }
6512  }
6513  _sg_init_buffer_slot(buf);
6514 }
6515 
6516 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_mtl_copy_image_content(const _sg_image* img, __unsafe_unretained id<MTLTexture> mtl_tex, const sg_image_content* content) {
6517  const int num_faces = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? 6:1;
6518  const int num_slices = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY) ? img->depth : 1;
6519  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < num_faces; face_index++) {
6520  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < img->num_mipmaps; mip_index++) {
6521  SOKOL_ASSERT(content->subimage[face_index][mip_index].ptr);
6522  SOKOL_ASSERT(content->subimage[face_index][mip_index].size > 0);
6523  const uint8_t* data_ptr = (const uint8_t*)content->subimage[face_index][mip_index].ptr;
6524  const int mip_width = _sg_max(img->width >> mip_index, 1);
6525  const int mip_height = _sg_max(img->height >> mip_index, 1);
6526  /* special case PVRTC formats: bytePerRow must be 0 */
6527  int bytes_per_row = 0;
6528  int bytes_per_slice = _sg_surface_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width, mip_height);
6529  if (!_sg_mtl_is_pvrtc(img->pixel_format)) {
6530  bytes_per_row = _sg_row_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width);
6531  }
6532  MTLRegion region;
6533  if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_3D) {
6534  const int mip_depth = _sg_max(img->depth >> mip_index, 1);
6535  region = MTLRegionMake3D(0, 0, 0, mip_width, mip_height, mip_depth);
6536  /* FIXME: apparently the minimal bytes_per_image size for 3D texture
6537  is 4 KByte... somehow need to handle this */
6538  }
6539  else {
6540  region = MTLRegionMake2D(0, 0, mip_width, mip_height);
6541  }
6542  for (int slice_index = 0; slice_index < num_slices; slice_index++) {
6543  const int mtl_slice_index = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? face_index : slice_index;
6544  const int slice_offset = slice_index * bytes_per_slice;
6545  SOKOL_ASSERT((slice_offset + bytes_per_slice) <= (int)content->subimage[face_index][mip_index].size);
6546  [mtl_tex replaceRegion:region
6547  mipmapLevel:mip_index
6548  slice:mtl_slice_index
6549  withBytes:data_ptr + slice_offset
6550  bytesPerRow:bytes_per_row
6551  bytesPerImage:bytes_per_slice];
6552  }
6553  }
6554  }
6555 }
6556 
6557 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_image(_sg_image* img, const sg_image_desc* desc) {
6558  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && desc);
6559  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6560  img->type = _sg_def(desc->type, SG_IMAGETYPE_2D);
6561  img->render_target = desc->render_target;
6562  img->width = desc->width;
6563  img->height = desc->height;
6564  img->depth = _sg_def(desc->depth, 1);
6565  img->num_mipmaps = _sg_def(desc->num_mipmaps, 1);
6566  img->usage = _sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE);
6567  img->pixel_format = _sg_def(desc->pixel_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8);
6568  img->sample_count = _sg_def(desc->sample_count, 1);
6569  img->min_filter = _sg_def(desc->min_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
6570  img->mag_filter = _sg_def(desc->mag_filter, SG_FILTER_NEAREST);
6571  img->wrap_u = _sg_def(desc->wrap_u, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6572  img->wrap_v = _sg_def(desc->wrap_v, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6573  img->wrap_w = _sg_def(desc->wrap_w, SG_WRAP_REPEAT);
6574  img->max_anisotropy = _sg_def(desc->max_anisotropy, 1);
6575  img->upd_frame_index = 0;
6576  img->num_slots = (img->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) ? 1 :SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES;
6577  img->active_slot = 0;
6578  const bool injected = (0 != desc->mtl_textures[0]);
6579 
6580  /* first initialize all Metal resource pool slots to 'empty' */
6581  for (int i = 0; i < SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES; i++) {
6582  img->mtl_tex[i] = _sg_mtl_add_resource(nil);
6583  }
6584  img->mtl_sampler_state = _sg_mtl_add_resource(nil);
6585  img->mtl_depth_tex = _sg_mtl_add_resource(nil);
6586  img->mtl_msaa_tex = _sg_mtl_add_resource(nil);
6587 
6588  /* initialize a Metal texture descriptor with common attributes */
6589  MTLTextureDescriptor* mtl_desc = [[MTLTextureDescriptor alloc] init];
6590  mtl_desc.textureType = _sg_mtl_texture_type(img->type);
6591  if (img->render_target) {
6592  if (_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_color_format(img->pixel_format)) {
6593  mtl_desc.pixelFormat = _sg_mtl_rendertarget_color_format(img->pixel_format);
6594  }
6595  else {
6596  mtl_desc.pixelFormat = _sg_mtl_rendertarget_depth_format(img->pixel_format);
6597  }
6598  }
6599  else {
6600  mtl_desc.pixelFormat = _sg_mtl_texture_format(img->pixel_format);
6601  }
6602  if (MTLPixelFormatInvalid == mtl_desc.pixelFormat) {
6603  SOKOL_LOG("Unsupported texture pixel format!\n");
6604  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6605  return;
6606  }
6607  mtl_desc.width = img->width;
6608  mtl_desc.height = img->height;
6609  if (SG_IMAGETYPE_3D == img->type) {
6610  mtl_desc.depth = img->depth;
6611  }
6612  else {
6613  mtl_desc.depth = 1;
6614  }
6615  mtl_desc.mipmapLevelCount = img->num_mipmaps;
6616  if (SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY == img->type) {
6617  mtl_desc.arrayLength = img->depth;
6618  }
6619  else {
6620  mtl_desc.arrayLength = 1;
6621  }
6622  if (img->render_target) {
6623  mtl_desc.resourceOptions = MTLResourceStorageModePrivate;
6624  mtl_desc.cpuCacheMode = MTLCPUCacheModeDefaultCache;
6625  mtl_desc.storageMode = MTLStorageModePrivate;
6626  mtl_desc.usage |= MTLTextureUsageRenderTarget;
6627  }
6628 
6629  /* special case depth-stencil-buffer? */
6630  if (_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(img->pixel_format)) {
6631  /* create only a depth texture */
6632  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->render_target);
6633  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_2D);
6634  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->num_mipmaps == 1);
6635  SOKOL_ASSERT(!injected);
6636  if (img->sample_count > 1) {
6637  mtl_desc.textureType = MTLTextureType2DMultisample;
6638  mtl_desc.sampleCount = img->sample_count;
6639  }
6640  id<MTLTexture> tex = [_sg_mtl_device newTextureWithDescriptor:mtl_desc];
6641  SOKOL_ASSERT(nil != tex);
6642  img->mtl_depth_tex = _sg_mtl_add_resource(tex);
6643  }
6644  else {
6645  /* create the color texture(s) */
6646  for (int slot = 0; slot < img->num_slots; slot++) {
6647  id<MTLTexture> tex;
6648  if (injected) {
6649  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->mtl_textures[slot]);
6650  tex = (__bridge id<MTLTexture>) desc->mtl_textures[slot];
6651  }
6652  else {
6653  tex = [_sg_mtl_device newTextureWithDescriptor:mtl_desc];
6654  if ((img->usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) && !img->render_target) {
6655  _sg_mtl_copy_image_content(img, tex, &desc->content);
6656  }
6657  }
6658  img->mtl_tex[slot] = _sg_mtl_add_resource(tex);
6659  }
6660 
6661  /* if MSAA color render target, create an additional MSAA render-surface texture */
6662  if (img->render_target && (img->sample_count > 1)) {
6663  mtl_desc.textureType = MTLTextureType2DMultisample;
6664  mtl_desc.depth = 1;
6665  mtl_desc.arrayLength = 1;
6666  mtl_desc.mipmapLevelCount = 1;
6667  mtl_desc.sampleCount = img->sample_count;
6668  id<MTLTexture> tex = [_sg_mtl_device newTextureWithDescriptor:mtl_desc];
6669  img->mtl_msaa_tex = _sg_mtl_add_resource(tex);
6670  }
6671 
6672  /* create (possibly shared) sampler state */
6673  img->mtl_sampler_state = _sg_mtl_create_sampler(_sg_mtl_device, desc);
6674  }
6675  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6676 }
6677 
6678 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_image(_sg_image* img) {
6679  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
6680  if (img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
6681  for (int slot = 0; slot < img->num_slots; slot++) {
6682  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, img->mtl_tex[slot]);
6683  }
6684  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, img->mtl_depth_tex);
6685  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, img->mtl_msaa_tex);
6686  /* NOTE: sampler state objects are shared and not released until shutdown */
6687  }
6688  _sg_init_image_slot(img);
6689 }
6690 
6691 _SOKOL_PRIVATE id<MTLLibrary> _sg_mtl_compile_library(const char* src) {
6692  NSError* err = NULL;
6693  id<MTLLibrary> lib = [_sg_mtl_device
6694  newLibraryWithSource:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:src]
6695  options:nil
6696  error:&err
6697  ];
6698  if (err) {
6699  SOKOL_LOG([err.localizedDescription UTF8String]);
6700  }
6701  return lib;
6702 }
6703 
6704 _SOKOL_PRIVATE id<MTLLibrary> _sg_mtl_library_from_bytecode(const uint8_t* ptr, int num_bytes) {
6705  NSError* err = NULL;
6706  dispatch_data_t lib_data = dispatch_data_create(ptr, num_bytes, NULL, DISPATCH_DATA_DESTRUCTOR_DEFAULT);
6707  id<MTLLibrary> lib = [_sg_mtl_device newLibraryWithData:lib_data error:&err];
6708  if (err) {
6709  SOKOL_LOG([err.localizedDescription UTF8String]);
6710  }
6711  return lib;
6712 }
6713 
6714 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_shader(_sg_shader* shd, const sg_shader_desc* desc) {
6715  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && desc);
6716  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6717 
6718  /* uniform block sizes and image types */
6719  for (int stage_index = 0; stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES; stage_index++) {
6720  const sg_shader_stage_desc* stage_desc = (stage_index == SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS) ? &desc->vs : &desc->fs;
6721  _sg_shader_stage* stage = &shd->stage[stage_index];
6722  SOKOL_ASSERT(stage->num_uniform_blocks == 0);
6723  for (int ub_index = 0; ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS; ub_index++) {
6724  const sg_shader_uniform_block_desc* ub_desc = &stage_desc->uniform_blocks[ub_index];
6725  if (0 == ub_desc->size) {
6726  break;
6727  }
6728  _sg_uniform_block* ub = &stage->uniform_blocks[ub_index];
6729  ub->size = ub_desc->size;
6730  stage->num_uniform_blocks++;
6731  }
6732  SOKOL_ASSERT(stage->num_images == 0);
6733  for (int img_index = 0; img_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; img_index++) {
6734  const sg_shader_image_desc* img_desc = &stage_desc->images[img_index];
6735  if (img_desc->type == _SG_IMAGETYPE_DEFAULT) {
6736  break;
6737  }
6738  stage->images[img_index].type = img_desc->type;
6739  stage->num_images++;
6740  }
6741  }
6742 
6743  /* create metal libray objects and lookup entry functions */
6744  id<MTLLibrary> vs_lib;
6745  id<MTLLibrary> fs_lib;
6746  id<MTLFunction> vs_func;
6747  id<MTLFunction> fs_func;
6748  const char* vs_entry = _sg_def(desc->vs.entry, "_main");
6749  const char* fs_entry = _sg_def(desc->fs.entry, "_main");
6750  if (desc->vs.byte_code && desc->fs.byte_code) {
6751  /* separate byte code provided */
6752  vs_lib = _sg_mtl_library_from_bytecode(desc->vs.byte_code, desc->vs.byte_code_size);
6753  fs_lib = _sg_mtl_library_from_bytecode(desc->fs.byte_code, desc->fs.byte_code_size);
6754  if (nil == vs_lib || nil == fs_lib) {
6755  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6756  return;
6757  }
6758  vs_func = [vs_lib newFunctionWithName:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:vs_entry]];
6759  fs_func = [fs_lib newFunctionWithName:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:fs_entry]];
6760  }
6761  else if (desc->vs.source && desc->fs.source) {
6762  /* separate sources provided */
6763  vs_lib = _sg_mtl_compile_library(desc->vs.source);
6764  fs_lib = _sg_mtl_compile_library(desc->fs.source);
6765  if (nil == vs_lib || nil == fs_lib) {
6766  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6767  return;
6768  }
6769  vs_func = [vs_lib newFunctionWithName:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:vs_entry]];
6770  fs_func = [fs_lib newFunctionWithName:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:fs_entry]];
6771  }
6772  else {
6773  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6774  return;
6775  }
6776  if (nil == vs_func) {
6777  SOKOL_LOG("vertex shader entry function not found\n");
6778  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6779  return;
6780  }
6781  if (nil == fs_func) {
6782  SOKOL_LOG("fragment shader entry function not found\n");
6783  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6784  return;
6785  }
6786  /* it is legal to call _sg_mtl_add_resource with a nil value, this will return a special 0xFFFFFFFF index */
6787  shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_lib = _sg_mtl_add_resource(vs_lib);
6788  shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_lib = _sg_mtl_add_resource(fs_lib);
6789  shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_func = _sg_mtl_add_resource(vs_func);
6790  shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_func = _sg_mtl_add_resource(fs_func);
6791  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6792 }
6793 
6794 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_shader(_sg_shader* shd) {
6795  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd);
6796  if (shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
6797  /* it is valid to call _sg_mtl_release_resource with the special 0xFFFFFFFF index */
6798  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_func);
6799  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_lib);
6800  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_func);
6801  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_lib);
6802  }
6803  _sg_init_shader_slot(shd);
6804 }
6805 
6806 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_pipeline(_sg_pipeline* pip, _sg_shader* shd, const sg_pipeline_desc* desc) {
6807  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && shd && desc);
6808  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6809  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc->shader.id == shd->slot.id);
6810  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
6811 
6812  pip->shader = shd;
6813  pip->shader_id = desc->shader;
6814  pip->color_attachment_count = _sg_def(desc->blend.color_attachment_count, 1);
6815  pip->color_format = _sg_def(desc->blend.color_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8);
6816  pip->depth_format = _sg_def(desc->blend.depth_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL);
6817  pip->sample_count = _sg_def(desc->rasterizer.sample_count, 1);
6818  pip->depth_bias = desc->rasterizer.depth_bias;
6819  pip->depth_bias_slope_scale = desc->rasterizer.depth_bias_slope_scale;
6820  pip->depth_bias_clamp = desc->rasterizer.depth_bias_clamp;
6821  sg_primitive_type prim_type = _sg_def(desc->primitive_type, SG_PRIMITIVETYPE_TRIANGLES);
6822  pip->mtl_prim_type = _sg_mtl_primitive_type(prim_type);
6823  pip->index_type = _sg_def(desc->index_type, SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE);
6824  pip->mtl_index_size = _sg_mtl_index_size(pip->index_type);
6825  if (SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE != pip->index_type) {
6826  pip->mtl_index_type = _sg_mtl_index_type(pip->index_type);
6827  }
6828  pip->mtl_cull_mode = _sg_mtl_cull_mode(_sg_def(desc->rasterizer.cull_mode, SG_CULLMODE_NONE));
6829  pip->mtl_winding = _sg_mtl_winding(_sg_def(desc->rasterizer.face_winding, SG_FACEWINDING_CW));
6830  pip->mtl_stencil_ref = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_ref;
6831  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
6832  pip->blend_color[i] = desc->blend.blend_color[i];
6833  }
6834 
6835  /* create vertex-descriptor */
6836  MTLVertexDescriptor* vtx_desc = [MTLVertexDescriptor vertexDescriptor];
6837  int auto_offset[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS];
6838  for (int layout_index = 0; layout_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; layout_index++) {
6839  auto_offset[layout_index] = 0;
6840  }
6841  /* to use computed offsets, *all* attr offsets must be 0 */
6842  bool use_auto_offset = true;
6843  for (int attr_index = 0; attr_index < SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES; attr_index++) {
6844  if (desc->layout.attrs[attr_index].offset != 0) {
6845  use_auto_offset = false;
6846  break;
6847  }
6848  }
6849  for (int attr_index = 0; attr_index < SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES; attr_index++) {
6850  const sg_vertex_attr_desc* a_desc = &desc->layout.attrs[attr_index];
6851  if (a_desc->format == SG_VERTEXFORMAT_INVALID) {
6852  break;
6853  }
6854  SOKOL_ASSERT((a_desc->buffer_index >= 0) && (a_desc->buffer_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS));
6855  vtx_desc.attributes[attr_index].format = _sg_mtl_vertex_format(a_desc->format);
6856  vtx_desc.attributes[attr_index].offset = use_auto_offset ? auto_offset[a_desc->buffer_index] : a_desc->offset;
6857  vtx_desc.attributes[attr_index].bufferIndex = a_desc->buffer_index + SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS;
6858  auto_offset[a_desc->buffer_index] += _sg_vertexformat_bytesize(a_desc->format);
6859  pip->vertex_layout_valid[a_desc->buffer_index] = true;
6860  }
6861  for (int layout_index = 0; layout_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; layout_index++) {
6862  if (pip->vertex_layout_valid[layout_index]) {
6863  const sg_buffer_layout_desc* l_desc = &desc->layout.buffers[layout_index];
6864  const int mtl_vb_slot = layout_index + SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS;
6865  const int stride = l_desc->stride ? l_desc->stride : auto_offset[layout_index];
6866  SOKOL_ASSERT(stride > 0);
6867  vtx_desc.layouts[mtl_vb_slot].stride = stride;
6868  vtx_desc.layouts[mtl_vb_slot].stepFunction = _sg_mtl_step_function(_sg_def(l_desc->step_func, SG_VERTEXSTEP_PER_VERTEX));
6869  vtx_desc.layouts[mtl_vb_slot].stepRate = _sg_def(l_desc->step_rate, 1);
6870  }
6871  }
6872 
6873  /* render-pipeline descriptor */
6874  MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor* rp_desc = [[MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor alloc] init];
6875  rp_desc.vertexDescriptor = vtx_desc;
6876  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_func != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
6877  rp_desc.vertexFunction = _sg_mtl_pool[shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS].mtl_func];
6878  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_func != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
6879  rp_desc.fragmentFunction = _sg_mtl_pool[shd->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS].mtl_func];
6880  rp_desc.sampleCount = _sg_def(desc->rasterizer.sample_count, 1);
6881  rp_desc.alphaToCoverageEnabled = desc->rasterizer.alpha_to_coverage_enabled;
6882  rp_desc.alphaToOneEnabled = NO;
6883  rp_desc.rasterizationEnabled = YES;
6884  rp_desc.depthAttachmentPixelFormat = _sg_mtl_rendertarget_depth_format(_sg_def(desc->blend.depth_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL));
6885  rp_desc.stencilAttachmentPixelFormat = _sg_mtl_rendertarget_stencil_format(_sg_def(desc->blend.depth_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL));
6886  /* FIXME: this only works on macOS 10.13!
6887  for (int i = 0; i < (SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS+SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS); i++) {
6888  rp_desc.vertexBuffers[i].mutability = MTLMutabilityImmutable;
6889  }
6890  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS; i++) {
6891  rp_desc.fragmentBuffers[i].mutability = MTLMutabilityImmutable;
6892  }
6893  */
6894  const int att_count = _sg_def(desc->blend.color_attachment_count, 1);
6895  for (int i = 0; i < att_count; i++) {
6896  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].pixelFormat = _sg_mtl_rendertarget_color_format(_sg_def(desc->blend.color_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8));
6897  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].writeMask = _sg_mtl_color_write_mask((sg_color_mask)_sg_def(desc->blend.color_write_mask, SG_COLORMASK_RGBA));
6898  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].blendingEnabled = desc->blend.enabled;
6899  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].alphaBlendOperation = _sg_mtl_blend_op(_sg_def(desc->blend.op_alpha, SG_BLENDOP_ADD));
6900  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].rgbBlendOperation = _sg_mtl_blend_op(_sg_def(desc->blend.op_rgb, SG_BLENDOP_ADD));
6901  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].destinationAlphaBlendFactor = _sg_mtl_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.dst_factor_alpha, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ZERO));
6902  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].destinationRGBBlendFactor = _sg_mtl_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.dst_factor_rgb, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ZERO));
6903  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].sourceAlphaBlendFactor = _sg_mtl_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.src_factor_alpha, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE));
6904  rp_desc.colorAttachments[i].sourceRGBBlendFactor = _sg_mtl_blend_factor(_sg_def(desc->blend.src_factor_rgb, SG_BLENDFACTOR_ONE));
6905  }
6906  NSError* err = NULL;
6907  id<MTLRenderPipelineState> mtl_rps = [_sg_mtl_device newRenderPipelineStateWithDescriptor:rp_desc error:&err];
6908  if (nil == mtl_rps) {
6909  SOKOL_ASSERT(err);
6910  SOKOL_LOG([err.localizedDescription UTF8String]);
6911  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
6912  return;
6913  }
6914 
6915  /* depth-stencil-state */
6916  MTLDepthStencilDescriptor* ds_desc = [[MTLDepthStencilDescriptor alloc] init];
6917  ds_desc.depthCompareFunction = _sg_mtl_compare_func(_sg_def(desc->depth_stencil.depth_compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
6918  ds_desc.depthWriteEnabled = desc->depth_stencil.depth_write_enabled;
6919  if (desc->depth_stencil.stencil_enabled) {
6920  const sg_stencil_state* sb = &desc->depth_stencil.stencil_back;
6921  ds_desc.backFaceStencil = [[MTLStencilDescriptor alloc] init];
6922  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.stencilFailureOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6923  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.depthFailureOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->depth_fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6924  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.depthStencilPassOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sb->pass_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6925  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.stencilCompareFunction = _sg_mtl_compare_func(_sg_def(sb->compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
6926  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.readMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_read_mask;
6927  ds_desc.backFaceStencil.writeMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_write_mask;
6928  const sg_stencil_state* sf = &desc->depth_stencil.stencil_front;
6929  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil = [[MTLStencilDescriptor alloc] init];
6930  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.stencilFailureOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6931  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.depthFailureOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->depth_fail_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6932  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.depthStencilPassOperation = _sg_mtl_stencil_op(_sg_def(sf->pass_op, SG_STENCILOP_KEEP));
6933  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.stencilCompareFunction = _sg_mtl_compare_func(_sg_def(sf->compare_func, SG_COMPAREFUNC_ALWAYS));
6934  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.readMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_read_mask;
6935  ds_desc.frontFaceStencil.writeMask = desc->depth_stencil.stencil_write_mask;
6936  }
6937  id<MTLDepthStencilState> mtl_dss = [_sg_mtl_device newDepthStencilStateWithDescriptor:ds_desc];
6938 
6939  pip->mtl_rps = _sg_mtl_add_resource(mtl_rps);
6940  pip->mtl_dss = _sg_mtl_add_resource(mtl_dss);
6941  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6942 }
6943 
6944 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_pipeline(_sg_pipeline* pip) {
6945  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
6946  if (pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
6947  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, pip->mtl_rps);
6948  _sg_mtl_release_resource(_sg_mtl_frame_index, pip->mtl_dss);
6949  }
6950  _sg_init_pipeline_slot(pip);
6951 }
6952 
6953 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_create_pass(_sg_pass* pass, _sg_image** att_images, const sg_pass_desc* desc) {
6954  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass && desc);
6955  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
6956  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images && att_images[0]);
6957 
6958  /* copy image pointers and desc attributes */
6959  const sg_attachment_desc* att_desc;
6960  _sg_attachment* att;
6961  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
6962  SOKOL_ASSERT(0 == pass->color_atts[i].image);
6963  att_desc = &desc->color_attachments[i];
6964  if (att_desc->image.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
6965  pass->num_color_atts++;
6966  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images[i] && (att_images[i]->slot.id == att_desc->image.id));
6967  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_color_format(att_images[i]->pixel_format));
6968  att = &pass->color_atts[i];
6969  SOKOL_ASSERT((att->image == 0) && (att->image_id.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
6970  att->image = att_images[i];
6971  att->image_id = att_desc->image;
6972  att->mip_level = att_desc->mip_level;
6973  att->slice = att_desc->slice;
6974  }
6975  }
6976  SOKOL_ASSERT(0 == pass->ds_att.image);
6977  att_desc = &desc->depth_stencil_attachment;
6978  const int ds_img_index = SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS;
6979  if (att_desc->image.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
6980  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_images[ds_img_index] && (att_images[ds_img_index]->slot.id == att_desc->image.id));
6981  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(att_images[ds_img_index]->pixel_format));
6982  att = &pass->ds_att;
6983  SOKOL_ASSERT((att->image == 0) && (att->image_id.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
6984  att->image = att_images[ds_img_index];
6985  att->image_id = att_desc->image;
6986  att->mip_level = att_desc->mip_level;
6987  att->slice = att_desc->slice;
6988  }
6989  pass->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID;
6990 }
6991 
6992 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_pass(_sg_pass* pass) {
6993  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass);
6994  _sg_init_pass_slot(pass);
6995 }
6996 
6997 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_begin_pass(_sg_pass* pass, const sg_pass_action* action, int w, int h) {
6998  SOKOL_ASSERT(action);
6999  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7000  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_queue);
7001  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7002  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb);
7003  _sg_mtl_in_pass = true;
7004  _sg_mtl_cur_width = w;
7005  _sg_mtl_cur_height = h;
7006  _sg_mtl_clear_state_cache();
7007 
7008  /* if this is the first pass in the frame, create a command buffer */
7009  if (nil == _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer) {
7010  /* block until the oldest frame in flight has finished */
7011  dispatch_semaphore_wait(_sg_mtl_sem, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
7012  _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer = [_sg_mtl_cmd_queue commandBufferWithUnretainedReferences];
7013  }
7014 
7015  /* if this is first pass in frame, get uniform buffer base pointer */
7016  if (0 == _sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr) {
7017  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr = (uint8_t*)[_sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[_sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index] contents];
7018  }
7019 
7020  /* initialize a render pass descriptor */
7021  MTLRenderPassDescriptor* pass_desc = nil;
7022  if (pass) {
7023  /* offscreen render pass */
7024  pass_desc = [MTLRenderPassDescriptor renderPassDescriptor];
7025  }
7026  else {
7027  /* default render pass, call user-provided callback to provide render pass descriptor */
7028  pass_desc = (__bridge MTLRenderPassDescriptor*) _sg_mtl_renderpass_descriptor_cb();
7029 
7030  }
7031  if (pass_desc) {
7032  _sg_mtl_pass_valid = true;
7033  }
7034  else {
7035  /* default pass descriptor will not be valid if window is minimized,
7036  don't do any rendering in this case */
7037  _sg_mtl_pass_valid = false;
7038  return;
7039  }
7040  if (pass) {
7041  /* setup pass descriptor for offscreen rendering */
7042  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
7043  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
7044  const _sg_attachment* att = &pass->color_atts[i];
7045  if (0 == att->image) {
7046  break;
7047  }
7048  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
7049  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->slot.id == att->image_id.id);
7050  const bool is_msaa = (att->image->sample_count > 1);
7051  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->colors[i].action);
7052  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].storeAction = is_msaa ? MTLStoreActionMultisampleResolve : MTLStoreActionStore;
7053  const float* c = &(action->colors[i].val[0]);
7054  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].clearColor = MTLClearColorMake(c[0], c[1], c[2], c[3]);
7055  if (is_msaa) {
7056  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->mtl_msaa_tex != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7057  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->mtl_tex[att->image->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7058  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].texture = _sg_mtl_pool[att->image->mtl_msaa_tex];
7059  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].resolveTexture = _sg_mtl_pool[att->image->mtl_tex[att->image->active_slot]];
7060  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].resolveLevel = att->mip_level;
7061  switch (att->image->type) {
7062  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE:
7063  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
7064  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].resolveSlice = att->slice;
7065  break;
7066  case SG_IMAGETYPE_3D:
7067  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].resolveDepthPlane = att->slice;
7068  break;
7069  default: break;
7070  }
7071  }
7072  else {
7073  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->mtl_tex[att->image->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7074  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].texture = _sg_mtl_pool[att->image->mtl_tex[att->image->active_slot]];
7075  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].level = att->mip_level;
7076  switch (att->image->type) {
7077  case SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE:
7078  case SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY:
7079  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].slice = att->slice;
7080  break;
7081  case SG_IMAGETYPE_3D:
7082  pass_desc.colorAttachments[i].depthPlane = att->slice;
7083  break;
7084  default: break;
7085  }
7086  }
7087  }
7088  if (0 != pass->ds_att.image) {
7089  const _sg_attachment* att = &pass->ds_att;
7090  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
7091  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->slot.id == att->image_id.id);
7092  SOKOL_ASSERT(att->image->mtl_depth_tex != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7093  pass_desc.depthAttachment.texture = _sg_mtl_pool[att->image->mtl_depth_tex];
7094  pass_desc.depthAttachment.loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->depth.action);
7095  pass_desc.depthAttachment.clearDepth = action->depth.val;
7096  if (_sg_is_depth_stencil_format(att->image->pixel_format)) {
7097  pass_desc.stencilAttachment.texture = _sg_mtl_pool[att->image->mtl_depth_tex];
7098  pass_desc.stencilAttachment.loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->stencil.action);
7099  pass_desc.stencilAttachment.clearStencil = action->stencil.val;
7100  }
7101  }
7102  }
7103  else {
7104  /* setup pass descriptor for default rendering */
7105  pass_desc.colorAttachments[0].loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->colors[0].action);
7106  const float* c = &(action->colors[0].val[0]);
7107  pass_desc.colorAttachments[0].clearColor = MTLClearColorMake(c[0], c[1], c[2], c[3]);
7108  pass_desc.depthAttachment.loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->depth.action);
7109  pass_desc.depthAttachment.clearDepth = action->depth.val;
7110  pass_desc.stencilAttachment.loadAction = _sg_mtl_load_action(action->stencil.action);
7111  pass_desc.stencilAttachment.clearStencil = action->stencil.val;
7112  }
7113 
7114  /* create a render command encoder, this might return nil if window is minimized */
7115  _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder = [_sg_mtl_cmd_buffer renderCommandEncoderWithDescriptor:pass_desc];
7116  if (_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder == nil) {
7117  _sg_mtl_pass_valid = false;
7118  return;
7119  }
7120 
7121  /* bind the global uniform buffer, this only happens once per pass */
7122  for (int slot = 0; slot < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS; slot++) {
7123  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder
7124  setVertexBuffer:_sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[_sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index]
7125  offset:0
7126  atIndex:slot];
7127  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder
7128  setFragmentBuffer:_sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[_sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index]
7129  offset:0
7130  atIndex:slot];
7131  }
7132 }
7133 
7134 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_end_pass() {
7135  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7136  _sg_mtl_in_pass = false;
7137  _sg_mtl_pass_valid = false;
7138  if (nil != _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder) {
7139  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder endEncoding];
7140  _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder = nil;
7141  }
7142 }
7143 
7144 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_commit() {
7145  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7146  SOKOL_ASSERT(!_sg_mtl_pass_valid);
7147  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_drawable_cb);
7148  SOKOL_ASSERT(nil == _sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7149  SOKOL_ASSERT(nil != _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer);
7150 
7151  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
7152  [_sg_mtl_uniform_buffers[_sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index] didModifyRange:NSMakeRange(0, _sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset)];
7153  #endif
7154 
7155  /* present, commit and signal semaphore when done */
7156  id<MTLDrawable> cur_drawable = (__bridge id<MTLDrawable>) _sg_mtl_drawable_cb();
7157  [_sg_mtl_cmd_buffer presentDrawable:cur_drawable];
7158  __block dispatch_semaphore_t sem = _sg_mtl_sem;
7159  [_sg_mtl_cmd_buffer addCompletedHandler:^(id<MTLCommandBuffer> cmd_buffer) {
7160  dispatch_semaphore_signal(sem);
7161  }];
7162  [_sg_mtl_cmd_buffer commit];
7163 
7164  /* garbage-collect resources pending for release */
7165  _sg_mtl_garbage_collect(_sg_mtl_frame_index);
7166 
7167  /* rotate uniform buffer slot */
7168  if (++_sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index >= SG_NUM_INFLIGHT_FRAMES) {
7169  _sg_mtl_cur_frame_rotate_index = 0;
7170  }
7171  _sg_mtl_frame_index++;
7172  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset = 0;
7173  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr = 0;
7174  _sg_mtl_cmd_buffer = nil;
7175 }
7176 
7177 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_viewport(int x, int y, int w, int h, bool origin_top_left) {
7178  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7179  if (!_sg_mtl_pass_valid) {
7180  return;
7181  }
7182  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7183  MTLViewport vp;
7184  vp.originX = (double) x;
7185  vp.originY = (double) (origin_top_left ? y : (_sg_mtl_cur_height - (y + h)));
7186  vp.width = (double) w;
7187  vp.height = (double) h;
7188  vp.znear = 0.0;
7189  vp.zfar = 1.0;
7190  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setViewport:vp];
7191 }
7192 
7193 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_scissor_rect(int x, int y, int w, int h, bool origin_top_left) {
7194  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7195  if (!_sg_mtl_pass_valid) {
7196  return;
7197  }
7198  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7199  /* clip against framebuffer rect */
7200  x = _sg_min(_sg_max(0, x), _sg_mtl_cur_width-1);
7201  y = _sg_min(_sg_max(0, y), _sg_mtl_cur_height-1);
7202  if ((x + w) > _sg_mtl_cur_width) {
7203  w = _sg_mtl_cur_width - x;
7204  }
7205  if ((y + h) > _sg_mtl_cur_height) {
7206  h = _sg_mtl_cur_height - y;
7207  }
7208  w = _sg_max(w, 1);
7209  h = _sg_max(h, 1);
7210 
7211  MTLScissorRect r;
7212  r.x = x;
7213  r.y = origin_top_left ? y : (_sg_mtl_cur_height - (y + h));
7214  r.width = w;
7215  r.height = h;
7216  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setScissorRect:r];
7217 }
7218 
7219 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_draw_state(
7220  _sg_pipeline* pip,
7221  _sg_buffer** vbs, const uint32_t* vb_offsets, int num_vbs,
7222  _sg_buffer* ib, uint32_t ib_offset,
7223  _sg_image** vs_imgs, int num_vs_imgs,
7224  _sg_image** fs_imgs, int num_fs_imgs)
7225 {
7226  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
7227  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->shader);
7228  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7229  if (!_sg_mtl_pass_valid) {
7230  return;
7231  }
7232  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7233 
7234  /* store index buffer binding, this will be needed later in sg_draw() */
7235  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer = ib;
7236  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_offset = ib_offset;
7237  if (ib) {
7238  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->index_type != SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE);
7239  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_id.id = ib->slot.id;
7240  }
7241  else {
7242  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->index_type == SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE);
7243  _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_id.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
7244  }
7245 
7246  /* apply pipeline state */
7247  if ((_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline != pip) || (_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id.id != pip->slot.id)) {
7248  _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline = pip;
7249  _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id.id = pip->slot.id;
7250  const float* c = pip->blend_color;
7251  /* FIXME: those should be filtered through a simple state cache */
7252  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setBlendColorRed:c[0] green:c[1] blue:c[2] alpha:c[3]];
7253  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setCullMode:pip->mtl_cull_mode];
7254  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setFrontFacingWinding:pip->mtl_winding];
7255  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setStencilReferenceValue:pip->mtl_stencil_ref];
7256  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setDepthBias:pip->depth_bias slopeScale:pip->depth_bias_slope_scale clamp:pip->depth_bias_clamp];
7257  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->mtl_rps != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7258  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setRenderPipelineState:_sg_mtl_pool[pip->mtl_rps]];
7259  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->mtl_dss != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7260  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setDepthStencilState:_sg_mtl_pool[pip->mtl_dss]];
7261  }
7262 
7263  /* apply vertex buffers */
7264  int slot;
7265  for (slot = 0; slot < num_vbs; slot++) {
7266  const _sg_buffer* vb = vbs[slot];
7267  if ((_sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffers[slot] != vb) ||
7268  (_sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_offsets[slot] != vb_offsets[slot]) ||
7269  (_sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_ids[slot].id != vb->slot.id))
7270  {
7271  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffers[slot] = vb;
7272  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_offsets[slot] = vb_offsets[slot];
7273  _sg_mtl_cur_vertexbuffer_ids[slot].id = vb->slot.id;
7274  const NSUInteger mtl_slot = SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS + slot;
7275  SOKOL_ASSERT(vb->mtl_buf[vb->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7276  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setVertexBuffer:_sg_mtl_pool[vb->mtl_buf[vb->active_slot]]
7277  offset:vb_offsets[slot]
7278  atIndex:mtl_slot];
7279  }
7280  }
7281 
7282  /* apply vertex shader images */
7283  for (slot = 0; slot < num_vs_imgs; slot++) {
7284  const _sg_image* img = vs_imgs[slot];
7285  if ((_sg_mtl_cur_vs_images[slot] != img) || (_sg_mtl_cur_vs_image_ids[slot].id != img->slot.id)) {
7286  _sg_mtl_cur_vs_images[slot] = img;
7287  _sg_mtl_cur_vs_image_ids[slot].id = img->slot.id;
7288  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->mtl_tex[img->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7289  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setVertexTexture:_sg_mtl_pool[img->mtl_tex[img->active_slot]] atIndex:slot];
7290  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->mtl_sampler_state != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7291  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setVertexSamplerState:_sg_mtl_pool[img->mtl_sampler_state] atIndex:slot];
7292  }
7293  }
7294 
7295  /* apply fragment shader images */
7296  for (slot = 0; slot < num_fs_imgs; slot++) {
7297  const _sg_image* img = fs_imgs[slot];
7298  if ((_sg_mtl_cur_fs_images[slot] != img) || (_sg_mtl_cur_fs_image_ids[slot].id != img->slot.id)) {
7299  _sg_mtl_cur_fs_images[slot] = img;
7300  _sg_mtl_cur_fs_image_ids[slot].id = img->slot.id;
7301  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->mtl_tex[img->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7302  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setFragmentTexture:_sg_mtl_pool[img->mtl_tex[img->active_slot]] atIndex:slot];
7303  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->mtl_sampler_state != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7304  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setFragmentSamplerState:_sg_mtl_pool[img->mtl_sampler_state] atIndex:slot];
7305  }
7306  }
7307 }
7308 
7309 #define _sg_mtl_roundup(val, round_to) (((val)+((round_to)-1))&~((round_to)-1))
7310 
7311 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_apply_uniform_block(sg_shader_stage stage_index, int ub_index, const void* data, int num_bytes) {
7312  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7313  if (!_sg_mtl_pass_valid) {
7314  return;
7315  }
7316  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7317  SOKOL_ASSERT(data && (num_bytes > 0));
7318  SOKOL_ASSERT((stage_index >= 0) && ((int)stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES));
7319  SOKOL_ASSERT((ub_index >= 0) && (ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS));
7320  SOKOL_ASSERT((_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset + num_bytes) <= _sg_mtl_ub_size);
7321  SOKOL_ASSERT((_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset & (_SG_MTL_UB_ALIGN-1)) == 0);
7322  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline && _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->shader);
7323  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->slot.id == _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id.id);
7324  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->shader->slot.id == _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->shader_id.id);
7325  SOKOL_ASSERT(ub_index < _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->shader->stage[stage_index].num_uniform_blocks);
7326  SOKOL_ASSERT(num_bytes <= _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->shader->stage[stage_index].uniform_blocks[ub_index].size);
7327 
7328  /* copy to global uniform buffer, record offset into cmd encoder, and advance offset */
7329  uint8_t* dst = &_sg_mtl_cur_ub_base_ptr[_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset];
7330  memcpy(dst, data, num_bytes);
7331  if (stage_index == SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS) {
7332  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setVertexBufferOffset:_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset atIndex:ub_index];
7333  }
7334  else {
7335  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder setFragmentBufferOffset:_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset atIndex:ub_index];
7336  }
7337  _sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset = _sg_mtl_roundup(_sg_mtl_cur_ub_offset + num_bytes, _SG_MTL_UB_ALIGN);
7338 }
7339 
7340 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_draw(int base_element, int num_elements, int num_instances) {
7341  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_in_pass);
7342  if (!_sg_mtl_pass_valid) {
7343  return;
7344  }
7345  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder);
7346  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline && (_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->slot.id == _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline_id.id));
7347  if (SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE != _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->index_type) {
7348  /* indexed rendering */
7349  SOKOL_ASSERT(_sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer && (_sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer->slot.id == _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_id.id));
7350  const _sg_buffer* ib = _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer;
7351  SOKOL_ASSERT(ib->mtl_buf[ib->active_slot] != _SG_MTL_INVALID_POOL_INDEX);
7352  const NSUInteger index_buffer_offset = _sg_mtl_cur_indexbuffer_offset +
7353  base_element * _sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->mtl_index_size;
7354  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder drawIndexedPrimitives:_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->mtl_prim_type
7355  indexCount:num_elements
7356  indexType:_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->mtl_index_type
7357  indexBuffer:_sg_mtl_pool[ib->mtl_buf[ib->active_slot]]
7358  indexBufferOffset:index_buffer_offset
7359  instanceCount:num_instances];
7360  }
7361  else {
7362  /* non-indexed rendering */
7363  [_sg_mtl_cmd_encoder drawPrimitives:_sg_mtl_cur_pipeline->mtl_prim_type
7364  vertexStart:base_element
7365  vertexCount:num_elements
7366  instanceCount:num_instances];
7367  }
7368 }
7369 
7370 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_update_buffer(_sg_buffer* buf, const void* data, int data_size) {
7371  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && data && (data_size > 0));
7372  if (++buf->active_slot >= buf->num_slots) {
7373  buf->active_slot = 0;
7374  }
7375  __unsafe_unretained id<MTLBuffer> mtl_buf = _sg_mtl_pool[buf->mtl_buf[buf->active_slot]];
7376  void* dst_ptr = [mtl_buf contents];
7377  memcpy(dst_ptr, data, data_size);
7378  #if !TARGET_OS_IPHONE
7379  [mtl_buf didModifyRange:NSMakeRange(0, data_size)];
7380  #endif
7381 }
7382 
7383 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_update_image(_sg_image* img, const sg_image_content* data) {
7384  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && data);
7385  if (++img->active_slot >= img->num_slots) {
7386  img->active_slot = 0;
7387  }
7388  __unsafe_unretained id<MTLTexture> mtl_tex = _sg_mtl_pool[img->mtl_tex[img->active_slot]];
7389  _sg_mtl_copy_image_content(img, mtl_tex, data);
7390 }
7391 
7392 #else
7393 #error "No rendering backend selected"
7394 #endif
7395 /*== RESOURCE POOLS ==========================================================*/
7396 typedef struct {
7397  int size;
7398  uint32_t unique_counter;
7399  int queue_top;
7400  int* free_queue;
7401 } _sg_pool;
7402 
7403 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_init_pool(_sg_pool* pool, int num) {
7404  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool && (num > 1));
7405  /* slot 0 is reserved for the 'invalid id', so bump the pool size by 1 */
7406  pool->size = num + 1;
7407  pool->queue_top = 0;
7408  pool->unique_counter = 0;
7409  /* it's not a bug to only reserve 'num' here */
7410  pool->free_queue = (int*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(int)*num);
7411  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->free_queue);
7412  /* never allocate the zero-th pool item since the invalid id is 0 */
7413  for (int i = pool->size-1; i >= 1; i--) {
7414  pool->free_queue[pool->queue_top++] = i;
7415  }
7416 }
7417 
7418 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_discard_pool(_sg_pool* pool) {
7419  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool);
7420  SOKOL_FREE(pool->free_queue);
7421  pool->free_queue = 0;
7422  pool->size = 0;
7423  pool->queue_top = 0;
7424  pool->unique_counter = 0;
7425 }
7426 
7427 _SOKOL_PRIVATE uint32_t _sg_pool_alloc_id(_sg_pool* pool) {
7428  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool);
7429  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->free_queue);
7430  if (pool->queue_top > 0) {
7431  int slot_index = pool->free_queue[--pool->queue_top];
7432  return ((pool->unique_counter++)<<_SG_SLOT_SHIFT)|slot_index;
7433  }
7434  else {
7435  /* pool exhausted */
7436  return SG_INVALID_ID;
7437  }
7438 }
7439 
7440 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_pool_free_id(_sg_pool* pool, uint32_t id) {
7441  SOKOL_ASSERT(id != SG_INVALID_ID);
7442  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool);
7443  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->free_queue);
7444  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->queue_top < pool->size);
7445  #ifdef SOKOL_DEBUG
7446  /* debug check against double-free */
7447  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(id);
7448  for (int i = 0; i < pool->queue_top; i++) {
7449  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->free_queue[i] != slot_index);
7450  }
7451  #endif
7452  pool->free_queue[pool->queue_top++] = id;
7453  SOKOL_ASSERT(pool->queue_top <= (pool->size-1));
7454 }
7455 
7456 typedef struct {
7457  _sg_pool buffer_pool;
7458  _sg_pool image_pool;
7459  _sg_pool shader_pool;
7460  _sg_pool pipeline_pool;
7461  _sg_pool pass_pool;
7462  _sg_pool context_pool;
7463  _sg_buffer* buffers;
7464  _sg_image* images;
7465  _sg_shader* shaders;
7466  _sg_pipeline* pipelines;
7467  _sg_pass* passes;
7468  _sg_context* contexts;
7469 } _sg_pools;
7470 
7471 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_setup_pools(_sg_pools* p, const sg_desc* desc) {
7472  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7473  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
7474  /* note: the pools here will have an additional item, since slot 0 is reserved */
7475  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->buffer_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->buffer_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7476  _sg_init_pool(&p->buffer_pool, _sg_def(desc->buffer_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_BUFFER_POOL_SIZE));
7477  p->buffers = (_sg_buffer*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_buffer) * p->buffer_pool.size);
7478  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->buffers);
7479  for (int i = 0; i < p->buffer_pool.size; i++) {
7480  _sg_init_buffer_slot(&p->buffers[i]);
7481  }
7482 
7483  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->image_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->image_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7484  _sg_init_pool(&p->image_pool, _sg_def(desc->image_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_IMAGE_POOL_SIZE));
7485  p->images = (_sg_image*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_image) * p->image_pool.size);
7486  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->images);
7487  for (int i = 0; i < p->image_pool.size; i++) {
7488  _sg_init_image_slot(&p->images[i]);
7489  }
7490 
7491  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->shader_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->shader_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7492  _sg_init_pool(&p->shader_pool, _sg_def(desc->shader_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_SHADER_POOL_SIZE));
7493  p->shaders = (_sg_shader*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_shader) * p->shader_pool.size);
7494  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->shaders);
7495  for (int i = 0; i < p->shader_pool.size; i++) {
7496  _sg_init_shader_slot(&p->shaders[i]);
7497  }
7498 
7499  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->pipeline_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->pipeline_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7500  _sg_init_pool(&p->pipeline_pool, _sg_def(desc->pipeline_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_PIPELINE_POOL_SIZE));
7501  p->pipelines = (_sg_pipeline*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_pipeline) * p->pipeline_pool.size);
7502  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->pipelines);
7503  for (int i = 0; i < p->pipeline_pool.size; i++) {
7504  _sg_init_pipeline_slot(&p->pipelines[i]);
7505  }
7506 
7507  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->pass_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->pass_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7508  _sg_init_pool(&p->pass_pool, _sg_def(desc->pass_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_PASS_POOL_SIZE));
7509  p->passes = (_sg_pass*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_pass) * p->pass_pool.size);
7510  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->passes);
7511  for (int i = 0; i < p->pass_pool.size; i++) {
7512  _sg_init_pass_slot(&p->passes[i]);
7513  }
7514 
7515  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->context_pool_size >= 0) && (desc->context_pool_size < _SG_MAX_POOL_SIZE));
7516  _sg_init_pool(&p->context_pool, _sg_def(desc->context_pool_size, _SG_DEFAULT_CONTEXT_POOL_SIZE));
7517  p->contexts = (_sg_context*) SOKOL_MALLOC(sizeof(_sg_context) * p->context_pool.size);
7518  SOKOL_ASSERT(p->contexts);
7519  for (int i = 0; i < p->context_pool.size; i++) {
7520  _sg_init_context_slot(&p->contexts[i]);
7521  }
7522 }
7523 
7524 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_discard_pools(_sg_pools* p) {
7525  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7526  SOKOL_FREE(p->contexts); p->contexts = 0;
7527  SOKOL_FREE(p->passes); p->passes = 0;
7528  SOKOL_FREE(p->pipelines); p->pipelines = 0;
7529  SOKOL_FREE(p->shaders); p->shaders = 0;
7530  SOKOL_FREE(p->images); p->images = 0;
7531  SOKOL_FREE(p->buffers); p->buffers = 0;
7532  _sg_discard_pool(&p->context_pool);
7533  _sg_discard_pool(&p->pass_pool);
7534  _sg_discard_pool(&p->pipeline_pool);
7535  _sg_discard_pool(&p->shader_pool);
7536  _sg_discard_pool(&p->image_pool);
7537  _sg_discard_pool(&p->buffer_pool);
7538 }
7539 
7540 /* returns pointer to resource by id without matching id check */
7541 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_buffer* _sg_buffer_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t buf_id) {
7542  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != buf_id);
7543  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(buf_id);
7544  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->buffer_pool.size));
7545  return &p->buffers[slot_index];
7546 }
7547 
7548 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_image* _sg_image_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t img_id) {
7549  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != img_id);
7550  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(img_id);
7551  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->image_pool.size));
7552  return &p->images[slot_index];
7553 }
7554 
7555 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_shader* _sg_shader_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t shd_id) {
7556  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != shd_id);
7557  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(shd_id);
7558  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->shader_pool.size));
7559  return &p->shaders[slot_index];
7560 }
7561 
7562 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_pipeline* _sg_pipeline_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t pip_id) {
7563  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != pip_id);
7564  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(pip_id);
7565  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->pipeline_pool.size));
7566  return &p->pipelines[slot_index];
7567 }
7568 
7569 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_pass* _sg_pass_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t pass_id) {
7570  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != pass_id);
7571  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(pass_id);
7572  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->pass_pool.size));
7573  return &p->passes[slot_index];
7574 }
7575 
7576 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_context* _sg_context_at(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t context_id) {
7577  SOKOL_ASSERT(p && SG_INVALID_ID != context_id);
7578  int slot_index = _sg_slot_index(context_id);
7579  SOKOL_ASSERT((slot_index >= 0) && (slot_index < p->context_pool.size));
7580  return &p->contexts[slot_index];
7581 }
7582 
7583 /* returns pointer to resource with matching id check, may return 0 */
7584 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_buffer* _sg_lookup_buffer(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t buf_id) {
7585  if (SG_INVALID_ID != buf_id) {
7586  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_buffer_at(p, buf_id);
7587  if (buf->slot.id == buf_id) {
7588  return buf;
7589  }
7590  }
7591  return 0;
7592 }
7593 
7594 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_image* _sg_lookup_image(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t img_id) {
7595  if (SG_INVALID_ID != img_id) {
7596  _sg_image* img = _sg_image_at(p, img_id);
7597  if (img->slot.id == img_id) {
7598  return img;
7599  }
7600  }
7601  return 0;
7602 }
7603 
7604 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_shader* _sg_lookup_shader(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t shd_id) {
7605  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7606  if (SG_INVALID_ID != shd_id) {
7607  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_shader_at(p, shd_id);
7608  if (shd->slot.id == shd_id) {
7609  return shd;
7610  }
7611  }
7612  return 0;
7613 }
7614 
7615 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_pipeline* _sg_lookup_pipeline(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t pip_id) {
7616  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7617  if (SG_INVALID_ID != pip_id) {
7618  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_pipeline_at(p, pip_id);
7619  if (pip->slot.id == pip_id) {
7620  return pip;
7621  }
7622  }
7623  return 0;
7624 }
7625 
7626 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_pass* _sg_lookup_pass(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t pass_id) {
7627  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7628  if (SG_INVALID_ID != pass_id) {
7629  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_pass_at(p, pass_id);
7630  if (pass->slot.id == pass_id) {
7631  return pass;
7632  }
7633  }
7634  return 0;
7635 }
7636 
7637 _SOKOL_PRIVATE _sg_context* _sg_lookup_context(const _sg_pools* p, uint32_t ctx_id) {
7638  SOKOL_ASSERT(p);
7639  if (SG_INVALID_ID != ctx_id) {
7640  _sg_context* ctx = _sg_context_at(p, ctx_id);
7641  if (ctx->slot.id == ctx_id) {
7642  return ctx;
7643  }
7644  }
7645  return 0;
7646 }
7647 
7648 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_destroy_all_resources(_sg_pools* p, uint32_t ctx_id) {
7649  /* this is a bit dumb since it loops over all pool slots to
7650  find the occupied slots, on the other hand it is only ever
7651  executed at shutdown
7652  */
7653  for (int i = 0; i < p->buffer_pool.size; i++) {
7654  if (p->buffers[i].slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
7655  if (p->buffers[i].slot.ctx_id == ctx_id) {
7656  _sg_destroy_buffer(&p->buffers[i]);
7657  }
7658  }
7659  }
7660  for (int i = 0; i < p->image_pool.size; i++) {
7661  if (p->images[i].slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
7662  if (p->images[i].slot.ctx_id == ctx_id) {
7663  _sg_destroy_image(&p->images[i]);
7664  }
7665  }
7666  }
7667  for (int i = 0; i < p->shader_pool.size; i++) {
7668  if (p->shaders[i].slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
7669  if (p->shaders[i].slot.ctx_id == ctx_id) {
7670  _sg_destroy_shader(&p->shaders[i]);
7671  }
7672  }
7673  }
7674  for (int i = 0; i < p->pipeline_pool.size; i++) {
7675  if (p->pipelines[i].slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
7676  if (p->pipelines[i].slot.ctx_id == ctx_id) {
7677  _sg_destroy_pipeline(&p->pipelines[i]);
7678  }
7679  }
7680  }
7681  for (int i = 0; i < p->pass_pool.size; i++) {
7682  if (p->passes[i].slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
7683  if (p->passes[i].slot.ctx_id == ctx_id) {
7684  _sg_destroy_pass(&p->passes[i]);
7685  }
7686  }
7687  }
7688 }
7689 
7690 /*== VALIDATION LAYER ========================================================*/
7691 #if defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
7692 typedef enum {
7693  /* special case 'validation was successful' */
7694  _SG_VALIDATE_SUCCESS,
7695 
7696  /* buffer creation */
7697  _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CANARY,
7698  _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_SIZE,
7699  _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CONTENT,
7700  _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_NO_CONTENT,
7701 
7702  /* image creation */
7703  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CANARY,
7704  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_WIDTH,
7705  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_HEIGHT,
7706  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_PIXELFORMAT,
7707  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NONRT_PIXELFORMAT,
7708  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_MSAA_BUT_NO_RT,
7709  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_MSAA_RT_SUPPORT,
7710  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_IMMUTABLE,
7711  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_NO_CONTENT,
7712  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CONTENT,
7713  _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_CONTENT,
7714 
7715  /* shader creation */
7716  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_CANARY,
7717  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE,
7718  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_BYTECODE,
7719  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE_OR_BYTECODE,
7720  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_BYTECODE_SIZE,
7721  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UBS,
7722  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_IMGS,
7723  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UB_MEMBERS,
7724  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_UB_MEMBERS,
7725  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_MEMBER_NAME,
7726  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_SIZE_MISMATCH,
7727  _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_IMG_NAME,
7728 
7729  /* pipeline creation */
7730  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_CANARY,
7731  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_SHADER,
7732  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_NO_ATTRS,
7733  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_LAYOUT_STRIDE4,
7734  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_NAME,
7735  _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_SEMANTICS,
7736 
7737  /* pass creation */
7738  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_CANARY,
7739  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_COLOR_ATTS,
7740  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_CONT_COLOR_ATTS,
7741  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE,
7742  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_MIPLEVEL,
7743  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_FACE,
7744  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_LAYER,
7745  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_SLICE,
7746  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_NO_RT,
7747  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_PIXELFORMATS,
7748  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_INV_PIXELFORMAT,
7749  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_DEPTH_INV_PIXELFORMAT,
7750  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES,
7751  _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SAMPLE_COUNTS,
7752 
7753  /* sg_begin_pass validation */
7754  _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_PASS,
7755  _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE,
7756 
7757  /* sg_apply_draw_state validation */
7758  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_PIP,
7759  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VBS,
7760  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VB_TYPE,
7761  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_NO_IB,
7762  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB,
7763  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB_TYPE,
7764  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMGS,
7765  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMG_TYPES,
7766  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMGS,
7767  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMG_TYPES,
7768  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_ATT_COUNT,
7769  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_COLOR_FORMAT,
7770  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_DEPTH_FORMAT,
7771  _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_SAMPLE_COUNT,
7772 
7773  /* sg_apply_uniform_block validation */
7774  _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_PIPELINE,
7775  _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_UB_AT_SLOT,
7776  _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_SIZE,
7777 
7778  /* sg_update_buffer validation */
7779  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_USAGE,
7780  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_SIZE,
7781  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_ONCE,
7782 
7783  /* sg_update_image validation */
7784  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_USAGE,
7785  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_NOTENOUGHDATA,
7786  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_SIZE,
7787  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_COMPRESSED,
7788  _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_ONCE
7789 
7790 } _sg_validate_error;
7791 
7792 /* return a human readable string for an _sg_validate_error */
7793 _SOKOL_PRIVATE const char* _sg_validate_string(_sg_validate_error err) {
7794  switch (err) {
7795  /* buffer creation validation errors */
7796  case _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CANARY: return "sg_buffer_desc not initialized";
7797  case _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_SIZE: return "sg_buffer_desc.size cannot be 0";
7798  case _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CONTENT: return "immutable buffers must be initialized with content (sg_buffer_desc.content)";
7799  case _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_NO_CONTENT: return "dynamic/stream usage buffers cannot be initialized with content";
7800 
7801  /* image creation validation errros */
7802  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CANARY: return "sg_image_desc not initialized";
7803  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_WIDTH: return "sg_image_desc.width must be > 0";
7804  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_HEIGHT: return "sg_image_desc.height must be > 0";
7805  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_PIXELFORMAT: return "invalid pixel format for render-target image";
7806  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NONRT_PIXELFORMAT: return "invalid pixel format for non-render-target image";
7807  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_MSAA_BUT_NO_RT: return "non-render-target images cannot be multisampled";
7808  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_MSAA_RT_SUPPORT: return "MSAA render targets not supported (SG_FEATURE_MSAA_RENDER_TARGETS)";
7809  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_IMMUTABLE: return "render target images must be SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE";
7810  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_NO_CONTENT: return "render target images cannot be initialized with content";
7811  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CONTENT: return "missing or invalid content for immutable image";
7812  case _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_CONTENT: return "dynamic/stream usage images cannot be initialized with content";
7813 
7814  /* shader creation */
7815  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_CANARY: return "sg_shader_desc not initialized";
7816  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE: return "shader source code required";
7817  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_BYTECODE: return "shader byte code required";
7818  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE_OR_BYTECODE: return "shader source or byte code required";
7819  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_BYTECODE_SIZE: return "shader byte code length (in bytes) required";
7820  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UBS: return "shader uniform blocks must occupy continuous slots";
7821  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UB_MEMBERS: return "uniform block members must occupy continuous slots";
7822  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_UB_MEMBERS: return "GL backend requires uniform block member declarations";
7823  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_MEMBER_NAME: return "uniform block member name missing";
7824  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_SIZE_MISMATCH: return "size of uniform block members doesn't match uniform block size";
7825  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_IMGS: return "shader images must occupy continuous slots";
7826  case _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_IMG_NAME: return "GL backend requires uniform block member names";
7827 
7828  /* pipeline creation */
7829  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_CANARY: return "sg_pipeline_desc not initialized";
7830  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_SHADER: return "sg_pipeline_desc.shader missing or invalid";
7831  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_NO_ATTRS: return "sg_pipeline_desc.layout.attrs is empty or not continuous";
7832  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_LAYOUT_STRIDE4: return "sg_pipeline_desc.layout.buffers[].stride must be multiple of 4";
7833  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_NAME: return "GLES2/WebGL vertex layouts must have attribute names";
7834  case _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_SEMANTICS: return "D3D11 vertex layouts must have attribute semantics (sem_name and sem_index)";
7835 
7836  /* pass creation */
7837  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_CANARY: return "sg_pass_desc not initialized";
7838  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_COLOR_ATTS: return "sg_pass_desc.color_attachments[0] must be valid";
7839  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_CONT_COLOR_ATTS: return "color attachments must occupy continuous slots";
7840  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE: return "pass attachment image is not valid";
7841  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_MIPLEVEL: return "pass attachment mip level is bigger than image has mipmaps";
7842  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_FACE: return "pass attachment image is cubemap, but face index is too big";
7843  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_LAYER: return "pass attachment image is array texture, but layer index is too big";
7844  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_SLICE: return "pass attachment image is 3d texture, but slice value is too big";
7845  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_NO_RT: return "pass attachment image must be render targets";
7846  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_PIXELFORMATS: return "all pass color attachment images must have the same pixel format";
7847  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_INV_PIXELFORMAT: return "pass color-attachment images must have a renderable pixel format";
7848  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_DEPTH_INV_PIXELFORMAT: return "pass depth-attachment image must have depth pixel format";
7849  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES: return "all pass attachments must have the same size";
7850  case _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SAMPLE_COUNTS: return "all pass attachments must have the same sample count";
7851 
7852  /* sg_begin_pass */
7853  case _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_PASS: return "sg_begin_pass: pass must be valid";
7854  case _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE: return "sg_begin_pass: one or more attachment images are not valid";
7855 
7856  /* sg_apply_draw_state */
7857  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_PIP: return "sg_apply_draw_state: pipeline object required";
7858  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VBS: return "sg_apply_draw_state: number of vertex buffers doesn't match number of pipeline vertex layouts";
7859  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VB_TYPE: return "sg_apply_draw_state: buffer in vertex buffer slot is not a SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER";
7860  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_NO_IB: return "sg_apply_draw_state: pipeline object defines indexed rendering, but no index buffer provided";
7861  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB: return "sg_apply_draw_state: pipeline object defines non-indexed rendering, but index buffer provided";
7862  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB_TYPE: return "sg_apply_draw_state: buffer in index buffer slot is not a SG_BUFFERTYPE_INDEXBUFFER";
7863  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMGS: return "sg_apply_draw_state: vertex shader image count doesn't match sg_shader_desc";
7864  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMG_TYPES: return "sg_apply_draw_state: one or more vertex shader image types don't match sg_shader_desc";
7865  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMGS: return "sg_apply_draw_state: fragment shader image count doesn't match sg_shader_desc";
7866  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMG_TYPES: return "sg_apply_draw_state: one or more fragment shader image types don't match sg_shader_desc";
7867  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_ATT_COUNT: return "sg_apply_draw_state: color_attachment_count in pipeline doesn't match number of pass color attachments";
7868  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_COLOR_FORMAT: return "sg_apply_draw_state: color_format in pipeline doesn't match pass color attachment pixel format";
7869  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_DEPTH_FORMAT: return "sg_apply_draw_state: depth_format in pipeline doesn't match pass depth attachment pixel format";
7870  case _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_SAMPLE_COUNT: return "sg_apply_draw_state: MSAA sample count in pipeline doesn't match render pass attachment sample count";
7871 
7872  /* sg_apply_uniform_block */
7873  case _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_PIPELINE: return "sg_apply_uniform_block: must be called after sg_apply_draw_state()";
7874  case _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_UB_AT_SLOT: return "sg_apply_uniform_block: no uniform block declaration at this shader stage UB slot";
7875  case _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_SIZE: return "sg_apply_uniform_block: data size exceeds declared uniform block size";
7876 
7877  /* sg_update_buffer */
7878  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_USAGE: return "sg_update_buffer: cannot update immutable buffer";
7879  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_SIZE: return "sg_update_buffer: update size is bigger than buffer size";
7880  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_ONCE: return "sg_update_buffer: only one update allowed per buffer and frame";
7881 
7882  /* sg_update_image */
7883  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_USAGE: return "sg_update_image: cannot update immutable image";
7884  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_NOTENOUGHDATA: return "sg_update_image: not enough subimage data provided";
7885  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_SIZE: return "sg_update_image: provided subimage data size too big";
7886  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_COMPRESSED: return "sg_update_image: cannot update images with compressed format";
7887  case _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_ONCE: return "sg_update_image: only one update allowed per image and frame";
7888 
7889  default: return "unknown validation error";
7890  }
7891 }
7892 #endif /* defined(SOKOL_DEBUG) */
7893 
7894 /*-- generic backend state ---------------------------------------------------*/
7895 typedef struct {
7896  _sg_pools pools;
7897  bool valid;
7898  uint32_t frame_index;
7899  sg_context active_context;
7900  sg_pass cur_pass;
7901  sg_pipeline cur_pipeline;
7902  bool pass_valid;
7903  bool next_draw_valid;
7904  #if defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
7905  _sg_validate_error validate_error;
7906  #endif
7907 } _sg_state;
7908 static _sg_state _sg;
7909 
7910 /*-- validation checks -------------------------------------------------------*/
7911 #if defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
7912 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_validate_begin() {
7913  _sg.validate_error = _SG_VALIDATE_SUCCESS;
7914 }
7915 
7916 _SOKOL_PRIVATE void _sg_validate(bool cond, _sg_validate_error err) {
7917  if (!cond) {
7918  _sg.validate_error = err;
7919  SOKOL_LOG(_sg_validate_string(err));
7920  }
7921 }
7922 
7923 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_end() {
7924  if (_sg.validate_error != _SG_VALIDATE_SUCCESS) {
7925  #if !defined(SOKOL_VALIDATE_NON_FATAL)
7926  SOKOL_LOG("^^^^ VALIDATION FAILED, TERMINATING ^^^^");
7927  SOKOL_ASSERT(false);
7928  #endif
7929  return false;
7930  }
7931  else {
7932  return true;
7933  }
7934 }
7935 #endif
7936 
7937 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_buffer_desc(const sg_buffer_desc* desc) {
7938  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
7939  _SOKOL_UNUSED(desc);
7940  return true;
7941  #else
7942  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
7943  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
7944  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_start_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CANARY);
7945  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_end_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CANARY);
7946  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->size > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_SIZE);
7947  bool ext = (0 != desc->gl_buffers[0]) || (0 != desc->mtl_buffers[0]) || (0 != desc->d3d11_buffer);
7948  if (!ext && (_sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE) == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE)) {
7949  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != desc->content, _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_CONTENT);
7950  }
7951  else {
7952  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 == desc->content, _SG_VALIDATE_BUFFERDESC_NO_CONTENT);
7953  }
7954  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
7955  #endif
7956 }
7957 
7958 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_image_desc(const sg_image_desc* desc) {
7959  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
7960  _SOKOL_UNUSED(desc);
7961  return true;
7962  #else
7963  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
7964  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
7965  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_start_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CANARY);
7966  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_end_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CANARY);
7967  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->width > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_WIDTH);
7968  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->height > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_HEIGHT);
7969  const sg_pixel_format fmt = _sg_def(desc->pixel_format, SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8);
7970  const sg_usage usage = _sg_def(desc->usage, SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE);
7971  const bool ext = (0 != desc->gl_textures[0]) || (0 != desc->mtl_textures[0]) || (0 != desc->d3d11_texture);
7972  if (desc->render_target) {
7973  if (desc->sample_count > 1) {
7974  SOKOL_VALIDATE(_sg_query_feature(SG_FEATURE_MSAA_RENDER_TARGETS), _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_MSAA_RT_SUPPORT);
7975  }
7976  const bool valid_color_fmt = _sg_is_valid_rendertarget_color_format(fmt);
7977  const bool valid_depth_fmt = _sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(fmt);
7978  SOKOL_VALIDATE(valid_color_fmt || valid_depth_fmt, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_PIXELFORMAT);
7979  SOKOL_VALIDATE(usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_IMMUTABLE);
7980  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->content.subimage[0][0].ptr==0, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_RT_NO_CONTENT);
7981  }
7982  else {
7983  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->sample_count <= 1, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_MSAA_BUT_NO_RT);
7984  const bool valid_nonrt_fmt = !_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(fmt);
7985  SOKOL_VALIDATE(valid_nonrt_fmt, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NONRT_PIXELFORMAT);
7986  /* FIXME: should use the same "expected size" computation as in _sg_validate_update_image() here */
7987  if (!ext && (usage == SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE)) {
7988  const int num_faces = _sg_def(desc->type, SG_IMAGETYPE_2D)==SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE ? 6:1;
7989  const int num_mips = _sg_def(desc->num_mipmaps, 1);
7990  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < num_faces; face_index++) {
7991  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < num_mips; mip_index++) {
7992  const bool has_data = desc->content.subimage[face_index][mip_index].ptr != 0;
7993  const bool has_size = desc->content.subimage[face_index][mip_index].size > 0;
7994  SOKOL_VALIDATE(has_data && has_size, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_CONTENT);
7995  }
7996  }
7997  }
7998  else {
7999  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < SG_CUBEFACE_NUM; face_index++) {
8000  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < SG_MAX_MIPMAPS; mip_index++) {
8001  const bool no_data = 0 == desc->content.subimage[face_index][mip_index].ptr;
8002  const bool no_size = 0 == desc->content.subimage[face_index][mip_index].size;
8003  SOKOL_VALIDATE(no_data && no_size, _SG_VALIDATE_IMAGEDESC_NO_CONTENT);
8004  }
8005  }
8006  }
8007  }
8008  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8009  #endif
8010 }
8011 
8012 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_shader_desc(const sg_shader_desc* desc) {
8013  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
