8014  _SOKOL_UNUSED(desc);
8015  return true;
8016  #else
8017  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8018  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8019  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_start_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_CANARY);
8020  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_end_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_CANARY);
8021  #if defined(SOKOL_GLCORE33) || defined(SOKOL_GLES2) || defined(SOKOL_GLES3)
8022  /* on GL, must provide shader source code */
8023  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != desc->vs.source, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE);
8024  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != desc->fs.source, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE);
8025  #elif defined(SOKOL_METAL) || defined(SOKOL_D3D11_SHADER_COMPILER)
8026  /* on Metal or D3D with shader compiler, must provide shader source code or byte code */
8027  SOKOL_VALIDATE((0 != desc->vs.source)||(0 != desc->vs.byte_code), _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE_OR_BYTECODE);
8028  SOKOL_VALIDATE((0 != desc->fs.source)||(0 != desc->fs.byte_code), _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_SOURCE_OR_BYTECODE);
8029  #else
8030  /* on D3D11 without shader compiler, must provide byte code */
8031  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != desc->vs.byte_code, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_BYTECODE);
8032  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != desc->fs.byte_code, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_BYTECODE);
8033  #endif
8034  /* if shader byte code, the size must also be provided */
8035  if (0 != desc->vs.byte_code) {
8036  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->vs.byte_code_size > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_BYTECODE_SIZE);
8037  }
8038  if (0 != desc->fs.byte_code) {
8039  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->fs.byte_code_size > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_BYTECODE_SIZE);
8040  }
8041  for (int stage_index = 0; stage_index < SG_NUM_SHADER_STAGES; stage_index++) {
8042  const sg_shader_stage_desc* stage_desc = (stage_index == 0)? &desc->vs : &desc->fs;
8043  bool uniform_blocks_continuous = true;
8044  for (int ub_index = 0; ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS; ub_index++) {
8045  const sg_shader_uniform_block_desc* ub_desc = &stage_desc->uniform_blocks[ub_index];
8046  if (ub_desc->size > 0) {
8047  SOKOL_VALIDATE(uniform_blocks_continuous, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UBS);
8048  bool uniforms_continuous = true;
8049  int uniform_offset = 0;
8050  int num_uniforms = 0;
8051  for (int u_index = 0; u_index < SG_MAX_UB_MEMBERS; u_index++) {
8052  const sg_shader_uniform_desc* u_desc = &ub_desc->uniforms[u_index];
8053  if (u_desc->type != SG_UNIFORMTYPE_INVALID) {
8054  SOKOL_VALIDATE(uniforms_continuous, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_UB_MEMBERS);
8055  #if defined(SOKOL_GLES2) || defined(SOKOL_GLES3)
8056  SOKOL_VALIDATE(u_desc->name, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_MEMBER_NAME);
8057  #endif
8058  const int array_count = _sg_def(u_desc->array_count, 1);
8059  uniform_offset += _sg_uniform_size(u_desc->type, array_count);
8060  num_uniforms++;
8061  }
8062  else {
8063  uniforms_continuous = false;
8064  }
8065  }
8066  #if defined(SOKOL_GLCORE33) || defined(SOKOL_GLES2) || defined(SOKOL_GLES3)
8067  SOKOL_VALIDATE(uniform_offset == ub_desc->size, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_UB_SIZE_MISMATCH);
8068  SOKOL_VALIDATE(num_uniforms > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_UB_MEMBERS);
8069  #endif
8070  }
8071  else {
8072  uniform_blocks_continuous = false;
8073  }
8074  }
8075  bool images_continuous = true;
8076  for (int img_index = 0; img_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; img_index++) {
8077  const sg_shader_image_desc* img_desc = &stage_desc->images[img_index];
8078  if (img_desc->type != _SG_IMAGETYPE_DEFAULT) {
8079  SOKOL_VALIDATE(images_continuous, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_NO_CONT_IMGS);
8080  #if defined(SOKOL_GLES2)
8081  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img_desc->name, _SG_VALIDATE_SHADERDESC_IMG_NAME);
8082  #endif
8083  }
8084  else {
8085  images_continuous = false;
8086  }
8087  }
8088  }
8089  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8090  #endif
8091 }
8092 
8093 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_pipeline_desc(const sg_pipeline_desc* desc) {
8094  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8095  _SOKOL_UNUSED(desc);
8096  return true;
8097  #else
8098  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8099  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8100  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_start_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_CANARY);
8101  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_end_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_CANARY);
8102  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->shader.id != SG_INVALID_ID, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_SHADER);
8103  const _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, desc->shader.id);
8104  SOKOL_VALIDATE(shd && shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_SHADER);
8105  for (int buf_index = 0; buf_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; buf_index++) {
8106  const sg_buffer_layout_desc* l_desc = &desc->layout.buffers[buf_index];
8107  if (l_desc->stride == 0) {
8108  continue;
8109  }
8110  SOKOL_VALIDATE((l_desc->stride & 3) == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_LAYOUT_STRIDE4);
8111  }
8112  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->layout.attrs[0].format != SG_VERTEXFORMAT_INVALID, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_NO_ATTRS);
8113  bool attrs_cont = true;
8114  for (int attr_index = 0; attr_index < SG_MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTES; attr_index++) {
8115  const sg_vertex_attr_desc* a_desc = &desc->layout.attrs[attr_index];
8116  if (a_desc->format == SG_VERTEXFORMAT_INVALID) {
8117  attrs_cont = false;
8118  continue;
8119  }
8120  SOKOL_VALIDATE(attrs_cont, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_NO_ATTRS);
8121  SOKOL_ASSERT(a_desc->buffer_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS);
8122  #if defined(SOKOL_GLES2)
8123  /* on GLES2, vertex attribute names must be provided */
8124  SOKOL_VALIDATE(a_desc->name, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_NAME);
8125  #elif defined(SOKOL_D3D11)
8126  /* on D3D11, semantic names (and semantic indices) must be provided */
8127  SOKOL_VALIDATE(a_desc->sem_name, _SG_VALIDATE_PIPELINEDESC_ATTR_SEMANTICS);
8128  #endif
8129  }
8130  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8131  #endif
8132 }
8133 
8134 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_pass_desc(const sg_pass_desc* desc) {
8135  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8136  _SOKOL_UNUSED(desc);
8137  return true;
8138  #else
8139  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8140  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8141  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_start_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_CANARY);
8142  SOKOL_VALIDATE(desc->_end_canary == 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_CANARY);
8143  bool atts_cont = true;
8144  sg_pixel_format color_fmt = SG_PIXELFORMAT_NONE;
8145  int width = -1, height = -1, sample_count = -1;
8146  for (int att_index = 0; att_index < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; att_index++) {
8147  const sg_attachment_desc* att = &desc->color_attachments[att_index];
8148  if (att->image.id == SG_INVALID_ID) {
8149  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att_index > 0, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_COLOR_ATTS);
8150  atts_cont = false;
8151  continue;
8152  }
8153  SOKOL_VALIDATE(atts_cont, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_NO_CONT_COLOR_ATTS);
8154  const _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, att->image.id);
8155  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img && img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE);
8156  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->mip_level < img->num_mipmaps, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_MIPLEVEL);
8157  if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) {
8158  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->face < 6, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_FACE);
8159  }
8160  else if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY) {
8161  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->layer < img->depth, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_LAYER);
8162  }
8163  else if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_3D) {
8164  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->slice < img->depth, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_SLICE);
8165  }
8166  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->render_target, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_NO_RT);
8167  if (att_index == 0) {
8168  color_fmt = img->pixel_format;
8169  width = img->width >> att->mip_level;
8170  height = img->height >> att->mip_level;
8171  sample_count = img->sample_count;
8172  }
8173  else {
8174  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->pixel_format == color_fmt, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_PIXELFORMATS);
8175  SOKOL_VALIDATE(width == img->width >> att->mip_level, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES);
8176  SOKOL_VALIDATE(height == img->height >> att->mip_level, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES);
8177  SOKOL_VALIDATE(sample_count == img->sample_count, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SAMPLE_COUNTS);
8178  }
8179  SOKOL_VALIDATE(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_color_format(img->pixel_format), _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_COLOR_INV_PIXELFORMAT);
8180  }
8181  if (desc->depth_stencil_attachment.image.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8182  const sg_attachment_desc* att = &desc->depth_stencil_attachment;
8183  const _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, att->image.id);
8184  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img && img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE);
8185  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->mip_level < img->num_mipmaps, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_MIPLEVEL);
8186  if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) {
8187  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->face < 6, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_FACE);
8188  }
8189  else if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_ARRAY) {
8190  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->layer < img->depth, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_LAYER);
8191  }
8192  else if (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_3D) {
8193  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->slice < img->depth, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_SLICE);
8194  }
8195  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->render_target, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_NO_RT);
8196  SOKOL_VALIDATE(width == img->width >> att->mip_level, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES);
8197  SOKOL_VALIDATE(height == img->height >> att->mip_level, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SIZES);
8198  SOKOL_VALIDATE(sample_count == img->sample_count, _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_IMAGE_SAMPLE_COUNTS);
8199  SOKOL_VALIDATE(_sg_is_valid_rendertarget_depth_format(img->pixel_format), _SG_VALIDATE_PASSDESC_DEPTH_INV_PIXELFORMAT);
8200  }
8201  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8202  #endif
8203 }
8204 
8205 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_begin_pass(_sg_pass* pass) {
8206  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8207  _SOKOL_UNUSED(pass);
8208  return true;
8209  #else
8210  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8211  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_PASS);
8212  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
8213  const _sg_attachment* att = &pass->color_atts[i];
8214  if (att->image) {
8215  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->image->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE);
8216  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->image->slot.id == att->image_id.id, _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE);
8217  }
8218  }
8219  if (pass->ds_att.image) {
8220  const _sg_attachment* att = &pass->ds_att;
8221  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->image->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID, _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE);
8222  SOKOL_VALIDATE(att->image->slot.id == att->image_id.id, _SG_VALIDATE_BEGINPASS_IMAGE);
8223  }
8224  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8225  #endif
8226 }
8227 
8228 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_draw_state(const sg_draw_state* ds) {
8229  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8230  _SOKOL_UNUSED(ds);
8231  return true;
8232  #else
8233  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8234  /* has pipeline and pipeline still exists */
8235  SOKOL_VALIDATE(ds->pipeline.id != SG_INVALID_ID, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_PIP);
8236  const _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, ds->pipeline.id);
8237  if (!pip) {
8238  /* cannot continue with validation without pipeline object */
8239  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8240  }
8241  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->shader);
8242 
8243  /* has expected vertex buffers, and vertex buffers still exist */
8244  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; i++) {
8245  if (ds->vertex_buffers[i].id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8246  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->vertex_layout_valid[i], _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VBS);
8247  /* buffers in vertex-buffer-slots must be of type SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER */
8248  const _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, ds->vertex_buffers[i].id);
8249  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf);
8250  if (buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
8251  SOKOL_VALIDATE(SG_BUFFERTYPE_VERTEXBUFFER == buf->type, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VB_TYPE);
8252  }
8253  }
8254  else {
8255  /* vertex buffer provided in a slot which has no vertex layout in pipeline */
8256  SOKOL_VALIDATE(!pip->vertex_layout_valid[i], _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VBS);
8257  }
8258  }
8259 
8260  /* index buffer expected or not, and index buffer still exists */
8261  if (pip->index_type == SG_INDEXTYPE_NONE) {
8262  /* pipeline defines non-indexed rendering, but index buffer provided */
8263  SOKOL_VALIDATE(ds->index_buffer.id == SG_INVALID_ID, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB);
8264  }
8265  else {
8266  /* pipeline defines indexed rendering, but no index buffer provided */
8267  SOKOL_VALIDATE(ds->index_buffer.id != SG_INVALID_ID, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_NO_IB);
8268  }
8269  if (ds->index_buffer.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8270  /* buffer in index-buffer-slot must be of type SG_BUFFERTYPE_INDEXBUFFER */
8271  const _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, ds->index_buffer.id);
8272  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf);
8273  if (buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
8274  SOKOL_VALIDATE(SG_BUFFERTYPE_INDEXBUFFER == buf->type, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_IB_TYPE);
8275  }
8276  }
8277 
8278  /* has expected vertex shader images */
8279  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++) {
8280  _sg_shader_stage* stage = &pip->shader->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS];
8281  if (ds->vs_images[i].id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8282  SOKOL_VALIDATE(i < stage->num_images, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMGS);
8283  const _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, ds->vs_images[i].id);
8284  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
8285  if (img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
8286  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->type == stage->images[i].type, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMG_TYPES);
8287  }
8288  }
8289  else {
8290  SOKOL_VALIDATE(i >= stage->num_images, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_VS_IMGS);
8291  }
8292  }
8293 
8294  /* has expected fragment shader images */
8295  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++) {
8296  _sg_shader_stage* stage = &pip->shader->stage[SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS];
8297  if (ds->fs_images[i].id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8298  SOKOL_VALIDATE(i < stage->num_images, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMGS);
8299  const _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, ds->fs_images[i].id);
8300  SOKOL_ASSERT(img);
8301  if (img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID) {
8302  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->type == stage->images[i].type, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMG_TYPES);
8303  }
8304  }
8305  else {
8306  SOKOL_VALIDATE(i >= stage->num_images, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_FS_IMGS);
8307  }
8308  }
8309 
8310  /* check that pipeline attributes match current pass attributes */
8311  const _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, _sg.cur_pass.id);
8312  if (pass) {
8313  /* an offscreen pass */
8314  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->color_attachment_count == pass->num_color_atts, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_ATT_COUNT);
8315  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->color_format == pass->color_atts[0].image->pixel_format, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_COLOR_FORMAT);
8316  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->sample_count == pass->color_atts[0].image->sample_count, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_SAMPLE_COUNT);
8317  if (pass->ds_att.image) {
8318  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->depth_format == pass->ds_att.image->pixel_format, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_DEPTH_FORMAT);
8319  }
8320  else {
8321  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->depth_format == SG_PIXELFORMAT_NONE, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_DEPTH_FORMAT);
8322  }
8323  }
8324  else {
8325  /* default pass */
8326  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->color_attachment_count == 1, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_ATT_COUNT);
8327  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->color_format == SG_PIXELFORMAT_RGBA8, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_COLOR_FORMAT);
8328  SOKOL_VALIDATE(pip->depth_format == SG_PIXELFORMAT_DEPTHSTENCIL, _SG_VALIDATE_ADS_DEPTH_FORMAT);
8329  /* FIXME: hmm, we don't know if the default framebuffer is multisampled here */
8330  }
8331  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8332  #endif
8333 }
8334 
8335 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_apply_uniform_block(sg_shader_stage stage_index, int ub_index, const void* data, int num_bytes) {
8336  _SOKOL_UNUSED(data);
8337  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8338  _SOKOL_UNUSED(stage_index);
8339  _SOKOL_UNUSED(ub_index);
8340  _SOKOL_UNUSED(num_bytes);
8341  return true;
8342  #else
8343  SOKOL_ASSERT((stage_index == SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS) || (stage_index == SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS));
8344  SOKOL_ASSERT((ub_index >= 0) && (ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS));
8345  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8346  SOKOL_VALIDATE(_sg.cur_pipeline.id != SG_INVALID_ID, _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_PIPELINE);
8347  const _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, _sg.cur_pipeline.id);
8348  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && (pip->slot.id == _sg.cur_pipeline.id));
8349  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->shader && (pip->shader->slot.id == pip->shader_id.id));
8350 
8351  /* check that there is a uniform block at 'stage' and 'ub_index' */
8352  const _sg_shader_stage* stage = &pip->shader->stage[stage_index];
8353  SOKOL_VALIDATE(ub_index < stage->num_uniform_blocks, _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_NO_UB_AT_SLOT);
8354 
8355  /* check that the provided data size doesn't exceed the uniform block size */
8356  SOKOL_VALIDATE(num_bytes <= stage->uniform_blocks[ub_index].size, _SG_VALIDATE_AUB_SIZE);
8357 
8358  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8359  #endif
8360 }
8361 
8362 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_update_buffer(const _sg_buffer* buf, const void* data, int size) {
8363  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8364  _SOKOL_UNUSED(buf);
8365  _SOKOL_UNUSED(data);
8366  _SOKOL_UNUSED(size);
8367  return true;
8368  #else
8369  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && data);
8370  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8371  SOKOL_VALIDATE(buf->usage != SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_USAGE);
8372  SOKOL_VALIDATE(buf->size >= size, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_SIZE);
8373  SOKOL_VALIDATE(buf->upd_frame_index != _sg.frame_index, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDBUF_ONCE);
8374  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8375  #endif
8376 }
8377 
8378 _SOKOL_PRIVATE bool _sg_validate_update_image(const _sg_image* img, const sg_image_content* data) {
8379  #if !defined(SOKOL_DEBUG)
8380  _SOKOL_UNUSED(img);
8381  _SOKOL_UNUSED(data);
8382  return true;
8383  #else
8384  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && data);
8385  SOKOL_VALIDATE_BEGIN();
8386  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->usage != SG_USAGE_IMMUTABLE, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_USAGE);
8387  SOKOL_VALIDATE(img->upd_frame_index != _sg.frame_index, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_ONCE);
8388  SOKOL_VALIDATE(!_sg_is_compressed_pixel_format(img->pixel_format), _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_COMPRESSED);
8389  const int num_faces = (img->type == SG_IMAGETYPE_CUBE) ? 6 : 1;
8390  const int num_mips = img->num_mipmaps;
8391  for (int face_index = 0; face_index < num_faces; face_index++) {
8392  for (int mip_index = 0; mip_index < num_mips; mip_index++) {
8393  SOKOL_VALIDATE(0 != data->subimage[face_index][mip_index].ptr, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_NOTENOUGHDATA);
8394  const int mip_width = _sg_max(img->width >> mip_index, 1);
8395  const int mip_height = _sg_max(img->height >> mip_index, 1);
8396  const int bytes_per_slice = _sg_surface_pitch(img->pixel_format, mip_width, mip_height);
8397  const int expected_size = bytes_per_slice * img->depth;
8398  SOKOL_VALIDATE(data->subimage[face_index][mip_index].size <= expected_size, _SG_VALIDATE_UPDIMG_SIZE);
8399  }
8400  }
8401  return SOKOL_VALIDATE_END();
8402  #endif
8403 }
8404 
8405 /*== PUBLIC API FUNCTIONS ====================================================*/
8406 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_setup(const sg_desc* desc) {
8407  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8408  SOKOL_ASSERT((desc->_start_canary == 0) && (desc->_end_canary == 0));
8409  memset(&_sg, 0, sizeof(_sg));
8410  _sg_setup_pools(&_sg.pools, desc);
8411  _sg.frame_index = 1;
8412  _sg.next_draw_valid = false;
8413  _sg_setup_backend(desc);
8414  sg_setup_context();
8415  _sg.valid = true;
8416 }
8417 
8418 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_shutdown(void) {
8419  /* can only delete resources for the currently set context here, if multiple
8420  contexts are used, the app code must take care of properly releasing them
8421  (since only the app code can switch between 3D-API contexts)
8422  */
8423  if (_sg.active_context.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8424  _sg_context* ctx = _sg_lookup_context(&_sg.pools, _sg.active_context.id);
8425  if (ctx) {
8426  _sg_destroy_all_resources(&_sg.pools, _sg.active_context.id);
8427  _sg_destroy_context(ctx);
8428  }
8429  }
8430  _sg_discard_backend();
8431  _sg_discard_pools(&_sg.pools);
8432  _sg.valid = false;
8433 }
8434 
8435 SOKOL_API_IMPL bool sg_isvalid(void) {
8436  return _sg.valid;
8437 }
8438 
8439 SOKOL_API_IMPL bool sg_query_feature(sg_feature f) {
8440  return _sg_query_feature(f);
8441 }
8442 
8443 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_context sg_setup_context(void) {
8444  sg_context res;
8445  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.context_pool);
8446  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8447  _sg_context* ctx = _sg_context_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8448  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx);
8449  ctx->slot.id = res.id;
8450  ctx->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8451  _sg_create_context(ctx);
8452  SOKOL_ASSERT(ctx->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
8453  _sg_activate_context(ctx);
8454  }
8455  _sg.active_context = res;
8456  return res;
8457 }
8458 
8459 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_discard_context(sg_context ctx_id) {
8460  _sg_destroy_all_resources(&_sg.pools, ctx_id.id);
8461  _sg_context* ctx = _sg_lookup_context(&_sg.pools, ctx_id.id);
8462  if (ctx) {
8463  _sg_destroy_context(ctx);
8464  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.context_pool, ctx_id.id);
8465  }
8466  _sg.active_context.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
8467  _sg_activate_context(0);
8468 }
8469 
8470 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_activate_context(sg_context ctx_id) {
8471  _sg.active_context = ctx_id;
8472  _sg_context* ctx = _sg_lookup_context(&_sg.pools, ctx_id.id);
8473  /* NOTE: ctx can be 0 here if the context is no longer valid */
8474  _sg_activate_context(ctx);
8475 }
8476 
8477 /*-- allocate resource id ----------------------------------------------------*/
8478 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_buffer sg_alloc_buffer(void) {
8479  sg_buffer res;
8480  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.buffer_pool);
8481  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8482  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_buffer_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8483  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && (buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_INITIAL) && (buf->slot.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
8484  buf->slot.id = res.id;
8485  buf->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8486  }
8487  return res;
8488 }
8489 
8490 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_image sg_alloc_image(void) {
8491  sg_image res;
8492  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.image_pool);
8493  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8494  _sg_image* img = _sg_image_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8495  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && (img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_INITIAL) && (img->slot.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
8496  img->slot.id = res.id;
8497  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8498  }
8499  return res;
8500 }
8501 
8502 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_shader sg_alloc_shader(void) {
8503  sg_shader res;
8504  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.shader_pool);
8505  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8506  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_shader_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8507  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && (shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_INITIAL) && (shd->slot.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
8508  shd->slot.id = res.id;
8509  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8510  }
8511  return res;
8512 }
8513 
8514 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_pipeline sg_alloc_pipeline(void) {
8515  sg_pipeline res;
8516  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.pipeline_pool);
8517  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8518  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_pipeline_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8519  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && (pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_INITIAL) && (pip->slot.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
8520  pip->slot.id = res.id;
8521  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8522  }
8523  return res;
8524 }
8525 
8526 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_pass sg_alloc_pass(void) {
8527  sg_pass res;
8528  res.id = _sg_pool_alloc_id(&_sg.pools.pass_pool);
8529  if (res.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8530  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_pass_at(&_sg.pools, res.id);
8531  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass && (pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_INITIAL) && (pass->slot.id == SG_INVALID_ID));
8532  pass->slot.id = res.id;
8533  pass->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC;
8534  }
8535  return res;
8536 }
8537 
8538 /*-- initialize an allocated resource ----------------------------------------*/
8539 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_init_buffer(sg_buffer buf_id, const sg_buffer_desc* desc) {
8540  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID && desc);
8541  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, buf_id.id);
8542  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8543  if (_sg_validate_buffer_desc(desc)) {
8544  _sg_create_buffer(buf, desc);
8545  buf->slot.ctx_id = _sg.active_context.id;
8546  }
8547  else {
8548  buf->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8549  }
8550  SOKOL_ASSERT((buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)||(buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED));
8551 }
8552 
8553 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_init_image(sg_image img_id, const sg_image_desc* desc) {
8554  SOKOL_ASSERT(img_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID && desc);
8555  _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, img_id.id);
8556  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8557  if (_sg_validate_image_desc(desc)) {
8558  _sg_create_image(img, desc);
8559  img->slot.ctx_id = _sg.active_context.id;
8560  }
8561  else {
8562  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8563  }
8564  SOKOL_ASSERT((img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)||(img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED));
8565 }
8566 
8567 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_init_shader(sg_shader shd_id, const sg_shader_desc* desc) {
8568  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID && desc);
8569  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, shd_id.id);
8570  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8571  if (_sg_validate_shader_desc(desc)) {
8572  _sg_create_shader(shd, desc);
8573  shd->slot.ctx_id = _sg.active_context.id;
8574  }
8575  else {
8576  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8577  }
8578  SOKOL_ASSERT((shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)||(shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED));
8579 }
8580 
8581 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_init_pipeline(sg_pipeline pip_id, const sg_pipeline_desc* desc) {
8582  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID && desc);
8583  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, pip_id.id);
8584  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8585  if (_sg_validate_pipeline_desc(desc)) {
8586  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, desc->shader.id);
8587  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
8588  _sg_create_pipeline(pip, shd, desc);
8589  pip->slot.ctx_id = _sg.active_context.id;
8590  }
8591  else {
8592  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8593  }
8594  SOKOL_ASSERT((pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)||(pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED));
8595 }
8596 
8597 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_init_pass(sg_pass pass_id, const sg_pass_desc* desc) {
8598  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID && desc);
8599  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, pass_id.id);
8600  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass && pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8601  if (_sg_validate_pass_desc(desc)) {
8602  /* lookup pass attachment image pointers */
8603  _sg_image* att_imgs[SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS + 1];
8604  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS; i++) {
8605  if (desc->color_attachments[i].image.id) {
8606  att_imgs[i] = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, desc->color_attachments[i].image.id);
8607  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_imgs[i] && att_imgs[i]->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
8608  }
8609  else {
8610  att_imgs[i] = 0;
8611  }
8612  }
8613  const int ds_att_index = SG_MAX_COLOR_ATTACHMENTS;
8614  if (desc->depth_stencil_attachment.image.id) {
8615  att_imgs[ds_att_index] = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, desc->depth_stencil_attachment.image.id);
8616  SOKOL_ASSERT(att_imgs[ds_att_index] && att_imgs[ds_att_index]->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID);
8617  }
8618  else {
8619  att_imgs[ds_att_index] = 0;
8620  }
8621  _sg_create_pass(pass, att_imgs, desc);
8622  pass->slot.ctx_id = _sg.active_context.id;
8623  }
8624  else {
8625  pass->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8626  }
8627  SOKOL_ASSERT((pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)||(pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED));
8628 }
8629 
8630 /*-- set allocated resource to failed state ----------------------------------*/
8631 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_fail_buffer(sg_buffer buf_id) {
8632  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID);
8633  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, buf_id.id);
8634  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf && buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8635  buf->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8636 }
8637 
8638 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_fail_image(sg_image img_id) {
8639  SOKOL_ASSERT(img_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID);
8640  _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, img_id.id);
8641  SOKOL_ASSERT(img && img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8642  img->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8643 }
8644 
8645 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_fail_shader(sg_shader shd_id) {
8646  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID);
8647  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, shd_id.id);
8648  SOKOL_ASSERT(shd && shd->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8649  shd->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8650 }
8651 
8652 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_fail_pipeline(sg_pipeline pip_id) {
8653  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID);
8654  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, pip_id.id);
8655  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip && pip->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8656  pip->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8657 }
8658 
8659 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_fail_pass(sg_pass pass_id) {
8660  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID);
8661  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, pass_id.id);
8662  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass && pass->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_ALLOC);
8663  pass->slot.state = SG_RESOURCESTATE_FAILED;
8664 }
8665 
8666 /*-- get resource state */
8667 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_resource_state sg_query_buffer_state(sg_buffer buf_id) {
8668  if (buf_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8669  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, buf_id.id);
8670  if (buf) {
8671  return buf->slot.state;
8672  }
8673  }
8674  return SG_RESOURCESTATE_INVALID;
8675 }
8676 
8677 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_resource_state sg_query_image_state(sg_image img_id) {
8678  if (img_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8679  _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, img_id.id);
8680  if (img) {
8681  return img->slot.state;
8682  }
8683  }
8684  return SG_RESOURCESTATE_INVALID;
8685 }
8686 
8687 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_resource_state sg_query_shader_state(sg_shader shd_id) {
8688  if (shd_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8689  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, shd_id.id);
8690  if (shd) {
8691  return shd->slot.state;
8692  }
8693  }
8694  return SG_RESOURCESTATE_INVALID;
8695 }
8696 
8697 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_resource_state sg_query_pipeline_state(sg_pipeline pip_id) {
8698  if (pip_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8699  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, pip_id.id);
8700  if (pip) {
8701  return pip->slot.state;
8702  }
8703  }
8704  return SG_RESOURCESTATE_INVALID;
8705 }
8706 
8707 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_resource_state sg_query_pass_state(sg_pass pass_id) {
8708  if (pass_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8709  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, pass_id.id);
8710  if (pass) {
8711  return pass->slot.state;
8712  }
8713  }
8714  return SG_RESOURCESTATE_INVALID;
8715 }
8716 
8717 /*-- allocate and initialize resource ----------------------------------------*/
8718 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_buffer sg_make_buffer(const sg_buffer_desc* desc) {
8719  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8720  sg_buffer buf_id = sg_alloc_buffer();
8721  if (buf_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8722  sg_init_buffer(buf_id, desc);
8723  }
8724  else {
8725  SOKOL_LOG("buffer pool exhausted!");
8726  }
8727  return buf_id;
8728 }
8729 
8730 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_image sg_make_image(const sg_image_desc* desc) {
8731  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8732  sg_image img_id = sg_alloc_image();
8733  if (img_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8734  sg_init_image(img_id, desc);
8735  }
8736  else {
8737  SOKOL_LOG("image pool exhausted!");
8738  }
8739  return img_id;
8740 }
8741 
8742 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_shader sg_make_shader(const sg_shader_desc* desc) {
8743  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8744  sg_shader shd_id = sg_alloc_shader();
8745  if (shd_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8746  sg_init_shader(shd_id, desc);
8747  }
8748  else {
8749  SOKOL_LOG("shader pool exhausted!");
8750  }
8751  return shd_id;
8752 }
8753 
8754 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_pipeline sg_make_pipeline(const sg_pipeline_desc* desc) {
8755  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8756  sg_pipeline pip_id = sg_alloc_pipeline();
8757  if (pip_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8758  sg_init_pipeline(pip_id, desc);
8759  }
8760  else {
8761  SOKOL_LOG("pipeline pool exhausted!");
8762  }
8763  return pip_id;
8764 }
8765 
8766 SOKOL_API_IMPL sg_pass sg_make_pass(const sg_pass_desc* desc) {
8767  SOKOL_ASSERT(desc);
8768  sg_pass pass_id = sg_alloc_pass();
8769  if (pass_id.id != SG_INVALID_ID) {
8770  sg_init_pass(pass_id, desc);
8771  }
8772  else {
8773  SOKOL_LOG("pass pool exhausted!");
8774  }
8775  return pass_id;
8776 }
8777 
8778 /*-- destroy resource --------------------------------------------------------*/
8779 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_destroy_buffer(sg_buffer buf_id) {
8780  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, buf_id.id);
8781  if (buf) {
8782  if (buf->slot.ctx_id == _sg.active_context.id) {
8783  _sg_destroy_buffer(buf);
8784  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.buffer_pool, buf_id.id);
8785  }
8786  else {
8787  SOKOL_LOG("sg_destroy_buffer: active context mismatch (must be same as for creation)");
8788  }
8789  }
8790 }
8791 
8792 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_destroy_image(sg_image img_id) {
8793  _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, img_id.id);
8794  if (img) {
8795  if (img->slot.ctx_id == _sg.active_context.id) {
8796  _sg_destroy_image(img);
8797  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.image_pool, img_id.id);
8798  }
8799  else {
8800  SOKOL_LOG("sg_destroy_image: active context mismatch (must be same as for creation)");
8801  }
8802  }
8803 }
8804 
8805 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_destroy_shader(sg_shader shd_id) {
8806  _sg_shader* shd = _sg_lookup_shader(&_sg.pools, shd_id.id);
8807  if (shd) {
8808  if (shd->slot.ctx_id == _sg.active_context.id) {
8809  _sg_destroy_shader(shd);
8810  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.shader_pool, shd_id.id);
8811  }
8812  else {
8813  SOKOL_LOG("sg_destroy_shader: active context mismatch (must be same as for creation)");
8814  }
8815  }
8816 }
8817 
8818 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_destroy_pipeline(sg_pipeline pip_id) {
8819  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, pip_id.id);
8820  if (pip) {
8821  if (pip->slot.ctx_id == _sg.active_context.id) {
8822  _sg_destroy_pipeline(pip);
8823  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.pipeline_pool, pip_id.id);
8824  }
8825  else {
8826  SOKOL_LOG("sg_destroy_pipeline: active context mismatch (must be same as for creation)");
8827  }
8828  }
8829 }
8830 
8831 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_destroy_pass(sg_pass pass_id) {
8832  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, pass_id.id);
8833  if (pass) {
8834  if (pass->slot.ctx_id == _sg.active_context.id) {
8835  _sg_destroy_pass(pass);
8836  _sg_pool_free_id(&_sg.pools.pass_pool, pass_id.id);
8837  }
8838  else {
8839  SOKOL_LOG("sg_destroy_pass: active context mismatch (must be same as for creation)");
8840  }
8841  }
8842 }
8843 
8844 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_begin_default_pass(const sg_pass_action* pass_action, int width, int height) {
8845  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass_action);
8846  SOKOL_ASSERT((pass_action->_start_canary == 0) && (pass_action->_end_canary == 0));
8847  sg_pass_action pa;
8848  _sg_resolve_default_pass_action(pass_action, &pa);
8849  _sg.cur_pass.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
8850  _sg.pass_valid = true;
8851  _sg_begin_pass(0, &pa, width, height);
8852 }
8853 
8854 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_begin_pass(sg_pass pass_id, const sg_pass_action* pass_action) {
8855  SOKOL_ASSERT(pass_action);
8856  SOKOL_ASSERT((pass_action->_start_canary == 0) && (pass_action->_end_canary == 0));
8857  _sg.cur_pass = pass_id;
8858  _sg_pass* pass = _sg_lookup_pass(&_sg.pools, pass_id.id);
8859  if (pass && _sg_validate_begin_pass(pass)) {
8860  _sg.pass_valid = true;
8861  sg_pass_action pa;
8862  _sg_resolve_default_pass_action(pass_action, &pa);
8863  const int w = pass->color_atts[0].image->width;
8864  const int h = pass->color_atts[0].image->height;
8865  _sg_begin_pass(pass, &pa, w, h);
8866  }
8867  else {
8868  _sg.pass_valid = false;
8869  }
8870 }
8871 
8872 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_apply_viewport(int x, int y, int width, int height, bool origin_top_left) {
8873  if (!_sg.pass_valid) {
8874  return;
8875  }
8876  _sg_apply_viewport(x, y, width, height, origin_top_left);
8877 }
8878 
8879 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_apply_scissor_rect(int x, int y, int width, int height, bool origin_top_left) {
8880  if (!_sg.pass_valid) {
8881  return;
8882  }
8883  _sg_apply_scissor_rect(x, y, width, height, origin_top_left);
8884 }
8885 
8886 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_apply_draw_state(const sg_draw_state* ds) {
8887  SOKOL_ASSERT(ds);
8888  SOKOL_ASSERT((ds->_start_canary==0) && (ds->_end_canary==0));
8889  if (!_sg_validate_draw_state(ds)) {
8890  _sg.next_draw_valid = false;
8891  return;
8892  }
8893  if (!_sg.pass_valid) {
8894  return;
8895  }
8896  _sg.next_draw_valid = true;
8897  _sg.cur_pipeline = ds->pipeline;
8898 
8899  /* lookup resource pointers, resources which are not in SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID
8900  are not a fatal error, but suppress the following drawcalls, this is to
8901  allow for simple asynchronous resource setup
8902  */
8903  _sg_pipeline* pip = _sg_lookup_pipeline(&_sg.pools, ds->pipeline.id);
8904  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip);
8905  _sg.next_draw_valid &= (SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID == pip->slot.state);
8906  SOKOL_ASSERT(pip->shader && (pip->shader->slot.id == pip->shader_id.id));
8907 
8908  _sg_buffer* vbs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS] = { 0 };
8909  int num_vbs = 0;
8910  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_BUFFERS; i++, num_vbs++) {
8911  if (ds->vertex_buffers[i].id) {
8912  vbs[i] = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, ds->vertex_buffers[i].id);
8913  SOKOL_ASSERT(vbs[i]);
8914  _sg.next_draw_valid &= (SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID == vbs[i]->slot.state);
8915  }
8916  else {
8917  break;
8918  }
8919  }
8920 
8921  _sg_buffer* ib = 0;
8922  if (ds->index_buffer.id) {
8923  ib = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, ds->index_buffer.id);
8924  SOKOL_ASSERT(ib);
8925  _sg.next_draw_valid &= (SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID == ib->slot.state);
8926  }
8927 
8928  _sg_image* vs_imgs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES] = { 0 };
8929  int num_vs_imgs = 0;
8930  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++, num_vs_imgs++) {
8931  if (ds->vs_images[i].id) {
8932  vs_imgs[i] = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, ds->vs_images[i].id);
8933  SOKOL_ASSERT(vs_imgs[i]);
8934  _sg.next_draw_valid &= (SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID == vs_imgs[i]->slot.state);
8935  }
8936  else {
8937  break;
8938  }
8939  }
8940 
8941  _sg_image* fs_imgs[SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES] = { 0 };
8942  int num_fs_imgs = 0;
8943  for (int i = 0; i < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_IMAGES; i++, num_fs_imgs++) {
8944  if (ds->fs_images[i].id) {
8945  fs_imgs[i] = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, ds->fs_images[i].id);
8946  SOKOL_ASSERT(fs_imgs[i]);
8947  _sg.next_draw_valid &= (SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID == fs_imgs[i]->slot.state);
8948  }
8949  else {
8950  break;
8951  }
8952  }
8953  if (_sg.next_draw_valid) {
8954  const uint32_t* vb_offsets = ds->vertex_buffer_offsets;
8955  uint32_t ib_offset = ds->index_buffer_offset;
8956  _sg_apply_draw_state(pip, vbs, vb_offsets, num_vbs, ib, ib_offset, vs_imgs, num_vs_imgs, fs_imgs, num_fs_imgs);
8957  }
8958 }
8959 
8960 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_apply_uniform_block(sg_shader_stage stage, int ub_index, const void* data, int num_bytes) {
8961  SOKOL_ASSERT((stage == SG_SHADERSTAGE_VS) || (stage == SG_SHADERSTAGE_FS));
8962  SOKOL_ASSERT((ub_index >= 0) && (ub_index < SG_MAX_SHADERSTAGE_UBS));
8963  SOKOL_ASSERT(data && (num_bytes > 0));
8964  if (!_sg_validate_apply_uniform_block(stage, ub_index, data, num_bytes)) {
8965  _sg.next_draw_valid = false;
8966  return;
8967  }
8968  if (!(_sg.pass_valid && _sg.next_draw_valid)) {
8969  return;
8970  }
8971  _sg_apply_uniform_block(stage, ub_index, data, num_bytes);
8972 }
8973 
8974 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_draw(int base_element, int num_elements, int num_instances) {
8975  if (!(_sg.pass_valid && _sg.next_draw_valid)) {
8976  return;
8977  }
8978  _sg_draw(base_element, num_elements, num_instances);
8979 }
8980 
8981 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_end_pass(void) {
8982  if (!_sg.pass_valid) {
8983  return;
8984  }
8985  _sg_end_pass();
8986  _sg.cur_pass.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
8987  _sg.cur_pipeline.id = SG_INVALID_ID;
8988  _sg.pass_valid = false;
8989 }
8990 
8991 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_commit() {
8992  _sg_commit();
8993  _sg.frame_index++;
8994 }
8995 
8996 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_reset_state_cache(void) {
8997  _sg_reset_state_cache();
8998 }
8999 
9000 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_update_buffer(sg_buffer buf_id, const void* data, int num_bytes) {
9001  if (num_bytes == 0) {
9002  return;
9003  }
9004  _sg_buffer* buf = _sg_lookup_buffer(&_sg.pools, buf_id.id);
9005  if (!(buf && buf->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)) {
9006  return;
9007  }
9008  if (_sg_validate_update_buffer(buf, data, num_bytes)) {
9009  SOKOL_ASSERT(buf->upd_frame_index != _sg.frame_index);
9010  _sg_update_buffer(buf, data, num_bytes);
9011  buf->upd_frame_index = _sg.frame_index;
9012  }
9013 }
9014 
9015 SOKOL_API_IMPL void sg_update_image(sg_image img_id, const sg_image_content* data) {
9016  _sg_image* img = _sg_lookup_image(&_sg.pools, img_id.id);
9017  if (!(img && img->slot.state == SG_RESOURCESTATE_VALID)) {
9018  return;
9019  }
9020  if (_sg_validate_update_image(img, data)) {
9021  SOKOL_ASSERT(img->upd_frame_index != _sg.frame_index);
9022  _sg_update_image(img, data);
9023  img->upd_frame_index = _sg.frame_index;
9024  }
9025 }

9027 #pragma warning(pop)
9028 #endif
9029 
9030 #endif /* SOKOL_IMPL */
